agasti boile se meruśūḷara mahimāṁ śuṇilu mahārāja | 80 |
gomaẏa pakai chaḍā pahaṁra dyanti tahiṁ | 82 |
śate uttara ye khañjaṇī tahiṁ jana
teṇu se bhojana ante chaḍā paẏeṁrā dyanti

lg.head:
{@kāmadhenu haraṇa o rājasaẏa
yajña sūcanā@}

lg.l: tā tahuṁ utapatti hoile aṣṭauttara śateka ātmajā | 1 |
aniḷa basuṁku dekhile muni aniḷa pabongte | 5 |
chāriyuge jāṇu tumbhe aṭa gāī chorā | 7 |
lg.note: –se cauryya puruṣe tāhā nianti aḍāi |–gha, pha
–aniḷa basuṁku dekhile muni anaṅga banaste |–jha, ṭa, cha, gha, tha

lg.l: tumbhe dekhilaki gāī ke nelā niśarāti | 8 |
aniḷabasu boile tumbhe śuṇa ho kr̥pajaḷe
kaṇaẏa rudra rājāra aṭanti śateka chāṭe
satayugare gāī goṭi tumbhara nela ẏehibāṭe | 10 |
gāīki dohana se karanti nei gopye
tumbhara gāīki munihe luchāichanti nei śākalya dīpe | 11 |
śākalya dvīpe gāī ṭhāba kale yāiṁ | 12 |
kr̥tanteka rudra boli kaṇaẏa rudrara jyeṣṭha putra
tāhākaiṁ māgile yāiṁ gāī goṭi tapobanta | 13 |
mara māra boli kari tāra keśa ye uchuḍi | 14 |
ke neḍā goiṭhāẏe piṭanti nei bāḍi
yāa tumbhe jāta huare chāṇḍāḷuṇīra garbhe | 16 |
cauryya puruṣa hoi daẏā tumbhara nāhiṁ | 17 |
dhārmika bibeka se digapāḷa pantita aṭa | 18 |
tāhāṁkara putra hoi tmbhe kiṁpā ẏeḍeka agyāṁtā
agaṇā khata kuḍhaku tumbhe nikāu thāa sarbathā | 19 |
lg.note: –chāṇḍāḷa janme tumbhe pāiba bahuta abastā |–pāṭhāntara
lg.l: pāmara agyāna tumbhe aṭa gāī chorā
saburi uttiṣṭa kāḍhi deuthāa chaḍā ye paẏeṁrā | 20 |
tu ẏeḍe mahatmā boli āmbhe nuārilu cihni
gāī goṭi gheni goḍāile ruṣiṁka panthe bikaḷe
boile durāpada śāpya āmbhanta diluṁ kupājaḷe
bolanti tumbhe ye dhārmika bibeka tapobanta mahāmuni
duṣṭaṁkara doṣa svāmī tumbhe kiṁpe gheni | 24 |
na jāṇi tumbhanta droha kale mohora ye poẏe
beḷaka mahātamā ho kiṁpe na kala upekṣā
śāpaku mukata tohora ẏebe hou manabāñcchā | 26 |
boile tretaẏā yuge tumbhe chāṇḍāḷa ghare thiba
hastināre chera paẏeṁra kari yugeka bahiyiba | 28 |
tretaẏāyuga antare hoiba dvāpara name yuga
rājasi yāga ye se karibe āropaṇa
tāhāṁkara pure prabeśa hoibe pr̥thira rājagaṇa | 30 |

div.note:
–āpaṇā kr̥te tumbhe mañchapure thāa
yujheṣṭhi sa{?} drarine mr̥ḷati tumbhe pātha |–jha, ṭa

lg.l: tahiṁ tumhe chaḍā paẏeṁra kariba pratidine | 31 |
se mahāyāge khaṭiba tumbhe chaḍa daśa dibasa
tahiṁre se pāra yiba tumbhara goruchora doṣa | 32 |
śuṇa ho baibasutamanu tumbhe rājusi yāgara mahiṁmā
tahiṁki bāṭa chāhuṁthile se cauryya rudra mahātamā | 33 |
subarṇṇara paẏeṁra se bīre karechanti dhari
se rājusi yāga stāna chaḍā paẏeṁrā kari | 34 |
aṣṭa uttara śate bhrātha karanti tahiṁ br̥ṣṭi | 35 |
meghe br̥ṣṭi kari se bhumi karanti dhoẏana | 36 |
ẏekādaśa rudraṁkara se putra aṣṭauttara śatebhāi
se bhumi paẏeṁri gemaẏe chaḍā dei | 37 |
ẏesaneka sambhabong se bhojana stānara kathā
manu pucchā kale śuṇimā agasti ẏe
mahayāgara bāratā tu śuṇa ho mahīpāḷa | 40 |
mamasta ruṣiṁka caraṇe yujheṣṭhi hoile praṇapatya | 42 |
āsana samarjana pādāsana naibedya gandha ye candana
yāga karmaṇa bākye yujheṣṭhi deba bācchi | 47 |
kare kuśabaṭu ḍāhāṇi brateka śaṁkhe jaba tiḷapāṇi
dhaumya purohita muḷe samasta bākya ubāri | 49 |
gahaḷe beda ādhyāna kaunti biprama ne
yathā mantrabākya ucca raṇa karanti purohite | 53 |

div.note: –basana kuṇḍaḷa dhupadīpa naibedya
āsana stāgata pādādanā hiṁsampada |
gandhacandanahiṁ māḷa nabatana basra
trapūra miśrika se subundha nānā puṣya |–gha

lg.l: āho manurājā jaṭī haṭi baṭi sāmuṭi
ẏehāṁkara muḷe ye aṣṭādaśa samidha khaṭi | 54 |
agni debatāṁku bije karāile nei yāgakuṇḍe | 60 |
srohā chāḍile nei agni debatāṁka garbhasaḷe | 61 |

div.note: –ẏehānta mukhyakari ṣoḷalaṣa samidhanta |–jha, ṭa
–baśyānara muḷe ye agni chāri |–tha, ḍa, gha, cha
–guāghr̥ta bahukarma ādi pāka purā |–na, ṭha
–guāghr̥ta brahmakarma pābaka kariṇa
brāhaṇamānaṁku yujheṣṭhi debaṁku baraṇa |
brahmakarma pābaka thagni chāri sūrā
aṣṭādaśa bāhāni dvādaśa agni doharā |
guāghr̥ta bahmachārī karma chārikhurā
aṣṭa daṇa bahani dhātā dvādaśa deharā |
guāghr̥ta brahmapādaka bahma bakṣasthaḷe
srāhana saṁndhyā ye sārile nityakarma beḷe |

lg.l: ghaṭaṇa āhūti ye pātile deba dharme
dharma prāpata hou boli bolanti bipragaṇa | 67 |
byāsaṁku pratiuttara dile agnira nāhīṁ abakāśā | 68 |
bho byāse tohora parā maharuṣi dilu prathama āhūti
agniśikhā na ghenilā nāhīṁ lohitabarṇṇa mūrtti | 69 |
mārakaṇḍe boile makaramāsa ante śate kiraṇa {??}niude
tāhāṁkara teje agni śukaḷabarṇṇa diśanti hāde | 70 |
baśiṣṭhe boile hāde ho nuhai ẏemanta
āpaṇe yāganika yahiṁ byāsa biśiṣṭha mārakaṇḍa
tahiṁ kisa āditya raśmi teja brahmāṇḍa | 72 |
nāgade boile tumbhe na kaha yathārtha kathā
maharuṣi hoi tumbhe na jāṇa gata āgata bāratā | 73 |
bhuta bhabiṣya bāratā tumbhejāṇu bhmabana tini | 74 |
kemante agni debatāṁkara ye na diśilā śikhā
nārade boile muṁ aṭai kaḷaha priẏā
mithyā na kahiṇa ye satyahiṁ kahai yāhā | 76 |
āho mohora satya kahante niścaẏa lāgai kaḷi
mārakaṇḍa boile tumbhe deba ḍagara yathārtha
samasta dr̥śya tumbhanta bhuta bhabiṣya bārata | 78 |
nārade boile kahibā satya bākya goṭi
aputrika rājā ye aṭai dharmarāja yujheṣṭhi | 79 |
teṇukari agni debatā āhūti na gheni | 80 |
indra debatā rājya na pāḷai bhale | 81 |
rājā hoi yebe putra na thāi koḷe
basudhā phaḷa dāẏaka na huai bhale | 82 |
megha tahiṁ pr̥thī ye na pāḷanti bhale | 83 |
pitr̥ṁlāṁka habirbhāga āhūti na pābanti bhale | 85 |
rājā hoikari yebe se hoai aputrika
pātra amānātye tāre kehi na pābanti sukha | 87 |
debata brāhmaṇe ye na gheninti bhagati | 88 |
nāradaṁka bacana kehu kariba mithyā bhāṣi | 91 |
ẏeka ātmā aṭanti nā pāṇḍaba pañchubhrāthe | 92 |
ghaṭa utkaṭa nāme ye upujilā ātmaje | 95 |
nārade boile yāhā sata kahila byāse
agni baraṇe nāhīṁ ghaṭautkaṭa yujheṣṭhi debaṁka pāśe | 97 |
mahāśāsra bakatā hoi kiṁpe byāsa hoile baṇā
ẏe mahāyaga thānaku ghaṭautkaṭaku bahana kari aṇā | 98 |
hasti nāku hiḍimbaka bana sahasra yojana
māgo ẏo mohora āstāna kimpe kaṁpilā adabhmate | 3 |
bābu somabongśe rājā dharma ye yujheṣṭhi
bhīmasena bolikari tāhāṁkara kantiṣṭha bhrātha goṭi | 5 |
rājānta bari rājusi yāga karanti āropaṇa
talaẏe kari cintile tohora pitā bhīmasena
kisa drabya gheni mātā go muṁ yibaiṁ tahīṁki | 8 |
hiḍimbikī boilā bābu tahiṁ ruṇḍa hoichanti lakṣeka mahārājā
baḍāi sambhabonge yāiṁ tuhi karibu pādaūjā | 9 |

div.note:
+2 nandanara bacanaku hr̥dagate śuṇi
sapata brahmāṇḍa tāku diśilā takṣaṇi | na

lg.l: kasturī sahasre jiāda ye lakṣeka jība | 10 |
tāraṇī nadīkūḷe yāiṁ ṭhātha ye caḷāiṁ | 15 |
bābu hr̥dagate dharithibu mohora bākya goṭi | 16 |
yāānteṇa bāṭe bheṭibu tohora tāta bhīmasene
āna kāhākaiṁ namaskāra nohibu boile hiḍambikī | 19 |
mānaba kuḷaku aṭu tu debatā samāna sinā | 20 |
māgo yujheṣṭhi debaṁka koḷe thibe dr̥pada duhitī
tāhāṁku namaskāra karanti go lakṣeka napati | 22 |
brāhmaṇa rājāra se ye aṭanti kumārī
tāhāra kopa kale mohora śarira hoiba dhvaṁsi | 24 |
teṇukari na chāṛilu go tohora kaḷaṁka manīṣā | 25 |
hiḍimbikī boile tu ye hiḍimbaka bane ādhipati
pāṇḍabanta namaskāra tohora na yogāi yugate
tuhi ye boilu mote sehu yāgaru utapatti
bābu ẏekā puruṣaku pāñchastirī aṭai yugate
bābu chāra nilakṣaṇī pāmarī se aṭai asatī
tāhākai namaskāra kale āṣya kṣaẏe hvanti | 31 |
bābu tu yebe bhaẏe kalu putra puhiṁ tohora saṅgate yibi ki? | 32 |
asurī rūpa teji ailā kāmaseṇā rūpa dhari | 33 |
garbhara bhitare bharila asura ratha koṭi | 34 |
lg.note: –māninī rupa gopya kariṇa kāmākṣīrupa dhari –ka

lg.l: śūnya puruṣe trāsile tāhāra rūpa dekhi | 35 |
āditya debatā ākāśe hoile uhāḍe kari
putrara koṭiẏe ratha bharilā hiḍambikīra garbhagate
āho putrakaiṁ gheni tora hiḍambikī āsuacchi | 38 |
bābu āditya debatā adr̥śya hoile kebaṇahiṁ arthe | 39 |
karapatra yoḍiṇa kahai madanā debīra baḷā
āditya debatā teja tahūṁ hiḍambikīra teja anargaḷā | 40 |
svāmī ẏe koṭiẏe ratha putrara garbhagata kari
āho mahābhīṣma rūpa dhari ye āsai hidimbikī
mānuṣe trāsibe nā tāhāra rūpa dekhi | 43 |
thokāẏeka dūra brikodara tumbhe yāani pāchoṭi
prabodhanā kari gheni āsa tohora putra goti | 44 |
lg.note: –bhīmasenakaiṁ hakāri badanti jagannāthe
āho mahabhīṣma rūpa dhari hiḍimbikī ailā hade |
kopaura hoi āsai hiḍambikī
bābu manuṣye naśibe asura rupadekhi |–jha, ṭa
–sukhe gheni āsa tāra putnī putra goṭi |–na, ja

lg.l: ratha chāḍi niuchāḷi kale rākṣasa sanyabaḷe | 48 |
sakaḷa śubha boli boila tāhara kumara
boile madanasena annameñjana āṇi deuthiba nitye | 51 |
dvāre rahila se bajra kapacara nandanī | 52 |
nārāẏeṇaṁku dekhi kumara padmapāde praṇapatya kala | 53 |
rājāmāne samaste heṁ tāhākaiṁ nirekhiṇa dekhi
āho mātuḷa ẏehāra hiḍimbaka mātā hiḍimbekī | 56 |
bajra kapacara nandinī yahuṁ bhīmasenakaiṁ kala icchā
adr̥ṣṭi aśr̥ti ẏehā dekhilā śuṇilā āmbharata nāhiṁ | 59 |
aneka ratna gheni kumāra kalāka daraśana | 60 |
jita mahāprasāda boli ye āgyāṁ abadhārī
chāmure ubhā kumāra dui kākhe hātha bhari | 62 |
dropatīra mūkha chāhiṁ kumāra kalāka heṭhamātha
rāgeṇa tripanta beni netr̥ aśr̥jala gaḷi | 64 |
pāṇḍabahuṁ śateguṇe muhiṁ se aṭai garuhaṁsī | 67 |
brāhmaṇa rājā dropadara muhiṁ aṭai kumārī
mātāra bacane tu garbita hoilure duṣṭa
mukuiṁ namaskāra kiṁpe na kalure pāpiṣṭha | 69 |
ẏe mahasabhāre mote nindā kalure pāmara
mohora śāpye alpāẏuṣa huare hi chāra | 70 |
mātā pāmerī bākye mote tuhi hiṁsā kalu
bināyuddhe tohora hr̥de bajra śakati paḍu | 71 |
ẏesaneka śāpya yahuṁ dileka satya uccāri
lāja bhaẏa saṁkoca se samasta tejyā kari
ālo dekhu dekhu pāmerī aṭu tu asatī
ẏekā stirī ki kāhiṁlo achai pañchupati | 75 |
putra mohora koṭiẏe paṭe mūrddhanā abhiṣekī
tāhāra ta namaskāralo na yogāi stirīṁki | 76 |
agyāna bāḷuta putraku mora lo kalu ẏeḍeka kepa
guṇa na bichārilo ananute dilu śapa | 77 |
ẏe ye se śāpya tohora nohiba anyastā
yugate se tohe ra putra khrī tāhāra mātā | 78 |
te hora śāpa tāhaku hou paramahīta
hr̥dagate śakati paḍante putraku mohora acchini kṣatrībr̥tta | 79 |
tu ta āṇṭhu kuḍi putra tohora nāhiṁ
tukui śāpya abā debai muhiṁ kāhiṁ | 81 |
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu se hiḍimbikīra mahimā
abaśya putra prāpata hoiba tote ẏe pāñchakari bīryye
kāḷe upujibe tora pañchu ye ātmaje | 83 |
lg.note: –yugate tu tāhāra lo hoilu sābata mātā |–

lg.l: sāta sāta baraṣe putra tohora hoibe śiraccheda | 84 |
sabhāre dui satīṁkara kaḷi ye hoilā | 85 |
bho byāsa ẏe śāpya tohora śāhāsre kemante acchi dekha | 86 |
nārāẏaṇaṁka bacane byāse pheile grantha pothi
śuṇa deba sābadhāne jagannātha paramabrahma yogī
kuru pāṇḍabe anyoanyi hoibe kāḷa bhogī | 89 |
mahāyuddha karibe se daśa ye dibase | 90 |
dvitīẏa dibasaka rātraka hoiba ghora raṇe | 91 |
karṇṇara hāthe thiba bajra ye śakati
nandīgheṣa ratha pacha kati tu niścinte luci thāasi | 93 |
nandīghoṣa ratha pa tāḷaku chāpiba hanudeba | 94 |
lg.note: –kṣatrītuḷatu adharma huantā adhogati |–jha, ṭa
–sabhāre dui satīṁkara anyoanyi hoilā | jha, ṭa
–sabhāre dui sapataṇīṁkara kaḷi ye bājilā | ḍa, pha

lg.l: karṇṇa māriba śakati paḍiba ghaṭautakaṭara bakṣasthaḷe | 95 |
ẏesaneke byāse kahile āgata grantha kathā
droṇaṁkara uttāre senāpati hoibe hāde bīra karṇṇe | 98 |
krṇṇara sāṁgrama hari hoiba aṛhāi dibasa
śeṣa gadapabong hoiba mahāraṇa arddheka dibasa | 99 |
bahuta samara hoiba se arddha dibasara madhye
samasta śeṣa hoiba aṣṭādaśa dibasara yuddhe | 100 |
daṇḍa jaẏe kariṇa se pāṇḍeba pañchu bhrāthe
pāṇḍebanta gheni hari tumbhe yiba dvārikā
dhanure lambāi pañchuśira kariba ye bhāra | 105 |
lg.note:
–driyodhanara śatebhāi sehi ratre padibe,
lakṣma ṇatkamāra sahite samasta nāśayibe |–pha

lg.l: prāṇa bisarjiba kurubai pañchagoti putraṁkara mukha chāhiṁ | 106 |
hiḍambikī śāpa hari hāde hoiba ẏemanta | 107 |
byāsaṁkara mukharu ye ẏesaneka bākya śuṇi
āpaṇe mahātamā ye karanti sādhu sādhu

lg.note:
–“prāṇa bisarjiba kurubai pañchagoṭi putraṁkara mikha chāhiṁ”
pāṭha pare ‘ja’ re adhikā pāṭha–
grantha pothi pheḍiṇa ye dekhanti byāsadeba
ẏethu anantare kathāśuṇa manu deba |
yagyaṁre āhuti ye deuchanti byāsadeba |
subarṇṇara lakṣeka kaḷasa basithāiṁ
āhūti paḍile se lakṣe kumbha ḍhaḷai |
ẏemante ye goṭiẏe na ṛhaḷilā
jagannāthaṁka mukha chāhiṁ byāsa muni pachārilā |
svāmī kebaṇa rāẏeṭi āsināhīṁ sabhāku
bhalakari nā saṁkhoḷa tāhāku | ja yothi
lg.head:
{@bibhīṣaṇaku nimantraṇa kari āṇicā nimane
ghaṭetkacara kaṅkā gamana@}
lg.l: aneka beśa beśana ye karāile ghaṭautkaṭa
svāmī madhyapure thāiṁ nuāsai ẏeka rāẏe | 4 |
svāmī baḍāi garuhaṁsī se aṭai mahārājā
tretaẏā yugara se aṭai dharmika amara dvijā | 5 |
ẏeḍe duranteka rāja dekhilāta nāhīṁ catrapāṇi | 6 |
bibhīṣaṇa nāme rāja ẏe achai laṁkādvīpe | 7 |
lg.note: –tepana yugara se aṭai dhārmika debasvijā | pha, jha, ṭa
–ẏete yugara rājā boli śuṇilā nāhiṁ debasvāmī | jha, ṭa

–“bibhīṣana nāme rājāẏe achai laṁkādvīpe” pare na, ṭha
mudrita pustaka dvaẏare adhikā pāṭha:–
svāmī ramabhakta sehu aṭe mahāyati
trotaẏāre rāma daśarathara santati |
pitr̥satya pāḷibāku kale banabāsa
patnī bhrātā sahite daṇḍake kale bāsa |
rābaṇa nāmare laṁkā gaḍare iśvara
rāmapatnī jānakīṁki harilā pāmara |
laṁkāre prabeśi rāma tāku badhakari
tārabhāi bibīṣaṇe kale daṇḍadhārī |

lg.l: yujheṣṭhideba boile se kiṁpe āsibāka ẏethe | 8 |
nārāẏeṇa boile ho āmbhe peṣabāka dūte
bho byāse yogāi ki ẏe tumbhara bichāraku
byāse boile deba tu aṭu parama yogī
tohora śrīmukha gale bibhīṣaṇa āsiba begi | 12 |
śrī ananta koṭi brahmāṇḍara nr̥pati | nirākāra śaiḷa dharaṇa |
paraśudhara paramānada mūrati | purarabā deba udita pāṭa |
somabongśa pāṭa uddhāraṇa | nairuta mahādeba ude artha |
yayāti deba māna uddhāraṇa | kauśika baḷa bhaṅgāṇa |
nr̥pa deśa uddhāraṇa | śaśadhara mahī aḷaṁkr̥ta |
bindhyācaḷa pabongta biḍaḷādhika | manukalpa bara dāẏaka |
kāḷiṁjana kāḷāntaka, pañchāḷapura maṇḍaṇa | gaṇḍukī darpa cūḍaṇa |
kālebara bana satya parīkṣā | bhopāḷa giri kandara cūḍā curṇṇaka |
kāḷa bhaẏe niśodhana | kapiḷāsa svarga śatr̥ku bharasala |
śare sāgara bārānidhi bandhana | hanumantara prāṇa guru |
nāgeṇī baḷ abināśaka | jīmūta bāhanaku kalu cira āiṣyaka |
śaurī śākambharī bāśī kauśika andhaka kāberī |
uttara dakṣiṇa pūbong paścima, agni aiśānya bāẏabya nairuta |
aṣṭakuḷā nāga nīḷāmbara kṣīra labaṇa nīra nīḷa ikṣu |
ambu surā dadhighr̥ta | bāli, pabana samudra kāreṇī |
padma kuśaḷa ratna jambu maḷaẏā trauñcha śvetacandra
amarādhi nātha rakṣāpāḷaka | khāṇḍaba bana bidhvaṁsana |
agni debatāṁkara śaraṇa uddhāraṇa | ārogya mahaprabhma |
kumbhīra kinnarī baka hiḍimbeka darpa cūraṇa |
kuṇḍaḷā sura bidāraṇa | gosiṁhā prāṇa haraṇa |
pāṇḍabāsura moḍaṇa | deba dānaba yakṣa kinnara |
gandhabong mahāmegha nara nāga rakṣa kauṇapa piśāca |
dātbya satyabara mahāprabhma svāmīra carana uddeśya |
bhārābhara darpa bidhvaṁsana śrīrāma candra bijaẏe aḷamkr̥ta |
gyānaguru dhyāna guru | gāẏatrī mahāmantra gyānaguru |
meru sādriśye baḍimā pabana sārikṣe cañchaḷa |
mahī sārikṣe sādhāraṇa | thābara sādriśye niścaḷabanta |
śaṁkha śvetapadma mahāpadma karkoṭaka kuḷīka takṣaka |
romāñcha biṣṇu caraṇe bandana rājādhi rāja yujheṣṭhi deba |
dhana gheni indra praśaste rājusī yāga sabhāku uṭhi āsibā |
āho bibhīṣaṇa rājā tohora sanyabaḷa gheni galā |
dūta pati saṅge śīghre hoi āsiba |
kahilā nāhiṁki ? tote ṭhākuraṁku draśana karāibā boli
mukataku kāraṇa bahuta acchiṭi | nārāẏaṇa koṭiẏe
abatāre yeteka phaḷa śr̥ti | āho bibhīṣaṇa śrīghre
paẏāmi | biḷambe draśana nastiṭi bege āsa |
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa dūta prabhma caraṇe śatadaṇḍa
laṁkā gaḍaku yibāku hari ke āmbhara sāmaratha | 16 |
sehi se gami pārai agamya sāhera śūnyapatha | 19 |
laṁkāku bāhāra hoi dutī bidyādhara jāṇi | 21 |
bāsabara āgyāṁẏe yehne caḷai aṅgāra panaṅga
aneka maṇi ratna hoila ābharaṇa aṅga | 22 |
hiḍimbīra nandana caḷai dakṣiṇa diga pathe | 23 |
jambodvīpa pr̥thī jiṇī se galā ẏekarātre
ẏekādaśa yojana ucca jagatīre bijaẏe bibhīṣaṇa | 32 |
lg.note:
–“ẏekācaṇa yojana ucca jagatīre bijaẏe bibhīṣaṇa”
pāṭhapare “tha” pothire bhinna pāṭha:–
śuka sāraṇa mantrīki pachārai bibhīṣaṇa
āho kāhāra ratha ẏe bhalakari cihna | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]

lg.l: svāmī ākāśa mārge ta gamai ẏekārathī | 34 |
amara tejyā kari ki bijaẏe surapati

lg.note: (pūbong pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara)
digabije kale abā āpaṇe bāsaba,
ki ẏe kāpāḷī, kapiḷāsa jiṇi bije kale sadāśiba |
ki ẏe candradeba rohiṇīra pati,
śatecandra badana diśaita ẏehāra jyoti |
ki ẏe saṁgyāṁra pati aṭai nirañjana,
ki ẏe prakhara jyoti aṭe baḍa bā anaḷa jāṇa |
ki ẏe yanobantī maṇḍaḷa aṭanti pitā,
ki ẏe sañjībanī nātha aṣṭanāma debatā |
ki ẏe aḷakā pura teji bijekale kubera
bāranidhi nātha abā aṭe ratnākara |
ẏehāra mr̥ttiki ta nuārai chāhiṁ
dekhiṇa sānanda ta mohora hr̥daẏa huai |
rājāra bacane se kahanti śuka sāraṇa,
nohai indra puṇa śacīra ramaṇa |
ẏe yebe niśce puṇa huantā maghabā,
airābata gaja caḍhi thāāntā suradebā | (abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)
lg.l: ki ẏe rudra debatā kapiḷāsa bāsī
jagatīra sannidhye bijekalā ghaṭatkaṭa ratha gheni | 39 |
jagatī taḷe ubhā askanda bana mahīpāḷa | 41 |

lg.note: [pūbong pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara]
ẏe yebe niści huantāṭi sadāśiba,
naja bāhāna caḍhithānte br̥ṣabha |
candradebatā nohai ẏe chāẏāpati
aruṇa sārathi nāhiṁ nāstikale mantrī |
ẏe yebe niśce huantā kāḷa anaḷa agni,
meṣa bāhana caṛhithāānteṭi puṇi |
ẏebi nuhanti puṇī caturmukha caturānana,
haṁsa bāhana caḍi pitā karante gabana |
yamadebatā hoileṭi thāāntā maiṁṣi,
kubera nohai ẏe aṭai kebaṇa deṇī |
bārānidhi nātha ẏeki aṭai ratnākara,
magara bāhāna nāhiṁ nāstikalā mantrībaraī [abaśiṣṭāśa paa pr̥ṣṭhāre]

lg.l: niuchāḷi kari ṭhākuraṁkara śrīmukha bege gheni | 44 |
bibhīṣeṇa bilā muṁ yuge yuge amara
āna ṭhākura ta na jāṇaiṁ mohora upara | 45 |
anya ke ṭhākura ho najāṇu ta āmi | 47 |
muhiṁ sāṁgrāme jagajjitā āna kāhākaiṁ na gaṇaiṁ | 48 |
ghaṭautkaṭa boile śrīrāma tretaẏā yuga abatāre
sūryyabongśe jāta hoile se daśaratha ghare | 49 |

lg.note: (pūbong pr̥ṣṭhara paṭhāntara)
kebaṇa carita ẏe kāhiṁki āgata,
thaẏe na yāṇilu ẏe keṁuṇa br̥ttānta |
śukasāraṇa kahile śuṇa āmara bāṇī,
svaẏaṁ jagannāthaṁkara dūta ẏe aṭai jāṇa puṇi |
ẏesaneka bichārante śuṇi laṁkāra saini,
dhātikāre rathanei ṭekilā ghaṭautkaṭa bīramaṇi |
jagatī upare bije karicchi laṁkapati,
dekhilā ghaṭautkara badana jyoti |

lg.l: se āpaṇe bijekari achanti indra praśaste
tohore śrīmukha dile se yibāra nimante | 54 |
śireṇa śrīmukha gheni sumarai śrīrāmacandra svāmī | 57 |
kāhāra kuḷe jāta se kāhuṁ utapatti | 59 |
tāhāṁkara tahūṁ tini puruṣe hoile utapanna | 60 |
āho candrara nandana se budha upujilā
bhrathara nandana ye he ilā bhmamanyu
tāhākaiṁ gheni gr̥habāsa kale śamburāṇa svāmī | 69 |
tāpatī tahuṁ upujilā kuru nāme ātmaja
dharma debatāṁka bīryye jāta yu jhaṣṭhi debarāẏe
bāsabara nandana se ye bīra phālaguni
hari arajuna ẏeka ātmā aṭanti ẏehu beni | 74 |
dropatī haraṇe darpa markile lakṣe rājāṁkara | 75 |
sāṁgrāme sari nohile deba īśvare śibagaṇa ahite | 76 |

lg.note: –bicitrabīryya kṣetr̥ṁ jāta paṇḍu dhr̥tirāṣṭi | [keteka pothi]

lg.l: āho tuta jāṇu śvetarājā yāgakalā satyayuge | 79 |
caubiṁśa baraṣa pariyante ghr̥ta baraṣilā yāgakuṇḍe apramite
tiniyuga pariyante madāagni ludu budu byādhi
brahmā biṣṇu maheśvara kehi dei nuarile mauṣadhi | 81 |
agni debatāṁku rakhile khāṇḍaba bana dahi | 82 |
aneka sāṁgrāma kale tahiṁ amarādhi maghabāna
ẏesaneka mahimāṁ tāhāṁkara śuṇa ho bibhīṣaṇa | 83 |
agni debatā madāagni pārikari pārtha hoile ubhā | 84 |
khāṇḍaba bana dahi agni debatāṁkara pārakale ludu budu byādhi
āho bibhīṣaṇa hanumantara tule arjunara bibāda
bhaẏe bhagnīki pradāna kale deba banamāḷī | 87 |
āho rājusī yagyaṁ āropaṇa kale yujheṣṭhi rājabeba
lakṣeka nr̥pati āsi caraṇe kale sebā | 88 |
se mahāyagyaṁ sabhare bāsudeba hoile ananta paṛhihārī | 89 |
se yujheṣṭhi mahā rājāṁkara tote loḍa nāhiṁ
baḍa baḍa rājāmāne sabhā dekhibāku napāi | 91 |
boile ẏe sambāda bibhīṣaṇa mora na dekhiba kiṁpāiṁ | 92 |
teṇukari āgyāṁ dile āsu se laṁkāra daṇḍadhārī | 93 |
jagannāthe kahile ye yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara āge
teṇukari yujheṣṭhi deba āgyāṁ dile turite | 95 |
boile hr̥daẏare tohora tāhāku ẏeḍe bhāba
śrīrāma draśane mora samasta kāryya siddhi | 98 |
svāmī tretaẏā yuthe ye bheṭilaiṁ tote
dvāpare dr̥śa svāmī hoibu ki nāhiṁ mote | 100 |
śrī rāmacandra kahile ye kahnā abatāre
āho mahapāruśa mantrī śrīrāma mote ẏesana chanti boli
nidābiṣṇu hastināre bijaẏe ẏebe muṁ bāratā pāili | 103 |
aneka utsuke saja hoile daita baḷa
bāhara hoile rākṣase ye yāhāra sanyabaḷa gheni | 106 |
se rathe bibhaṣeṇa samadaṇḍa gheni bijekala | 109 |
lakṣake śārddoḷa se yocila acchi rathe
atianta cañchaḷa se uḍanti gaganara pathe | 110 |
ẏekā praharaka uttāre śārddoḷa gale khedi | 111 |
lg.note: –dāśarathi kahile ye kahnā abatāre |–ḍa
–śrīrāmacandra kahile ye kr̥ṣṇa abatāre |–ka, pha
–nidābiṣṇu hastināre jannile ẏebe prtakṣe dekhili |–pha, gha
–nidābiṣṇu histikāre jannile mu sandeśa pāili |–jha, ṭa

lg.l: pabongtara prā ẏaka se asure kāmarūpī
na puṇa laṁghanti ẏe mānaba saini
bibhīṣeṇa dilā kumāra kaṇṭhe jaẏe ratnamāḷā | 120 |
satyayuge āditya dile rābaṇaku airi bidāraṇa maṇi
se ratnamāḷā bibhīṣaṇa ghaṭautkaṭaku dilā āṇi | 121 |
maṇira teja diśilā se bāḷaarka parāẏe | 122 |
lg.note:
–mandara pabongta yehne asura kāmarūpī
laṁkāgaḍa jiṇi naba kṣauuṇī baḷa byāpi –jha, ṭa
–kautuke bine karichanti rājusī yāga sabhāra |–jha, ṭa

lg.l: ẏekā dibasake gamilā uṇeiśa śata yojanare | 123 |
ratha tejyā kariṇa se bajrakapacara nāti
dakṣiṇa hāre ubhā hoilā raẏaṇī pāhānti | 124 |
dakṣiṇa dvāre dvārapāḷa gada ye kumāra | 125 |
ghaṭautkaṭa bilā dvāra chāḍa muṁ yibi bhitaraku
ẏeḍe baḍa badāmī rājāku bāḷuta putra kehne āṇi | 130 |
śuṇiṇa sānanda ye hoile debādhi debarāje
samadaṇḍa gheniṇa bibhīṣeṇa rājā bijekale debasvāmī | 132 |
aneka saina deba āṇile tāra tule

lg.note: –ẏeḍe sampada rājāku bāḷuta putra kehne āṇi–ṭa, jha, ḍha
–ẏeḍe dāmbhika rājāku bāḷuta pura kehne āṇi–ka
lg.l: ẏete baḍa mahāyāga āropiṇa nāśilu deba tuhi
sārantu yāga deba bibhīṣaṇaku na kahi | 134 |
svāmī lakṣerājā sainiki anna lāgai yete
ẏekā bibhīṣaṇa sainiku na aṇṭiba tete | 135 |
yadyapi laṁghibe se bratibe ki mānaba | 136 |
tuhi se bibhīṣaṇaku deba sañchaẏe aṇāilu | 137 |
śūnya bhmabane bhedi ẏekā pādake bhrami
indra praśasta sabhāẏe bijaẏe hanumanta svāmī | 143 |
lg.note: –tuhi se bibhīṣaṇaku deba āpaṇe aṇāilu |–ja, bong, ḍa
–tuhi se bibhīṣeṇa sanya aṇāilu–jha, ta, ḍha
–hastināku khinikhinā ye cauṣaṭhi sahasra yojana–tha, ḍa, gha, ja
–kṣaṇe sājilā tā kapibaḷa saini |–ka, jha, ṭa

lg.l: añjanāra nandana ye dekhilā tāhānta dūre
praṇapatya hoi bīra niuchāḷi kalāka chāmure | 145 |
sādhu sādhu mahiṁmā tumbhara yujheṣṭhi rājadeba
hanumanta boli śuṇi na dekhi naẏane
āho pābeni bibhīṣeṇa āsuacchi ṭhākuraṁkara kāryya arthe | 150 |
hanumanta boilā chāla ho yibā debarāẏe
bibhīṣaṇa āmbhara dekhādekhi nāhiṁ apāra samaẏe | 151 |
beni yojana pariyante deba galeka pāchoṭi

lg.note: –śrī jagannathe ẏehā sabu kale sadhi |–jha, ṭa
lg.l: śaṅkha catra gadā ye kodaṇḍa deba catrapāṇi
kāhe subarṇṇara betayoḍi ananta koṭi brahmāṇḍara śiromaṇi | 156 |
gatharu ohlāi bibhīṣaṇa praḷamba kalā dhātikāre | 157 |
tera yojana māḍiṇa yebaṇa baḷa rahiacchi
āho kemanta carita ẏethi acchi āsai laṁkapodā | 161 |
ẏe se dhaṁsila ho rābaṇara sampradhi
dr̥bhāra baḷa nāśa galāṭi ẏehāra buddhi | 162 |
acaḷa girimāḷa ẏe bahi āṇilā ẏehāra hr̥de
batiśa yojana uccharga dvādaśa yojana aguḷi | 164 |
ẏekā ghāntike ẏe bāndhilā ẏeḍe baḍa setu
ẏehāre śrīrāme ye pāile sabong hetu | 165 |
lg.note:
– pachare goḍāichanti binatā nandana |
caḷanti śrījagannātha jagata me hana–ṭha, na
–aguḷi=aṁguḷi
–ghāntike=ẏekārathake
–uguḷi=beṇī

lg.l: samare dineka rābaṇa tule hoilāka bheṭa | 166 |
rābaṇa lakṣmaṇakaiṁ māilā brahma ye śakati
laṁkāku niaiṁ boli dhailā yāiṁ dhāti | 167 |
hāboḍā ghāte rābaṇara mukharu bahai śroṇī
nirddaẏā bānara ẏehāku ke yiba biśvāse | 170 |
naśanta kāḷaku hoilā ẏebe biparīta upāẏe | 171 |
nirddaẏa laṁkā poḍā daẏā ẏehāra nāhiṁ
trāseṇa kampanti samaste hanumantara mukha chāhiṁ | 172 |
rakha rakha śrīrāma boli śaraṇa phukāri | 173 |
lg.note:
–“daṇanaha mukhare asure nei bhari” pare
‘tha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha:–
bho śrīrāma rābaṇaku māri āmbhaṁku rakṣākalu
puṇihiṁta āṇi hanumanta mukhe dilu |
ḍiṇḍima bajāi laṁkāra bhitare
āgyāṁ hoi tumbhe niścinte thāa asure |
amr̥ta bacanaku ẏebeheṁ āsiachuṁ
bahuta saṁkaṭa paḍilā rāma ralha bege ẏethuṁ |
trāhi trāhi boli asure bikaḷa |
śaraṇa pañjara bānātu rakhasi raghubīra |
–boki dianti asure daśanaha mukhe bhari |–ka, pa
lg.l: puṇa puṇa niuchāḷi ye karai bibhīṣaṇa
jaẏatu jaẏa raghunātha muṁ tohore śaraṇa | 174 |
kauśika bacane nātha tāḍakī darpa dhaṁsi
gaṅgā uddhāraṇa kalu nātha abhaẏe abināśī | 176 |
svāmī gautama śāpare ahalyā pāṣāṇa rūpa dhari
tohora śrīcaraṇe lāgante pāilā nija śarī | 178 |
kamaḷāra ballabha nātha praśurāma darpa gañji | 179 |
nandīgrāma maṇḍapa nātha citrakūta giri rakṣā
svāmī japāsura kumara khara dūṣaṇa triśirā
svāmī tohora rāge nāśagale ẏe tnibīrā | 182 |
sapataśāḷa bidāri nātha kalu khaṇḍe khaṇḍe | 183 |

lg.note:
–tohora caraṇe nātha bhāñjilā yogamudrā
=brahmāra bacane he uddharilu śunabhadra |–pa
=brahmāra nandana ye uddharilu sasrabhadrā |–gha, tha, jha, ṭa

lg.l: svāmī hanumanta ṭhākura mukhe mahimāṁ tora śuṇi
śaraṇa paśili deba mahimā tora jāṇi | 187 |
dahilu mahāanaḷe deba asura baḷa sanya | 188 |
svāmī duṣṭabaḷa dhaṁsiṇa laṁkāẏe mote thāpi
taba prasanne nātha hoili muṁ koṭikalpī | 190 |
svāmī muhiṁ tora caraṇe śaraṇa sakaḷa prastābe
tu se deba ādi anādi aṭu mīnarūpī
bāmana rūpa hoi pratigrahe dāna gheni | 195 |
ti se dānaba baḷa bidārilu sabongḷāḷe | 196 |
svāmī narasiṁgha rūpa dhailu hiraṇakaśipu nimante
jānure pakāiṇa deba bidārilu tīkha nahaghāte | 197 |
svāmī rāma abatāre mahimā tora dhanya
rābaṇaku nāśi ye aneka asura kari kṣaẏe
daẏācitte bho na tha tu mote kalu laṁkā rāẏe | 201 |
kahnā abatāre deba daḷilu kāḷīẏa kaṁsakeśī
svāmī ananta koṭi brahmāṇḍe yāhāra ananta mahimāṁ
catr̥mukhe saṁcapi yāhā kahi nuārilā bedabrahmā | 203 |
svāmī muhiṁ tohora dāsara dāsa aṭai bhr̥tyara bhr̥tya
janme janme tohoranāma mohora bighaṁsu kaṇṭhataṭa | 204 |
svāmī ihaloke paraloke mokṣaku ta taba nāma
arhaniśi bighaṁsu mohora hr̥daẏare śrīrāma śrīrāma | 205 |
akaḷita sāgara ẏe carita śrī mahābhāratha
itiśrī biṣṇu purāṇa muṁ ki kahite samaratha | 206 |
śrīrāma nāmagoṭi bhajana kara manara sānande
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsaku mukati karibe rāmacandra | 208 | 10690 |
lg.note: –tinimandā prāẏe hoi pr̥ṣṭhe tora lāgilā dharaṇī ka, pa |
–brāhmaṇa rūpa dhari dāna māgilu abanī | dha, jha, ṭa, pa
janme janme abhyāsa taba nāma mote hou parāpata | gha, pha, cha, ḍa, ja

lg.l: bilaṁka deśara nr̥pati ye baibasutamanu śreta | 1 |
śrī puruṣottamaṁka caraṇe śata sahasra daṇḍa pariṇāma | 2 |
svāmī tretaẏā yuge sebā kali ẏe tohora craṇe
dvāpare anugraha tu mote kalu nārāẏaṇe | 3 |
se svāmīra caraṇe seba ho biśrabāra tanujā | 6 |
muṁ tohora caraṇe deba aṭai śaraṇa | 7 |
ẏehāku dekhi sanya mohora kātara hele dūruṁ | 8 |
teṇu se bho deba kathāẏe māgai tuku
abhyarthī āgyāṁ muṁ māguacchi hanumanta ṭhākuraṁku | 9 |
lg.note: –se svāmira caraṇe yāiṁ karibāka pūjā | ja, tha, ṭha
lg.l: ẏe mohora tule chanti yeteka niśācara baḷa
ẏe dānaba baḷa sainiki ẏekā hnumanta aṭai kṣaẏekāḷa | 10 |
ẏehākaiṁ dekhi saini mora baḍāi kātara
añjanā nandana nātha sanya mohora rakṣākara | 11 |
tuho āpaṇe āsiachu yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara kāryye | 12 |
āho bhīmasena bolikari ye tāhāṁkara anuja
ẏekā jaṇake dhaṁsilā se mohora madhubane | 15 |
bānara mukhaṁ baratā pāiṇa muṁ ye karai mahāroṣa
ẏe chāri yugare muṁ aṭai mahābalī | 17 |
āho bibhīṣaṇa setu banddhalu āmbhe sātadine
aṣṭādaśa br̥nda saina gheni śrīrāmacandra āpaṇe | 18 |
bibhiṣaṇa boilā svāmī bānddhalā abā śare

lg.note: –tāhāra āgyāṁ ke laghiṁte sāmaratha | ka, ṭha
–suganddhakā haraṇe galāka bipine | na, ṭha, ṭa
lg.l: hanumanta boilā ho muṁ āpaṇe parīkṣa kali
biśvarūpa dhari bandha upare dhāpa dili | 21 |
ẏeka litāẏeka se na ṭaḷilā śarabandha
bibhīṣaṇa bole śara sahantā ki bhmale
āho bibhīṣaṇa draśana karibā chāla bege
chāmure binaẏa bhāba hoibuṭi bahuta bāge | 24 |
āho bibhīṣaṇa pratakṣe nirañjana se dharmarājā yujheṣṭhi
bābu yetemāna pāru pāṇḍabanta kara sebā
binaẏa bākye se kāraṇa acchiṭi re bābā | 27 |
tibhīṣaṇa sanyaṁku tu anna diasi tu āi | 28 |
ẏemāna se tote lāgai boli boile śrīpati | 29 |
āho bibhīṣana ṭhākuraku tote karāibā draśana
to tahuṁ ṭhākura muṁta na jāṇai āna | 32 |
26|2–kṣaṇakara madhyeṇa se śare śara bānddhalā bārānidhi | cha, tha
na puṇa yujheṣṭhideba kopa karai muku | 34 |
aneka tiārile deba bibhīṣaṇara hātha dhari
se dvāre dvārapāḷa ho ḷāḷindīra baḷā
pratakṣe nārāẏaṇa se batiśa guṇe kaḷā | 36 |
badeanti keśaba śuṇa ho dakṣiṇa dvārapāḷa
bhitaraku yibu āmbhe dvāra chāḍidia re bābu
kumāra boilā muṁ āgaṁ na paile
binā āgyāṁẏe dvāra chāḍi nuhaṁi mohora beḷe | 41 |
pūbong dvaraku caḷanti bhitare paśibā nimante | 42 |
bibhīṣaṇara āṇilā yete paṇidrabya lakṣeratha dhana | 43 |

div.note: –na puṇa praṇapatya ẏe nohai ṭhākuraṁku | gha, ja, jha
–dakṣiṇadvāre dvārapāla se satyabhāmāra bāḷā | pa, ṭa, jha
–tretaẏā yugara rājā ẏe śrīrāma abiṣekī | keteka pothi
–bibhīṣaṇa āṇilā yeteka pāṇi drabyamāna | na, ṭa, ḍha, pa, jha

lg.l: bhaṇḍāra adhikārīki bola ẏehā yatane thāu thoi
madhyasvargakaiṁ apūbng padārtha ẏehāloḍite na pāi | 44 |
svāmīra āgyāṁẏe daraśani lakṣe ratha dhananele
daśa ahibrata goṣṭha dohana houacchi gāī
nabatāḷa uccharge khīranadī ye yāuacchi bahi | 47 |
dekhiṇa āśraja hoile ye kumbhakarṇṇara sāna
aśi sahsra yoddhā ye achanti tāhāṁkara saṅga | 49 |
ye yāhara niyoga ye karanti āropaṇa | 51 |
dekhiṇa āśrija ye puṣya māḷuṇīra batsi
baḍāi durlabha dekhiṇa na phurai kicchi | 52 |
bābu dvāra chāḍidei pāraki re āmbhaṁku

div.note: thambhīhūta hoi tātu na phurai kicchi | ja, tha, ḍa

lg.l: āho bābu mīnaketana ẏe baḍa dharmika mahātamā
tepana yugara rājā ẏe mānaba uttamā | 55 |
āgyāṁẏe ailā ẏe yujheṣṭhi debaṁku dekhi | 56 |
ṭhākuraṁku jaṇāile se chāḍita pāgai bhitare | 58 |
śrījagannāthe boile ho bibhīṣana kemanta karibā
dekhi ḍaura dvāraku chāla bahanahoi yibā | 59 |
prate na yāi bibhīṣaṇa ẏeḍeka pratagyāṁ kahuṁ kahuṁ | 60 |
trailokye bandana yāhāra na ma goṭi | 61 |
āho bibhīṣaṇa mahā garuhaṁsi parama baiṣṇaba yujheṣṭhi debasvāmī
āna ke ṭhākura to tahuṁ ānaku na jāṇaiṁ | 63 |

lg.note:
“dekhi uttara dvāraku chāla badanahoi yibā” pāṭha pare
‘tha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha
birīṣaṇara hāthadhariṇa anantā
yujheṣṭhiṁka sampaḍa hari dekhānti samasta

dhārmika bibeka ye kaicchā jagajjeṭhi
hagata bandhana yāhāra nāmageṭi ka, gha, ḍa
–trailoka bandita deba tohora nāma seṭi jha, ṭa

lg.l: antargata bāratā tāra jāṇile deba padmnetre | 65 |
na puṇa yujheṣṭhideba pāānti ẏethe lajjā | 66 |
boile āḍo ho āḍa ho yāāntu ananta paḍhihārī | 69 |
śāmba kumara bijaẏe dutī indra jāṇi
anargha maṇimukuṭa śire jhalakai sūryya jāṇi | 70 |
nija svāmīṁki dekhi se uṭhilā dhātikāre
aneka bipuḷa bhoga bhmañja bābu ye tohora icchā | 72 |

lg.note: –argha maṇimukuṭa śire jhalakanti ratnamaṇi | ja, tha, pha
–argha maṇimukuṭa śire birānanti rudramaṇi | ka

lg.l: debāṅga basra pinddha ye trīḍāraṅga kari | 75 |
bhr̥tyajane beṛhi tahīṁ chāmara ye ṛhāḷi | 76 |
malli māḷatī ketakī ābara jāti yuti
amanātya pātra ye baḍa kumāra jenā
pāda śauca kari bijaẏe bhojanara sthāne
āho bibhiṣana rājāke lakṣamāḍha surṇṇe pailama yogāḍara
muṇohi ṭhābare bijaẏe rājāẏe baḍāi sambhare

lg.note: –sampūrṇṇa yubā sundarī susañcha agakṣarī |–tha,

–srāhāja kariṇa ye keśanta śukhai
bhaṇḍāru nabatana basranta byanti nei | ka, gha, pha, ḍa
–paṭāntara debaku nāhiṁ candramāra ārā–ja

lg.l: yugate anna deba bāsudeba yāha sañchi
deba pitr̥ samarpi bhmañjanti ati srae | 89 |
sādhu sādhu nārāẏeṇa boli hr̥de karai ghoṣaṇa | 90 |
bahuta bidhi sañchita amr̥ta rasa pāge
gorasa rasa nirmita agaṇita nānā barṇṇe piṭhā
triputi bākyeṇa deba jaṇe jaṇe samārji

lg.note: –debe triputi hvanti supaṁku anna khāi |–ṭa, jha
–debe bhogya karanti supaṁku anna dekhi |–ka, ḍa
–itara mātra loka ke pāriba upekhi |–a
–putra pautrī anna ke pāriba upekhi |–gha
lg.l: bibhīṣaṇa boilā ẏe keuṁṇa upaẏa mote
mukuiṁ agocara carita ẏe hoilā tohāri | 98 |
dahija he ile sabu uttiṣṭha patramāne | 101 |
kiṁpe pakāile subarṇṇa yogāḍa nei agāda jalare | 103 |
nabatana ye gāḍa lakṣe rājāṁku nityāpati bhiāṇa | 104 |
bibhīṣaṇa boilā svāmī ẏe baḍāi durlabha
āna yagyeṁ dekhilā nāhiṁ ta ẏesana sambhabong | 105 |
paaṁri kari bhumire ge maḷa chaḍā dyanti | 106 |
paida nīre goḷi gomaḷa charā dyanti | 107 |
lg.note: –yāhakaiṁ laẏe karichanti debatāẏe samaste |–jha, ṭa
–yāhāṁku sebā kariṇa thāānti jagte |–(tha)
–meruśuḷa rusiṁkara anaḷa naẏane |–ja, tha, na, ṭha

lg.l: se cherā paẏerā pakānti mukata nimante | 109 |
kāhākaiṁ gocara nāhiṁ ẏethi khaṭichanti gopye | 110 |
tahiṁra uparehiṁ karanti puṇi candana lepane | 111 |
puṇa tahiṁra upare bhmañji basanti saini
bibhīṣaṇakai gheni hari daṇḍeka hoile ubhā
bābu yujheṣṭhi tohora mahimā dhanya dhanya | 114 |
jānughaṇṭa pururabā beṇu nagheṣa dusyanta manadhātā | 115 |
praśurāma baḷī śvetabāḷī hari candana bhānuindra
kāḷanemi naḷa kauśika kehi pāḷita nuārile ẏesanaka sampada | 116 |
ẏeke ẏeke thile ẏeta mahā mahā raẏe

lg.note:
–jānughaṇṭa praśurāma naghoṣa ikṣvāku mānadhātā
baḷī bāḷī śveta haricandana naḷa kauśika bhīma bhānubanta |–pha
lg.l: śrī jagannāthe boile ho bibhīṣana āmbhara mahimāṁ dhani dhani
ẏeḍe baḍa sampada dekhuachuṁ ye ẏehu cakṣu gheni | 118 |
svāmī yadyapi arjilā ẏe dusaha sampade
tahūṁṇa caḷanti deba bibhīṣaṇa hātha dhari
ẏekā pāñcha nautike tinicaṭu tini sūpakāra
ẏe bidhi sahasreka sūpakāra ẏekā roṣua gharara | 122 |
ẏeka culī goṭāku kimpe tini brāhmaṇa bhiāṇa | 123 |
se nauti bhitare nei ḍhāḷibāka dhāti | 128 |
lg.note:
–śrījagannāthe boile bibhīṣaṇa mahimā tora dhani
ẏesaneka sampada dekhilu carma naẏana gheni |–ṭa, jha, gha

lg.l: caḷāu caḷāu tāra hāthe phuṭiṇa paḍile
se tiuṇagoti dhūma hoiba nā tāhāra hātha kaloḍhi | 130 |
āreka thiba nā tahiṁ caṭu gheni tāra āge
tāhāra hātha kāḍhile se caḷāiba bege | 131 |
mahā paṇḍita sahadeba mantrī kalā ẏe tribidha bhiāṇa | 134 |
atibege jaḷanti se śuhilā jāṇi sañchā | 136 |
āho bibhīṣaṇa akaṭā abaṭā kari paribā pūroi
cūlīre basāile se amr̥ta pāka hoi | 137 |
biśvanathaṁka pāiṁ rānddha paraśanti yesane gaurī
nārāẏaṇe toṣilā yehne lakṣmī ye śaurī | 138 |
satyayuge naḷa yehne amr̥ta pāka kari
doharā hiṅguḷā prasanne kṣaṇake samasta sampādanti | 140 |
nandanabanuṁ indra debatā diai phaḷa yogāṛamāna | 141 |
tinipadma nāba nandana banuṁ ailāka saje | 143 |
āhihuṁ brāhmaṇa chāṇḍāḷa yāẏe ẏekā āsane
ẏeheneka sarūpa kari tu bhiāilu debasvāmī | 148 |
samasta dekhāra ye caḷanti deba dāmobara
sāta kṣauṇī baḷa gheni rājā ye birāṭa
draśana karantā deba nohilāka kehi mote | 151 |
gobinde boile ho tu bhojana kāhiṁkari | 152 |
birāṭa boilā gosāiṁ moha chāraku kehu pucchi
sāta kṣauṇī baḷa gheni muṁ chatraśāḷe anna bhmañjuacchi | 153 |
āho birāṭa rājāku cihni pāru ṭiki | 155 |
birāṭa boilā se thāānti ṭhākuraṁka chāmure
muhiṁ kāhiṁ bheṭibi paśi na dianti bhitare | 156 |
muhiṁ tote saṁñchapi ye nuārili laẏekari debahari | 158 |
hīrā nīḷā baiḍuryya ye kehu anta pucchi
gaja aśvaṁkara pādaghāte māṭire gopya houacchi | 161 |
naba sahasra brathe achanti tāhā saṅgatare | 162 |
gobindaṁka katiki se na diai dr̥ṣṭi | 165 |
laṁkāra ṭhākura ẏe tepana yugara rājā
dvāra chāḍa bābu āmbhe yibu bhitaraku
puṇa puṇa binoẏī ye kahanti nārāẏaṇa
na śuṇai kumāra tāhāra garuhaṁsī paṇa | 169 |
ke tohora laṁkāgaḍara bibhīṣaṇa ke tāhākaiṁ jāṇi | 170 |
mahā mahā rājāẏe draśana na pānti ẏehu dvāre
āho bibhīṣana mahā mahā rājāẏe dvāre nuāranti yāi
indrapraśasta sabhāra bhaṇḍāra dvāre yāi miḷi | 175 |
mānage binda bije kariacchi bhaṇḍāra dvāre
batiśa koṭi yoddhā gheni baḍāi sambhare | 176 |
gobinde boile śuṇa ho iṁkāra ādhipati
anargha maṇi mukuṭa achai ẏehāra śire
ahaniśi ẏehāra kandharu na chāḍai lachī | 180 |
śaṅkha padmanidhi acchi ẏehāra beni karasthaḷe
pathara pāṇidrabya hoai ẏehāra kar alāgile | 181 |
chālanteṇa abeṇḍa ye subarṇṇa padma phuṭai
caurāśi guṇa lakṣaṇe ẏe atmāne mānagobindāi | 182 |
kṣaṇe mātra parama lakṣmī na chāḍai ẏehāra kandhu
pitāmātā kāhākāiṁ namaskāra kebeheṁ na bhāṣi | 184 |
sapata brahmāṇḍe ẏehāra mahimāṁ dhani dhani | 185 |
āho bibhīṣaṇa yujheṣṭhiṁka mahimāṁ kujha tattukari
bibhīṣaṇa boila tu sabong sañchita bāsudeba
ẏehāra hāthe dile bhaṇḍāra na sariba | 188 |
lg.note: –arkamaṇi mukuṭa achanti ẏehāra śire | jha, ṭa
–sapata dvīpe sapata brahmāṇḍa ẏehāra mahimāṁ jāṇi | ka, tha, pha
lg.l: gobinde boile āho bibhīṣaṇa tu yujheṣṭha deba ṭhākuraṁku dekhile
koṭiẏe janmara suphaḷa hoiba śrī carane sebile | 189 |
āho bibhīṣaṇa śata sahasra daṇḍa praḷamba houthibu
ṭhākuraṁkara āgyāṁ hoile tu bahana uṭhibu | 190 |
muhīm āna ṭhākura na jāṇai deba ẏekā jāṇai tote | 191 |
ẏeḍe baḍa badāmi rājāku kiṁpe āmbhe ẏethaku āṇilu | 193 |
ẏeta daṇḍa praḷamba nohai yujheṣṭha ṭhākuraṁka agrate
se mahāprabhma na puṇa kopa karanti mote | 194 |
gobinde boile bibhīṣaṇara āṇilā yete pāṇidrabya
driyodhana boila hari lakṣeka ratha thilā
ẏemanta kariṇa ẏehā sañchiachu ho bāsudeba | 197 |
svāmī debakaiṁ durlabha se rājusi yāgasabhā
bhaṇḍāra dvāre ghaḍiẏe rahilehari bibhīṣaṇaku gheni
ghaḍiẏeke dāna hoilā subarṇṇa bhāra mebaccha tini | 199 |
bibhīṣaṇa boilā dhanya jībana sādhu sādhu
pañchāśa sahasra tahiṁ lāgichanti ghaṭaṇa bindhāṇi
aḷakā kubera puruṁ bidyādhare dhana deuchanti āṇi | 202 |
bibhīṣanara saini bhmañji basichanti sarasvatī nadītīre
bhmañjanti rākṣasa baḷa yāhāra yete ichā
paraṣai pabeni tāhāra nāhiṁ ye upekṣā | 205 |
māruti samārjai āho na kara kehi bhīti
tuṣṭa hoi bhmañja tumbhe yāhāra yeteka triputi | 206 |
ḍareṇa bolanti gosāiṁ aṇṭilāṇi āu na de, na de | 208 |
bibhīṣaṇakaiṁ draśana karāibā nei ṭhākuraṁku jaṇāi | 210 |
bīrabara boilā deba daṇḍeheṁ raha ẏehta
brike dara ṭhkuraṁku yāiṁ kahai bārata | 211 |
bīrabara ḍāka diai ho ḍagara kāḷiñjana
bola laṁkā drīpara mājhi gheniṇa paḍhihārī ananta
bhīmasena prabeśa yāiṁ hoilā dakṣiṇa dvāre
āsu bibhīṣaṇa dvāra chāda he bīrabare | 216 |
ya a bolikari āgyṁ dilāka kumare
ẏe se bibhīṣaṇa ho laṁkāgaḍara nātha | 219 |
śrabaṇe yāhā śuṇilu pratakṣe dekhilu nārāẏaṇa | 223 |
ẏehāra se piāra ho biśrabā mahāruṣi | 224 |
pūbong puṇyara baḷe dekhilu rājusi yāgasabhā
rābaṇaku badha karāilā śrīrāmare śaraṇa paśi
debakāryya kalā ẏe jānakī ballabha toṣi | 229 |
tu praḷamba hoithibuṭi ṭhākuraṁkara caraṇa agrate | 231 |
aneka tapa ye kariṇa achu pūbonge
hr̥dagate boilā muṁ tote jāṇa debahari | 234 |

lg.note: –tretaẏā yugara rājā dekhilu bibhīṣaṇa |-[gha, tha, ja]

lg.l: kākhe hātha lāi ubhā hoile janārddana | 237 |
abadhāri hoibā deba bibhīṣaṇa draśana karuacchi | 238 |
āpaṇe tinibaccha taḷe deba sutile gaḍaghāli | 240 |
dekhiṇa āśrija ye laṁkā gaḍara ādhipati
niropi chāhaṁi se yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara mr̥tti | 241 |
bichārai bibhīṣaṇa ẏeta nuhaṁi sāmānya jaṇa
mādha sādhu bibhīṣaṇa boli samante dhani bhāṣi | 245 |
mantrīpaṇe tote kehi na hiṁnā samasari
nohileṇa rābaṇa smpada kehu pārai hari | 246 |
tuhi se mahātamā ye jāṇu sabongbuddhi
tepana yugara āṣya pāilu mahāmantra sādhi | 247 |

lg.note: –pratikṣaṇa-pradakṣiṇa-bandanā |
–tretaẏā yugara āgya pāilu mahāmantra sādhi- | (ja)

lg.l: gobinde boile bibhīṣaṇa śire hātha dei
āgahuṁ na uṭhibuṭi tote ṭhākuraṁka āgyāṁ nāhiṁ | 251 |
svāmī laṁkāgada mājhiẏe tepana yugara bibhīṣaṇa
āṣya ārogya śarīra hou uṭha rājadebe | 255 |
gobinde boile tu uṭha ho madvārājā
ẏe yebe yugateṇa mānaba janma huantā
saṁcaẏe jaḷi yāāntāni ẏehāra nija kāẏe
yujheṣṭhi debaṁka śrī caraṇārabinde kalāka bandana | 260 |
lg.note: –aṁśā abatāre ẏe aṭai dharmarāẏe–cha, ḍa

lg.l: paṇḍu svargagalā boli ākāśe śubhilā bāṇī
jaẏa jaẏa śabada śubhai sāhera ghoṣa jāṇi | 266 |
dharma prāpata hou boli boile sabongmuni | 267 |
lakṣerājā śrotā bakatā byāsa maha yati | 270 |
pāreśvara nandana se bedabyāse hoichanti bakatā
jautuke kahile yubanāśva rājāra yāgyaṁra bāratā | 271 |

lg.note: –śakati nirañjana duheṁ harirasa gheni |–gha, ghaṁ
–śakati nirañjana duheṁ bhabamāsa gheni |–jha, ṭa

lg.l: byāsaṁkara bacane grantha phele deba śukabrahmā
hari śaṁkara boli ye tāhāṁkara śiśu | 278 |
hari śaṁkara nandana ye hoile somapā
barṇṇānikara nandana ye kumbha nāmeṇa kahili | 289 |
kākusthara nandana ye kaustubha nāme rājā | 291 |

lg.note: –amujā–aśupā |
lg.l: se yubanāśva rājāra putra ye nohilā
satyayuge aputrika hoi se benilakṣa baraṣa rājyakalā | 311 |
tadyāpi putra na pāilā yubanāśva nr̥pati | 312 |
aneka trodha rājā hoilā putra dukhe

lg.note: –nānā dāne rājā hoilā bata puṇya |–[gha]
–dāna sāgare helā śāhāsre yete dharmamāna |–(gha)
–ābara deba śāhāsre yeteka puṇyadharma |–(ka)
lg.l:
314|–bahu tīrtha buli rājā kalā paryyaṭana
aneka pūjā karila debatā brāhmaṇa |–ṭha
ẏe jaḷa ghaṭagoṭi nei yubanāśva rājāṁku | 321 |
se dina yubanāśva mr̥gaẏā binoda kari
bane na pāilā paṇḍājība hariṇa mr̥ga loḍi | 324 |
śuṇa ho mahāmantrī śrame bahija mora kāẏe
tramanteṇa pāṇighāṭa loḍi na pāila kahiṁ | 327 |
lokāloka giri yāiṁ se bheṭilā nikaṭe
dekhilā agrabr̥kṣa ḍāḷe acchi susañcha jaḷaghaṭe | 328 |
se jaḷaghaṭa gheniṇa mantrī ailāka bege
ati yatne dilā tāhā yubanāśva āge | 329 |
se jaḷa piiṇa rājā heilā manatoṣi | 330 |

div.note: –se jaḷaghaṭa yāka tr̥ṣāẏe rāẏe grāsi |–gha, cha, na
–se jaḷaghaṭa yāka sāhasake śoṣi |–pha

lg.l: dhātā boile yāa tu lokā loka giri śikhare
se jaḷa bhakṣile putra heba abhaẏa baḷabantā | 334 |
br̥kṣa upare loḍile tahiṁ nāhiṁ mahāmantra jaḷaghaṭe | 335 |
na pāi caśiṣṭhe ye bāhuḍi aile | 336 |
svāmī lokāloka śikhare ta na pāli loḍi | 337 |
na puṇi dānabe tāhā neleka apahari | 338 |
yāa yā baśiṣṭha tu yubanāśva rājara tahīṁki
bongśaku kāraṇa hou tu putraku kara rakṣā | 344 |
bichārai mahārāja kebaṇa carita mohora garbhabyādhi
brahmāra mahāmantra se garbhare bahilā acchi
mantra mauṣodhire ki se yāi ghuñchi | 348 |
tesaneka sarūpe garbhe rahilā acchi baḷā | 349 |
mahabaiṣṇaba se ye kumāra atīẏa baḷabantā
baśiṣṭhe boile rājā na kara mauṣodhi
garbheṇa tohora āna kicchi nāhiṁ byādhi | 353 |
āho tu yahuṁ debatā brāhmaṇe na thapilu
santati jaḷaghaṭa se utapatti kale yagyeṁ
yatane thoile nei lokāloka giri agrabr̥kṣa agre | 355 |
lg.note: “mantrī mauṣodhire ki se yāi ghuñchi” pare ‘ka’pothire adhika pāṭha–
aneka mauṣodha karai sūryyabongśī
bidhi bidhāne byādhi hoile sina huantā bināśa |–?
lg.l: tu yebaṇa dine galu mr̥gaẏā binode
jaḷa na pāi rājā basilu biṣāde | 356 |
mahāśrame kari rājā piilu se pāṇi | 358 |
dhātāra mahamantra se kāhiṁki yiba nāśa
muhiṁ pache marai mohora hoiba nandane | 360 |
mātāra garbhe sinā putrakaiṁ ṭhāba acchi
mahā cañchaḷā se bistīrṇṇa tāhāra kukṣi | 362 |
pitāra śakye ki pārai tāhā rahi
mahājvāḷā pāi rājā śarira hoẏe bahi | 363 |
biṣṇu purāṇa pothi ye pheḍile śukabrahmā
kāśīthāne go dohana kaleka lakṣe dheku
maha baḷabantā kumara ye bulai garbhara bhitare | 369 |
loḍai kumāra ye na pāiṇa dvāra
kumbha śukaḷa cauṭhi dina ratilā rājāra garbhe
aśiṇa māsa śukula pakṣa cauṭhīra tithi
gara nāmare karaṇa saubhāgya nāme yoga
rātra deḍha prahare ye budhara beḷabhoga | 374 |
chāḍilā jība ātmā ye pāilā svarga bāsa | 376 |

lg.note: se mānadhātā hoilā saẏaḷe uttamā (ḍha)
lg.l: satyayuge rajyakalā rāja lakṣe ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra baraṣa
nabadvīpa sapata sāgare tāhāra teja ye aprakāśa | 382 |
śuṇa ho mahārājā se mānadhātāra mahimāṁ
naba dvīpe ẏekāṅga rāja se hoilā upamā | 383 |
ādi saṁsāre dhanu ẏeka sañchile śatamanu
nacalakṣa baḷa se ye ajaṅganāme dhanu | 384 |
ẏekā nārājake sehu sapta dīpa sādhi | 385 |
se rāja mahāyagyaṁ kalā bilaṁkara deśe
yāgaśāḷa utsarga hoilā ye arddha ākāśe | 387 |
baḷībeṇu mānadhātā jānughaṇṭa praśurāma haricandana nr̥pati | 388 |
satyayuge satama lakṣa aṭhāiśa sahasra bagaṣa
ẏeḍe gaḍa yāgata na kale puṇi kehi | 391 |
nīḷaghana medura svāmī nīḷa barṇṇa kaḷā | 395 |

lg.note: pūradig medura bapu nīḷendī daḷa kaḷā | (ja)
lg.head:
{@yudhiṣṭhiraṅka darśane birāṭa rājāṅka
apamāna@}

lg.l: ẏethu uttāre kisa hoilā kahibā rasabāki | 1 |
svāmī pacchima digara rājā birāṭa tāra nāma
mote draśana karāa boli bobi pāḍai abicchanna | 4 |
bhīmasena jaṇāile yāi śrī jagannāthaṁka pāṇe
svāmī birāṭa paḍiacchi tahiṁ pacchima dvāra pradeśe | 5 |
bho byāse birāṭa āsi loḍai yujheṣṭhideba tahiṁki | 6 |
byāse boile ho śuṇimā śrī raṅgai
birāṭa kathā hari tote se lāgai | 7 |
ẏe saẏaḷa jana cintāmaṇi nātha bāñcchā ye paẏodhi | 8 |
yemante birāṭa na dekhai temante kari dekhā
bipada kāḷe pāṇḍabaṁku nāhiṁṭi āna sākha | 9 |

lg.note:
tu deba jagatabhuta saẏaḷa jana rakṣā
banabāse pāṇḍabaṁku birāṭa hoiba sākhā | [keteka pothi]

lg.l: byāsa bāsudebaṁka bacane mahā roṣita ye bhīma
bāuna bāuna bhāra gadā bulāi neni hāthe
boile durāpada kopa kāhāku kale bhīma
dhātikāre prabeśa hoile yāiṁ sabhāra pacchimadvāra | 16 |
dvāre ubhāhoi ḍāka diai pabanara chāṭa
āre magha matsadeśa rājā kāhiṁ achu birāṭa | 17 |
birāṭa trāsilā ye kaṭāḷa mr̥tti dekhi | 18 |
chāmureṇa prabeśa hoilā mantrī ya cakeśvara | 19 |
brikodara boilā re tuhi ki se matsa ādhipati
karayeṛi yācakeśvara boila bho deba muṁ maghadeśara mantrī | 20 |
lg.note:
–tatakṣaṇe āgyāṁdile śrīnibāsa
taḍabaḍa kari ho birāṭaku gheniāsa | [keteka pothi]

–khara caraṇare birāṭaku gheniāsa
āṇante śarīre cetā na thibati sāhasa keteka pothi]
–dhātikāre tripaṇḍa se gaḷai atitama |–(jha, ṭa, gha)
lg.l: brikodara boilā birāṭaku āṇa mora chāmuku
tāhāku āgyāṁ hoilā re chāmuku nemāku | 21 |
apaḷa bhrānti phiṭilā śuṇi matsadeśara svāmī
tāhāra drśana kalā āsi hoilā tinidina | 25 |
ẏeḍebaḍa abagyāṁ kiṁke keuṁṇa darpe dambha
nikaṭa rājā hoi tora ẏeṛeka biḷamba | 26 |
āho birāṭa parā kīṁceka tohora śaḷā
mama śrīmukhaku sehu puṇi nindā kariacchi
birāṭa bilā deba se duṣṭa prakr̥ti | 28 |
birāṭa boilā deba se duṣṭa prakr̥ti
svāmī caturtha dibasa hoilā muṁ aili sabhāsthāna | 30 |
bhīmasena boilā tu śuṇa ho birāṭa
anna bhojana kemante karanti tora thāṭha | 31 |
sāta kṣauṇī baḷa gheni muṁ chatraśāḷe karai bhojana | 32 |
lg.note: –pañchāśa bhāra subarṇṇa neiṇṭha sambaḷa | (ṭha)
–tretaẏā yugara rājā laṁkāgaḍara bibhīṣaṇa |–[tha]
–atimūrkha lokamkara doṣa mahate tejanti |–[tha]

lg.l: svāmīṁku draśane tuhi kisa achuṁ āṇi | 33 |
svāmī kiñchita mātra muṁ aṭai kiṁkaramati
parara bitta tahuṁ ẏeteka gheniachuṁ chaḍāi | 36 |
nachāḍu maṁda prakr̥ti tohora ẏeḍeka abagyāṁ | 37 |
āho birāṭa śatebhāra pāṇidrabya āṇilu tohora parārājā
āho birāṭa tohora pāiṁ ye guhāri karicchi trigartta
tāha na śuṇu āmbhe tohora nimitta | 39 |
tu tahiṁki agalu ho aśuddha mandabhābe
āsa tote ghāntiẏe draśana karāibā hāde ẏebe | 40 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ kopita se paṇḍu rājāra suta
āreka hātha nei tāra dilāka kaṭibhāge
ārate bolai gosāiṁ mohora achai kisa doṣā | 43 |

lg.note: jiṁcite dekhā āṇi tora ẏeḍeka gāramā – [ka]

lg.l: āho biḷamba hoilā birāṭa āsibā samaẏe nāśagalā prāṇe | 46 |
thokāẏe boile ho ẏe bratiba chāmuku gale
mr̥tyuyoga nāhiṁ ẏehāra ṭhākura draśana kale | 47 |
aprādhahiṁ se birāṭaku mr̥tu nāhīṁ āja | 49 |
śrī jagannāthaṁkara badana chāhiṁle byāsa mahāmuni
bho māẏādhara birāṭa yujheṣṭhiṁki yebante na cihni | 50 |
sudarśana catra deba antarikṣe dile peśi
birāṭa chāmure śūnye bulāile se āsi | 52 |
ẏekeṇa ātreṣi tahīṁ āṇuacchi bīra bhīmā
gobinde boile maghadeśa matsadeśa rājā aṭai birāṭa
āho birāṭa uṭha uṭha boli bolanti dharmabatsa
bijuḷi teja prāẏe diśailā mudi matsa | 57 |
birāṭa boila gosāiṁ dekhilaiṁ śrīcaraṇa pādapr̥ṣṭha | 59 |
gobinde boile ẏe moṛhā birāṭa baḍa dvandī
āpaṇāra gotra teji śaḷāra gotra bandi | 60 |
bāhāra karidia ẏehāku sabhāre na basā | 61 |
birāṭa rājāku nei chāḍilā bāhāra dvāra | 62 |
abicchanne dānadhyāna ye yeteka padārtha māgi
aṣṭaratna muḷe dianti yāhāku yete lāgi | 65 |
icchāẏe ye yetebeḷe magai ye anna
yete icchā tete se karanti bhojana | 66 |
āstāna upare uṭhile dhr̥ṣṭa ye dyumana | 67 |
lg.note:
–gobinde boile ẏe moṛhā birāṭa mandabāi
āpaṇāra gotra buḍāi śaḷāra āśre bratai |–[ka]

lg.l: srūpe diśanti se brahmāra putra prāẏe | 68 |
loṭaṇi juḍā se ye hoiṇa kuśahātha
yujheṣṭhi debe dekhi mastake dile hātha | 69 |
kara prasāri kalyāṇa kale dhr̥ṣṭa ye dyumane

lg.head: {@dhr̥ṣṭadyumnaṅka pubongjanma bibaraṇī@}
lg.l: āho, manu succhākale tu ho śuṇa caitana
atuṭa sabonggyaṁ puruṣa tu aṭu sādhu brahmagyāna | 1 |
muhiṁ se kṣaẏe hoi tuhi se akṣaẏe
muhiṁ se karai bhaẏe tu aṭu nirbhaẏe | 2 |
mana bole caitana tu biṣṇu purāṇa śuṇa | 3 |
bahuta gahana ẏe durlabha śāhāsra bāṭa
sthaḷa anta na pāi hāde nohili nikaṭa | 5 |
boilu tu yebe kathāẏe kahilu ẏebeheṁ
ke ẏehā samprate kariba ẏeḍeka sandehe | 6 |
boilu ye trailokya bandana karuachanti yāhāra pāde
lakṣeka nr̥pati yāhāra caraṇa taḷe loṭi
mukuṭa śikhare basuacchi yujheṣṭhiṁka pāda aṅguṣṭha | 8 |
ẏe dvāpara yuge yāhāra ẏesaneka mahimāṁ

lg.note: –ẏekata=ẏekatva |
–śukḷāmbara śarīra tāhāra pratakṣe nirañjana ātmā |–ḍa

lg.l: manu boilā tu ye śāhāsra nindākaru
muhi se akṣaẏe tuhi ẏehimanteheṁ maru | 11 |
samasta sulabha ẏe śāhāsra tatva kathā
mattagabong bhābe tu nindu thāu sarbathā | 12 |
na icchu tapadharma lobhe hou bhogī
atuṭa śarīra goṭiki tu karāu teṇu rogī | 13 |
lobheṇa pātaka tora mohora kisa doṣa | 14 |
ẏekalaẏa kari tu śrī mahābhāratha śuna 15 |
tu ye boilu se ye aṭai baḍamanda
yujheṣṭhideba abā na jāṇi dile hātha
svāmī sandeśa kathāẏe tote pachārai nanotha | 20 |
lg.note: –yujheṣṭhi beba abā na jāṇi hele andha |–(jah, ṭa, pha)

– yujheṣṭhi deba karasthaḷe hātha diante
dhr̥ṣṇadyumana kalyāṇa kale karapātre |–[gha, cha, pha]
lg.l: svāmī lakṣeka nr̥apti yāra caraṇare bande
yujheṣṭhi deba boile hari se dropatīṁakra jyeṣṭhabhrātha
teṇukari ẏehānta namaskāra ye aṭai bihita | 23 |
āho caitana chāmure jaṇāile deba hr̥ṣīkeśa
kākhe śuka brahmāẏe gheniṇa purāṇa śāsra pothi
bhāriyā jyeṣṭhabhrāthakaiṁ namaskāra acchi ki śāhasa yugate | 26 |
deba putr̥ prāẏe juāiṁ bhaṇajāṁku gaṇi | 31 |
lg.note:
–biṣṇunātha bhraśane yete phaḷaśr̥ti
bhaṇajā juāiṁ ādarile pitr̥loke pāānti gati |–jha, ṭa, ka

lg.l: ẏehānta bhojana karāile lakṣe brāhmaṇa phaḷaśr̥ti | 32 |
amokṣa loka mokṣa huanti pāda udaka paḍile | 33 |
āho caitana purāṇa bāṇī ye ẏesaneka śuṇi
ẏeḍeka darpa tohora āre dropadara putra
bhāriyāra ḍare yujheṣṭhi deba mastake dile hātha | 35 |
tu chāra pāmarare tohora ẏeḍeka bharasā
bichāranti dhr̥ṣṭadyumana niśce hoiba prāṇe nāśa | 37 |
ẏeḍe baḍa sabhāre dharma biartha hoiba | 38 |
byāsaṁka caraṇe nei dile pādāarghya goṭi | 40 |
dropada putra dhr̥ṣṭadyumanaku ṭhākure kehne kale namaskāra | 41 |
bho gurudeba bhrātha mora nāśa yāucchi ẏe mahāsabhāre | 42 |
lg.note: –ẏeḍe baḍa sabhāre caḍaka paḍiba |–jha, ṭa, ḍha
lg.l: svāmī trailokye asaṁkhya yebaṇa debara kaicchā
nārāẏaṇa koparu mo bhrāthaku kara rakṣā | 43 |
tāhāṁkara ballabha ho aṭanti rudra ye debatā | 45 |
ẏekabarṇṇa pāṭoḷi basra pañchāuna koṭi śāḍhī
kaḷapeka basilā se sakaḷa moha chāḍi | 46 |
patnīra abhābe se deba ye dhūrjaṭī
uttara bhodo nakṣatra yoga ye sukarmī | 48 |
utpati nāme sambacchara parigha nāme kāḷa
dekhilu ṭiki asatī tohora mātā ye kapiḷā | 51 |
ẏekai śr̥ṅgāra deba sabuṁkuhiṁ kimpā bhaṇḍa | 52 |
lg.note: –bhakaḍi, uttarasa, ucita, utathya, tithi, uttaratithi prabhr̥ti sambaccharatra nāma acchi |
–baraṣa, barehā, brahma o byāghāta prabhr̥ti kāḷara madhya nāma acchi |

lg.l: saṁsāre asatī kimpā na bolibe mote | 53 |
ālo ẏeḍeka kathā tu kiṁpā boilu ẏekabaḷā | 55 |
pañchuātmā pañchuṣaṇḍa hoi mote achanti ge ḍāi | 56 |
tu ẏehā bujhita nuāilu ẏekabaḷā pābongtī
bichāra na kari boilu mātā mora aṭai asatī | 57 |
agyāne boilu lo mote dūṣita kathā
kapiḷā boile īśvara tumbhe bhuta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā
dr̥ṣṭire dekhi kahilu ẏe dubonguddhi bāratā | 60 |
pāñchāḷī rūpe hoa tu dropada hohita
īśvara tohora bhrātha hou mohora śāpe | 62 |
se ẏekabaḷā pābongtī saṁjata rūpa dhari | 63 |
lg.note: :–saṁsāre asatī kimpā na bolibe mote pare ‘ja, tha’ pothire adhikā ekapada pāṭha–

sundarī stirī dekhile puruṣa huanti baśya
se sugyaṁ yubatī purābanti mana āśa |–(ja, a)
–se ẏekabaḷā phabongtī śacī rūpa dhari |–(ṛha, cha)

lg.l: bhuta rusiṁki ye māile ākāśa bibāde
pañchaṭhāba kariṇa ye thoile pañchu ātmā
dhr̥ṣṭadyumane jāta se rudra abatāra svaṁẏe
dhr̥ṣṭadyumane yujheṣṭhihuṁ baḍa aṭanti yuga chāri | 71 |
teṇukari namaskāra kale yujheṣṭhi deba sāna | 72 |
mahā kalpa bañchānta yebaṇa byāsaṁkara buddhi
svāmī tohora abhimāna deba na pārai sahi
dropatī boile mora ẏeṇe kāryya nāhiṁ | 76 |
śuṇa ho caitana badanti muni mahagyāṁtā
ẏe duhiṁkari prasanne se bhāratha yuddha maṇḍi | 80 |
byāsaṁkara bacane hari hoile parama śānti
satya dharma prāpata amr̥ta rasa bāratā

lg.head:
{@ẏekaśata ratha subarṇṇa māgibā nimante
yudhisṭhiraṅka nikataku śiśupāḷara gamana@}
lg.l: āho yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara aneka sampada dekhi
kemante nāśa karibā yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara dharme | 3 |
bāuna bhāra bhaṇḍāra se driyodhana acchiṭiki pāṇidrabya | 4 |
ẏeṇe se kaṣaṇa ho karibā āmbhe rahi | 5 |
śateratha pāṇidrabya māga yujheṣṭhi deba ṭhākuraṁku | 6 |
aneka haraṣa ye he ilā bīramaṇi | 8 |
āre kāḷiñjana bāratā kara yāiṁ ananta paḍhihārī
bola cedi deśara rājā damaghṣara putra
ẏe yujheṣṭhira mahāyāge dāridra mora yiba
pāṇidrabya śate ratha mote ẏehikṣaṇi deba | 12 |
kalā kr̥tahiṁ nāśa hoiba tāhāra dharmanaba | 13 |
bho deba śiśupāḷa rāja hoilā daridrabasī
śateratha deba se ye māgai pāṇidrabya
na dile deba āhuti se dūṣaṇa kariba | 16 |
āre ẏe kathā kaha yāiṁ bhaṇḍāra nāẏeka driyodhanaku | 17 |
āho bhaṇḍāra adhikārī bhīmasena ṭhākuraṁka dr̥ḍhabāṇī
bāāna bhaṇḍāre dhana nāhiṁ dekhāilā gāndhārīra bāḷa | 21 |
lg.note: –ṭhākuraṁka āgyāṁẏe ẏehā bahana karideba |–[jha, ṭa, ḍha]

lg.l: āna dhanamāna ki heba apūbong mukuiṁ | 22 |
tu yāhā dekhilu tāhā bhīmasenakaiṁ jaṇā | 23 |
tatakṣaṇe kāḷiñjana caḷai ye bhīmasena chāmuku
svāmī driyodhana sakaḷa bhaṇḍāra dekhāilā śiśupāḷaku | 24 |
samasta nāsti kalā se dhanamānanta chāhiṁ | 25 |
bāratā pāiṇa se ye pabana ātmaje
svāmī śiśupāḷa kaṣaṇa kari loḍai āmbhaṁku | 29 |
muiṁ yāiṁ dekhili bhaṇḍāreta nāhīṁ bhāreka ādikari | 30 |
kehi na jāṇibe ye pāṣāṇa kaḍhibu | 32 |
lg.note: –svāmī driyodhana sakaḷa bhaṇḍāra dekhāilā antabīcche śiśupāḷaku |–ṭa, jha, cha
lg.l: bāuna bhaṇḍāre tu bharibu yatna kari
bho deba pāṣāṇa āṇi pūroili bhaṇḍāre
kehi tāhā jāṇantā nāhiṁ nohiṁ nohilā sabhāre | 36 |
ki bolu śiśupāla tu kāhiṁki māgu dhana
āmbhara sodara hoi ẏeṭhāku hoilu bhārjana | 39 |
yujheṣṭhiṁki dhana māgileta nāhiṁ mora lāja | 40 |
pāṇidrabya yebe māgai ẏehāku śatebhāra dosi | 42 |
dekha ho śiśupāḷa ẏe apūbong pāṇidrabya | 46 |
gobindaṁka bacane driyodhana kare pūroiṁ dei
pathare kara lāgante se pāṇidrabya hoi | 47 |
ẏekā bhaṇḍāru pūroi śate ratha dilā
atuṭa bhaṇḍāra tahuṁ koṇeheṁ na sarilā | 48 |
dekha ho manu puruṣa śrīhariṁka mahimāṁ
daradra phiṭilā tohora triputi hoi yā y | 50 |
mana boilā tu ho caitana śuṇa
ye se driyodhana se pannagā nāraẏaṇa | 52 |
pāṇidrabya hoai kara lagile māṁkraḍā pathare | 53 |
kāhakaiṁ namaskāra se na karai bidhi
baile na sarai dhana abaẏe bārānidhi | 55 |

lg.head: {@jaẏasiṁha daitya badha@}
lg.l: caitana toṣa hoiā mana bacana śuṇi
se bāratā pāilā rājusi yagyaṁra dharma | 6 |
jaẏasighaṁ agrate kr̥tāntaka mantrī ta kahilā
ẏeḍebaḍa rājāhoi tote yāgare baraṇa na kalā | 7 |
rājusi yāga ye yujheṣṭhi deba kalā
rājusi yāgaku rāja na barila yugate | 10 |
ẏeḍe baḍa rājāku kiṁpe abaraṇa kari | 11 |
bāte kadaḷī patra jāṇi kampai tāra aṅga | 12 |
lg.note: –kahasi sakaḷa dharma amr̥ta rasa bāśī |–ka
lg.l: mantrīki āgyāṁ dilā se pratāpī danuja
boila jaẏa siṁgha daṇḍa mohorare sāja | 13 |
samadaṇḍa sāja yibāiṁ rājusi yāga sabhāku
bhāñjaibaīṁ mahāsabhā ke abā pāru rakhu | 14 |
ratha gaja aśva pādānti samasta sajakalā | 15 |
tinipadma ratha ye batiśa padma hāthī
ṣāṭhiẏe sāgara aśva gaurāśi kṣauṇī pādānti | 16 |
nārada muni yāiṁ kahile bāsaba debatāṁku
na puṇa dhāḍi diai tohora amara svarge
hara udyāna bane bāsaba yāiṁ luci
jaẏasiṁgha daṇḍa dekhi debatāẏe svargaru gale ghuñchi | 22 |

lg.note: –chālanteṇa thāṭha ye śubhai bajrabāṇa |–(jha, ṭa)

lg.l: asañchepa baḷa tāra asaṁkhya gaja ratha | 29 |
jaẏasiṁgha rājaku tu na kalu baraṇa | 30 |
jaẏe siṁgha rājāra se mahāthāṭha bekhi
sabhāre gamaka paḍilā jaẏasiṁghara āgata śuṇi | 34 |
ghana ghana bāratā kahanti gagana chāraloke

lg.note:
–“teṇu kari daṇḍa saji āsai palāda” pare jha, ṭa, ḍa pothire
bhinna pāṭha |–
debatāmāne rahi nuārile svargapure
hari mahā bismaẏa hoi mahayagyaṁśāle |–jha, ṭa, ḍa

lg.l: samastaṁkara bikaḷa ye jāṇile deba hari
jaẏasiṁgha bāhilā pātha tu kemante bichāru
arjuna boilā deba tahīṁki na kara cintā
ẏe mahāyāgaku hāde tuhi se rakhantā | 41 |
gobinde boile tuhi ye bahuta pratagyāṁbahu
arjuna boilā deba ẏe gosiṁghara huai kisa
jagannāthe boile ho ẏe aṭai tāhāra śiṣa | 45 |
arjuna boile deba ẏeki gosṁghahuṁ pratāpī
moho caritra ki deba na jāṇuṁ adyāpi | 46 |
nārāẏaṇa boile tohora asaṁkhya ye kathā
ẏe rājāmāne jāṇanti ki tahiṁra bāratā | 47 |
sāṅgare hanumantaku nibā ki ho phālaguni | 48 |

lg.note: –tretaẏā yuge bhāroi malla hanumanta |–(ta, jha, pha)
lg.l: ẏe dvāpara yuge deba bhāroi malla muhiṁ
tumbhe yaga carachā kara mūṁ tāhāku bheṭai yāiṁ | 50 |
arjunaku bainetra ho basāa tora piṭhi | 52 |
kāśī nadītīre arjuna yāiṁ tāhākaiṁ bheṭi | 55 |
asura baḷa dekhi se garuḍa rābadilā
trailoka hāndoḷa hoi se khageśvara raḍi
asura baḷa niśodhana ẏe pratakṣe bāsudeba
ẏehāra mukhe paḍi kehi na bratiba | 60 |
bāhāna caḍhi kebaṇa jana ailā kāhiṁki | 61 |
raṇe ajaẏa ẏe kṣatrī kuḷeṇa aḍimā | 63 |
jaẏasiṁgha tahiṁki arjuna galani tumbhe nohi birasa bhāba | 64 |
mārakaṇḍa boile jaẏasiṁgha caurāśi kṣauṇī sanya
gosiṁgha putraku arjuna samāna nohiba kṣatrīpaṇe | 66 |
sābahāne śuṇa tumbhe pūbongra kathā khaṇḍe | 67 |
āhe gosiṁgha bolikari ẏehāra aṭai pitā
sāṁgrāme na ghuñchile sehu dusaha daite drapiṣṭhe | 69 |
dhana bhaṇḍāra jūra kari nelā satyabhāmanta gheni | 72 |
baiśākha māsa ye kr̥ṣṇa daśamīra dina
kirāta rūpe arjuan bulu thilā bana | 73 |
tahira upare dakṣiṇa mūrati hoi basicchi bīrapātha | 74 |
gosiṁgha rathe thāi dekhile jaganmāthaṁkara bāmā
bābu arjuna rakha boli ḍāka dile satyabhāmā | 75 |
pabongta upare thāi tāhā śuṇilā bīra phālaguni | 76 |
asura baḷa thāṭha dekhilā bicitrabīryyara nāti | 77 |
puṇa ḍāki boile arjuna muṁ satyabhāmā aṭai
daśa yuṇa māḍi āsuacchi asura baḷa saini
āsura baḷa saini ki bindhilā bīra pātha
rātra dibasa ke se māilā samasta daita | 81 |
go siṁghaku badha kariṇa nelā śatrābatī
dvārakāẏe utsaba ye karāile deba śirīpati | 82 |
bedagyāse kahile ye rājusi yāga sabhāre
byāsaṁkara mukhuṁ śuṇiṇa ẏe dibya bacana
rāgeṇa bindhilā pātha dibya śahasra gheni | 85 |

lg.note:
–satyabhāmā bacana yahūṁ śubhilāka śreṣṭha
śuṇi dhanurjaẏe adhara kalā puṣṭa–[jha, ṭa, ḍha,]

lg.l: ākāśuṁ br̥ṣṭi yehne dhārā ye śrābaṇa | 87 |
ẏekā asurake nārāja daśa biṁśa tiriśa
asura baḷa saini bindhile yete kāṇḍa
samasta saṁharilā ẏe ẏekā khageśvara garbhe | 92 |
raṇaraṅga manthana kalā se kaḷapi apūrṇṇā
pakṣīre paḍi samasta śahasra houchanti cūnā | 94 |
kara caraṇa sabu hoilā khaṇḍa khaṇḍa

lg.note: –samare askanda jāṇi subhadrāra nāhā |–ka, cha
–ābara biśeṣe jagannātha yāhākaiṁ sāhā |–cha
–samare anibongāraṇa khagabara aṭai aprṇṇā |–jha, ṭa
–kaḷapi apūrṇṇā = kalpa kalpa paryyanta bajrāṅga śarīra |

lg.l: dhāiṁṇa asura thaṭhe se paśilā raṇamantha | 98 |
ratha gaja aśva paḍanti ghora yuddhe
lakṣa lakṣa hoiṇa ye nācanti kabandhe | 100 |
śuṇisi ho caitana se pāṇḍabaṁkara mahimāṁ
ẏe tribhmabana madhye yāhaṁkara asaṁkṣa gārimā | 101 |
baḍa bimukha hoi se asura baḷa bhaṅga
śate marbhuta yoddhā gheni uṭhilā jaẏesiṁha | 102 |
ẏekā arjunaku beṛhile ẏeteka sanya āsi | 103 |
dekhiṇa bainetra hāde dilāka pakṣī jhāḍi
aneka yojane se asure yāiṁ paḍi | 104 |
ura piṭhi muṇḍa bhāñji hoilāka cūnā
nabakhabng yoddhā paḍile asura baḷa sehna | 105 |
re re kāra śabde miḷilā arjunara āga | 106 |
yoddhāke bindhalā se nārāja koṭi koṭi | 107 |
ẏekā ghāntike binddhalā nāraja nabakhabng yoddhāṁku
bhmaja jānu kandha phuṭiṇa yāi kāhāra buku | 108 |
ẏekā romake pāñcha pāñcha śara phuṭi
bāte cūtaphaḷa prāẏe asure paḍile mahīloṭi | 109 |
lg.note: –thantā-antharā, thantarā arthare |

lg.l: loṭile dānabe baḷa bāte kadaḷī bana prāẏe | 111 |
garuḍa uḍāi dilā ye pakṣīra bātaghāte
tiraṇa rāśi prāẏe hoi ye uḍile daite | 113 |
boilā āre āre pāṇḍabāre tumohora pitāra bairi
kāhiṁ yibu āja re mora chāmureṇa paḍi | 115 |
pitāku mohora māilu ẏebe se jāṇili
yatane yāhāku loḍai re tāhāku pratakṣe pāili | 116 |
asura bacane se kopita bīra pātha
muhiṁ se harili re gosiṁhara darpa artha | 117 |
bongśe bongśe tumbhare mohora hāthe badha
yetemāne pāra re rahiṇa kara yuddha | 118 |
napuṇa nisata hou marāi bandhu barga
arjunara aneka pratagyāṁ śuṇi jaẏesiṁha kalā rāga | 119 |
lg.note: –bāḷa āditya tejapraẏe diśai phālaguni |–jha, ṭa, ta, cha,

–“arjunara aneka pratagyāṁ śuṇi jaẏesiṁha kalā rāga”
pare ‘kha’ re adhikā pāṭha–
āja tote māile hoiba pitr̥kāryya
niśce nāśakara pāñjipocchilā tora āna |

lg.l: nirdhūma agni jāṇi yehne diśai tāa teja
kopeṇa binddhalā se lakṣeka śara gheni | 122 |
puṇi jaẏesiṁha yocilā nāraja lākṣa chāri | 123 |
pabongta phuṭai yahiṁ rahai ki sāñjusehna | 124 |
kope durānteka śara ye binddhalā upare
pakṣībara hoi dhanya to mahimāṁ aneka | 126 |
debe sahi nuāranti yebaṇa śahasra jyoti
garbheṇa saṁharilu dhanya dhanya tohora jībati | 127 |
sehi cūragalā ye garuḍa pakṣī rāga | 130 |
luhā benigadā dhailā beni ye hātheka | 132 |
merugiri pabongta jāṇi diśe tāra kāẏe | 133 |
arjuna upare se prahāra kalā nei | 134 |
arjuna śarire ābora pakṣī kalāka uhāḍa | 135 |
garuda upare paḍilā ye gadā beni
garaḷa chāḍile ye uḍaṅga darpa bhāñji
puṇa durānteka se ghenilā khaṇḍā phaḷā | 138 |
phaḷā se dei samare uṭhilā asura kuḷa ṣaṇḍā | 139 |
binatāra nandana ye khaḍaga prahāra dekhi
arjuna ohāḍa kari pātilā tāhāra pakṣī | 141 |
garuḍa upare paḍi śahasra galā tuṭi | 145 |
puṇi binddhalā pātha kopeṇa hāboḍeka śare
giribara upuḍi paḍilā ki asura upare | 147 |
nāsikā mukhe rudhira ghana ghana bahi | 148 |
puṇihiṁ lakṣeka nārāja inddhalā bīra pātha | 149 |
aniryāpa śara gheniṇa māilā ka jhāti
bhaẏeṇa arjuna paśi nuāre tāra kati | 152 |
lg.note:
–“nāsikā mukhe rudhira ghana ghana bahi” pābānta pare
‘kha’ pothire bhinnapāṭha:–
maha kopabhara hoiṇa phālaguni
kāḷacatra gheni bege pakāilā hāṇi |
hāṇanteṇa benikhaṇḍa hilāka yoḍi
puṇi durāneka ye uṭhilā taḍabaḍi |
maṁṣāsura durgābara deichanti pūbonge
benikhaṇḍa hele tāra bongśa na maribe |
teṇukari jaẏesiṁha nohilā bināśa
arjuna uparaku dhāiṁlā kari roṣa |
beni kara baṛhāi se benibr̥kṣa dhari
kope bulāilā tā bicitra gati kari |

lg.l: gadā mudugara śakati ādi samsta hoile cūre | 153 |
puṇa sāṣṭāma hoi uṭhilā daita airi
dhātikāre upāḍilā se kauśika nāme giri | 154 |
aneka ratna bhaṇḍāra acchi deba tahiṁ
aneka dhana bhaṇḍāra se gheniṇa sabongsācī
garuda pithire se thoilā sabu bācchi | 165 |
asura baḷa nipātiṇa se pāṇḍaba sohaḍa
kopeṇa pakṣījāta kalā se binatāra suta
raṇa jaẏe kariṇa hāde arjuna āsuacchi | 170 |
aneka sānanda hoile yujheṣṭhid eba rāẏe
sādhu sādhu arjuna boli śubhilā śabada | 174 |
ẏemanta mahimaṁ ye na thiba kṣatrīpaṇe
bahuta mahimāṁ kathā ye aneka praśaṁsā
dhanya dhanya pāṇḍabe tumbhara pūru manabāñcchā | 176 |
ẏe āmbhara chatrībr̥tta aṭai yebe sata

lg.note: –ẏe āmbhara chatrībr̥tta japatapa sata |–jha, ṭa
lg.l: ẏesaneka samaẏe samaste dhanya dhanya bhāṣi
ākāśe debatāẏe ye kale jaẏe jaẏe | 180 |
jaẏesiṁha māri arjuna sabu bhaẏa pārakalā | 181 |
śuṇa ho mahārājā rājusi yāgara kathā
bahuta mahimāṁ ye na sarai kahante
ikṣudaṇḍa bratili muṁ biṣṇu nāma sumarante | 184 |
śuddha saṣṭika jāṇi yāhāra pañchu mudrā
gaṅgā uddhāraṇa deba hiraṇya pura dhvaṁsā
bhagata jana uddhāraṇa nātha pūrāa manīṣā | 188 |
lg.note: –baikuṇṭha pura praphata huai biṣṇu nāma sumarante |–(ja, a,
–kicchi yama baṇḍa na paḍai biṣṇu purāṇa śuṇante |–[ḍa, ka]
–kauśika bacane abhaẏe kāḷa (kāryya) siddhā |–(ja, tha)
–kausṇabha maṇi yāra hr̥dapadme hārā |–(ka)
–r̥ṣiśr̥ṅga yāge jāta jānakī prāṇaguru |–(ka)

lg.l: taba padmapāde deba śata śahasra daṇḍa pariṇāmi | 189 |
yama darpa bhaṅgāṇa nātha nandaka bana maṇḍi
saẏaḷa jana tāraṇa nātha apāda dukha maṇḍi | 190 |
ẏe bhaba sāgaru nātha tāribā gosāiṁ | 191 |
karuṇā sāgara nātha dhanukī catra cūḍāmaṇi
saptaśāḷā nibāraṇa nātha sugrība ātaṁka śuṇi | 194 |
kr̥tānteka bibāde deba nidāgha baḷa chedi | 195 |
śrīrāma caraṇe sebā sāroḷa dāsa kabi
mana śrotā aṭai ye caitana bakatā | 198 |

lg.note: –śaila rājā nandanī mohora dukha khaṇḍi |–jha, ṭa)
lg.head:
{@ananta nāgaṅku nimantraṇa karibā pāiṁ arjunaṅkara
pātāḷe gamana o śaramune pr̥thibī dhāraṇa
ebong
nāgābāḷī bibāha prasaṅga@}

lg.l: ẏe mr̥tu śaba nāmaru beḷeka mote tarā
tohora tule ho jaḍita mote karā | 2 |
hr̥dagate talaẏe ho kariṇa thāa hāde | 3 |
ābara mahimāṁ yuheṣṭhi debaṁkara hāde śuṇa
ẏesaneka sampāda ho rājusi yāga sabhā
nr̥tyagīta rase ye prasara hoilāka rāti
nidrā āḷasa kāhāra śarīre na bhedanti | 6 |
aneka dāna dile sabhāra ārogya nimante | 11 |
chāmure agasti śuṇānti biṣṇu ye purāṇa | 13 |
kahanti mahāmuni ye upara baṁśa kathā
śarīra manuṣya rūpa mr̥ga muṇḍa cakita chāli | 17 |
baḍāi susañcha ẏe kāhāra aṭai tanu
kebaṇa tīrthabāsī ẏe ẏehānta āmbhe na cihnu | 19 |
indra debatāẏe ye tāhānta na dile basi | 23 |
rāgeṇa mahatamā ye tahuṁ aile apasari
muhiṁ se bibhāṇḍaka jāṇithāa tohora hāde
ẏehi amara svarge basibi tohora hr̥de | 26 |
ẏete boliṇa caḷīle se maha brahmaruṣi
indrapada ghenimi boli hr̥dagate kale buddhi
āhāra nidrā maithuna teji nirañcchana prabodhi | 28 |
satyayuga satara lakṣa aṭhāiśa sahasra baraṣa pariyante
bho pitā bibhāṇḍaka boli yebaṇa mahāruṣi
upabāse basile se nirāśī kāḷa ẏete | 32 |
basiba amara svage indrapade bibhāṇḍaka mahāmunya | 33 |

lg.note:
–“ẏesaneka bāratā yāiṁ kahile nārada” pādānta pare
‘kha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha–
dhakkāra se yāiṁ kale inda debatāṁku (abiśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)
lg.l: dhātikāre nārade yāiṁ kahile bāsaba debatāṁku
nirāñjana prasanne se amara svarga gheni
kāli pāñchaghaḍimāne indrapade basiba bibhaṇḍeka mahāmuni | 36 |
nāadaṁka mukharu se nirādhāra bākya śuṇi
birasa hoiṇa ye basilā deba bajrapāṇi | 37 |
tu āre sundarī rakha mohora amara
bibhāṇḍaka ruṣira tu tapa bhagna kaara | 39 |
tuleṇa maẏāṇa basanta maḷaẏā niḷa tini | 41 |
aneka madhura isa gāẏane se mohilā muniṁki
ḍhaḷile mahātamā se kanyāra rūpa dekhi | 43 |

lg.note: (pūbong pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara)
bibhāṇḍaka āsithile na cihnilu tāṁku
tohora sabhāẏe abhimāna se pāile
rāge pheri mahamuni tapare basile |

lg.l: bāmakare dhaile muni amoha reta phuṭi | 46 |
śuddha saṣṭika prāẏe e jaḷare upuciāi | 47 |
rusira reta ye paḍilā tāra garbhe
se mr̥guṇī nandanaku galā ye upekhi | 51 |
kemante bratiba ẏehāku nāhīṁ kṣīra phuṭi | 55 |
pāṇi na baraṣile tu, ẏe putrara kope
amara dahana hoibaṭi ẏe putrara śāpe | 57 |
lg.note: –iṣṭaka nāmeṇa se ẏekai mr̥guṇī – ṭha, na, tha

lg.l: amara bhmabana kampai yebaṇa bāḷaputra kopabhara | 58 |
yebaṇa deśare indra na karai jaḷabr̥ṣṭi
ẏe mahātmāra gale śubhe huai subr̥ṣṭi | 59 |
ẏe se ruṣyaśr̥ṅga ho pucchākale yāhā
śuṇasi ho raitana kahanti nija ātmā
sañchapi pucchākalu yāhā rājusi yāgara mahimāṁ | 62 |
agāda samudra ẏe sāhera bāli jāṇi
kāhāra śakya baḷe ẏe pāribāka gaṇi | 63 |
bahuta mahimāṁ ẏe na sarai kahante
dvādaśa dibase ẏemante hoilā rājusi yāga sabhā | 65 |
byāse kahile ye jaganna thaṁkara pāśe
lakṣekumbha ḍhalai ye yujheṣṭhiṁka chaḍa niśvāse | 68 |
santeka jāṇimā gaṇḍura ye brahmahatyā doṣa pāragalā
mahāmantra bākye tāhā ruṣi uddāḷe kahila | 69 |
meru pamakhuḷuṁ se tribeṇī īśāne bhedī | 72 |
antara bhumire se yāiṁ karanti prakr̥ti śaṁkā
snāhāna sandhyā nityakarma srāriṇa dhamya purohite
yujheṣṭhi debaṁku nityakarma karāile ruṣi samaste | 75 |
yujheṣṭhiṁka chaḍa niśvāse ḍhaḷilā lakṣe āhuti
ẏekā ghateka na ṭaḷi rahilā nibhrānti | 76 |
bekhiṇa āśrija hoile ye byāsa mahatamā
kumbheka na ṭaḷilā muni rahilā kemante | 78 |
kumbheka na ṭaḷalā āmbhe sandeśa achuṁ gheni | 79 |
nārade kaile hari he na ailā rājāẏe
se gheni na ṭaḷilā hari rahila ghaṭa ye goṭiẏe | 80 |
śuṇiṇa baḍa birasa hoile deba ye acyuta

lg.note:
goḷaputra–pāṭha–ṭa pothire dekhāyae |
gopāḷa–goāḷa–goḷa–goḍa, gauḍa |
–ẏeka ghaṭa kuḷe ye rahilā nibhrānti |–[cha, ḍa, pha]

lg.l: paṇḍurājā ye yamasabha tinipābaccha taḷe thilā
nāgabaḷa gheni yebe āsiba bāsukī nāgarājā
sehu āsi ṣoḷaha dibase kariba pādapūjā | 84 |
tebe se paṇḍura brahmahatyā yiba kṣaẏe
śuṇiṇa baḍa āśrija hoile deba dharmarāẏe | 85 |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile se brahmāṇḍa dhāraṇa
nabadvīpa sapata sāgara acchi yāhāra pheru upareṇa | 87 |
kesaneka tāhāra āsibāra samprate karibi muhiṁ
se mahābhārā medinī deba thoiba puṇa kāhiṁ | 88 |
pātāḷa svargaku ho tu yāasi phālaguni
nāgabaḷa sahite bāsukī rājā āsa gheni | 90 |
ẏe bidhi mahābrahma ṭekile āhuti taḍati | 92 |
ratha gaja aśva tule nāhiṁ ye pādānti
boile kāhiṁra re mānaba ailu tohora bhmabana upekhi | 97 |
muhiṁ tāhākaiṁ nimantribi bahana mote dekhā | 98 |
cai yāānte se bīra pāṇḍaba kīraṭī
ananta nāgarājā bāsukīku arjuna yāiṁ bheṭi | 99 |
pure utsaba karāilā se arjunaku dekhi | 101 |
aneka binoẏī se arjune hoilā bhagata | 102 |
tote dekhi nirmaḷa hoilā carmaākhi jībana mora dhani | 103 |
mote anugraha ki kau ho dhanurjaẏe
moe rāi āgyāṁ dile deba nārāẏaṇa | 105 |
nāgabaḷa gheni tumbhe thiba ṣoḷadina rājusi yāga sabhāre | 107 |
ananta hāsya kalā arjuna bacana śuṇi
mohora kathā ki na jāṇanti deba catrapāṇa | 108 |
nabadvīpa sapata sāgara chārikhāni caurāśi lakṣa jībajantu
mohoa piṭhire se saburi brata hetu | 109 |
muhiṁ se sambhāḷiṇa acchi ẏeḍe baḍa mahāgaru | 110 |
neka lakṣa ye gira ḍiṅgira parabata
yāa yāa boli āgyāṁ mote dile debahari | 112 |
na nei kemante muṁ yibai bāhuḍi
na jiṇile na bāhuḍai ẏesana mohora bīradhu
sabhāra madhye mote śubhmaacchi dhani dhani
bāsukī na gale hoibi muniṁ nindi | 118 |
bichāri boilā tumbhe yiba nā hastināku
ananta boilā muṁ bhārā debaiṁ kāhāku | 119 |
kimpāiṁ huḍilu hoiṇa ẏeḍe baḍa paṇḍita
arjuna boilā tu pr̥thī chāḍa nāgarājā
muhiṁ pr̥thī dharibaiṁ tu bahana hoi yā yā | 121 |
āho pannagā nārāẏaṇa muhiṁ ananta abatāra
bāsukī boilā bābu gyāna tohora nāhiṁ
ẏeḍe baḍa gabong bahilu tu mānaba janma bahi | 124 |
yebaṇa bhārā sahi nuārai meru ye mandara | 125 |
arjuna boilā tu kicchiṁ na bhāḷa
dharibi basundharī tu chāḍa ho mahābyāḷa | 126 |
arjuna bacana puṇi se ananta mahabīra
boilā dekhibā kemante bahibu tu acaḷa mahābhāra | 127 |

lg.note: –dharibi sacarācara chāda tu mahābhāra |–jha, ṭa; ḍha
–ẏesaneka bacane se pārthiba dhanurddhara |–dha, gha, na, ṭha, pha
lg.l: ẏeka pāda pr̥thibīre āreka pāda āṇṭhura upara
āreka huḷa lagāilā madhya ye bhmabanu | 130 |
dhanu huḷeka aṇṭhure āreka huḷa pr̥thibī
chāḍa ho ananta ẏebe boli boilā phālaguni
kāḍhasi tohora pheru muṁ dhaili medinī | 132 |
nabadīpa sapata sāgara kāhiṁ dhanuhuḷe rahi | 133 |
arjuna boile tu ẏemanta kimpe kahi
chāḍu kinā pr̥thibī kemante na rahi | 135 |
niścaḷe dhanuhuḷe pr̥thī dhailā bīra pātha | 136 |
aḷapa aḷapa kari bāsukī kāṛhilā acaḷa

lg.note: –ẏekapada pr̥thibīre āreka pāda aṅguṣṭhi upare–[jha, ṭa, pha]
–mamahāpracaṇḍa mr̥tti se dhailā dhanurddhare–ja, ṭa, ḍha
–hābhīṣma mr̥tti se dhailā dharnuddhare |–bha
–pāthara bacane pheru kāḍhilā ananta |–jha, ṭa, ḍha, tha, na, ṭha
–aḷapa aḷapa kari bāsukī chāḍiā acaḷa |–bha, gha, kha, ka, pa

lg.l: niścaḷa hoi rahilā ye nabadvīpa sapata sāgara
chārikhāni caurāśi lakṣa jībajantu kīṭa pataṅga sthābara | 140 |
samaste rahile ye yāhāra brata hetu | 141 |
boilā pratakṣe aṭu tu ho nārāẏaṇa mr̥tti
bābu yetemāne pāra ẏehāra śrī paẏare sebā kara | 144 |
yāa yāa nāgarāja gheniṇa tohora nāgasanye | 145 |
ananta boilā bābu ẏe mahābhārā dei tote
dekhina āśrija hoili muṁ na yibi kemante | 146 |
lg.note: –arjuna kaṇṭhe nei dile ratnamāḷa- | kha, na, ḍa
–ananta bāsukī rūpe jagannāthe dhaile pr̥thī-jha, ṭa ḍa, ka

–“yāa yāa nāgarāja gheniṇa tohora nāgasanye” pare
‘tha’ pothire pāṭha–
ananta boilā bābu ẏe bhāra dei tote
dekhiṇa āśrija muhiṁ yibaiṁ kemante |
dekhu dekhu tote kemante yibaiṁ chāḍi
na puṇa acaḷa pr̥thikī paḍai śire māḍi |
arjuna boile ananta na kara tu bhaẏe
nirbhaẏe caḷa tu rājusi yāga sabhaẏe |

lg.l: māgo tuhi sebā karithibu arjuna debatāṁku | 148 |
muhiṁ mahābhāra dei yāuacchi ẏehāṁka gocare
susañcha jaḷa gheni pakhāḷibu ẏehāṁkara kāẏe
bīna basanagoṭi pindhāibu mora ma ẏe | 150 |
kasturī gandha candana tu lepana karibu śarīre
aneka sugandha sañcha kusuma sāñjoibu keśare | 151 |
amr̥ta yogāḍa māgo deuthibu randhana kari
sehimati kari khatibu go samasta kari paritejyā | 153 |
na puṇamātā go karāu mote bāci | 155 |
bābu daśadoṣa aprādha na dharibu kiraṭī
tohora caraṇa taḷe khaṭithiba mora duhitā goṭi | 156 |
arjuna boila tora na thāu kinā duhitā
nāgabaḷa gheni tu ho bahana kara gamitā | 157 |
lg.note:
bāsukī rājāra ye ẏekai dulāḷī
tāhāra nāma aṭai ye sandhyābāḷī | ja, ga, ta, ṭha, kha’tha

lg.l: bāḷuta br̥ddha sabunti gheniṇa yāa tohora saṅgare | 158 |
samadaṇḍa gheni se bāhāra bimbara dvāre | 159 |
sahasra phaṇā śateka phaṇā na gaṁkara śire
arjunaṅku aneka binoẏī hoi khaṭai nāgeṇī
prabhāte srāhāna sandhyā hāde ye karāi
bhr̥tyara bhr̥tya prāẏe hoiṇase khaṭai aguḷi | 167 |
svāmī ananta bijekale āsi indr apraśastare | 169 |
dvāre nārāẏaṇa svāmī kale yāiṁ bije
pañchabiṁśa lakṣa bhāra ratna ye nāgabaḷa kāndhe
mahī hāndoḷa houacchi nāgakara phu phu kāra nāde | 178 |
dekhiṇa phaṇi baḷaṁkara bhāñjilāka guru darpa | 181 |
gobinde boile tu ailu bhalakalu bāsukī
aneke puṇye se yujheṣṭhi debaṁku dekhi | 185 |
āho nāgarājā tohora tahiṁki ye arjuna nimantraṇe galā
tuhi ta ailu, arjuna kiṁpe nailā | 186 |
ananta boilā tu deba jagannātha jagata mohana
aneka mr̥ttire tu deba heu hāde janma | 187 |
ye se arjuna deba pratakṣe aṭu tuhi
dhanura huḷe arjuna pr̥thibī acchi bahi | 188 |
tohora saṁcite deba tāhāra ẏesaneka gārimā | 189 |
jagannāthe boile tu na kahibu yujheṣṭhiṁki | 190 |
aneka baikulya hoibe dharma tāhā śuṇi
bolibe bhāiki mora māḍi paḍiba dharaṇī | 191 |
śrī jagannāthaṁka pādapadem kalāka aneka pūjā | 192 |
dekhiṇa kr̥takr̥tya hoile sakaḷahiṁ nara indre
aneka kalpara rājā ẏe dekhilā āmbha nāhiṁ | 195 |
āho nāgamāne tumbhe kicchihiṁ na ḍara
garuḍaku bhaẏe tumbhe kicchihiṁ na kara | 198 |
kāhāri beḷe ẏetheṁ laghantā nāhiṁ re bābā | 199 |
kr̥ttāntaka debatāṁka ṭhāru tāra teja anargala | 200 |
nara rākṣasa piśāca sabonge hoichanti ẏeka
ugraprāẏe kari kehi na karanti bākya | 201 |
pātāḷahūṁ adhika kari sukha debe tumbhaṁku yujheṣṭhiṁka āgyāṁbaḷe | 202 |

lg.note: –manu kalpaku rāi bolanti dāmodara |–(ja, tha, cha)
–anutramāku rāi bolanti dāmodara |–(kha, na, ḍa
lg.l: gobinde boile svāmī pātāḷa svargara ẏe nāgarājā
svāmīṁkara śrīcaraṇe āsi ye karai padapūjā | 206 |
chāmure arghya thoilā se pātāḷa svargagāmī
śrīkara chāḷiṇa boile uṭha ho nāgarāẏe
mastake hātha deiṇa se aneka binaẏe | 208 |
ẏekā nimiṣake sarila deuṁ deuṁ dāna | 210 |
nāgarājāku āgyāṁ hoila sabhāre yāiṁ basa
mahā anaḷa debatī ghr̥teṇa toṣa he ẏe | 212 |
srāhāna bhojana ye yāhāra yete icchā
śatr̥ mitra ye samaste ẏeka prīti
dāna saṅgate ye yāhā māganti tāha pābanti | 215 |
aneka sampade dianti dāna dakṣiṇā ye dhana
dukhī daridra nāhānti abikṣaṇe dianti dāna | 217 |
lg.note: –dianti ghr̥ta āhuti dharmarāẏe toḷi |–[ṭha, na, pha, gha]
lg.l: āho caitana satya tretaẏā dvāpara hāde yuga kaḷi
samasta utapatti praḷaẏa karai se nirañjana debatā | 224 |
upujanti pururabā naghoṣa yayāti mānadhātā bīra | 225 |
alokya bara pāi harai debī sītā
tretaẏā antare puṇa hoai dvāpara yuga
mahābhāratha samare puṇi samaste hoanti binaśvati | 230 |
rājusi yāga ẏethi hoai kāḷa ẏete | 232 |
agasti kahile śuṇa ho baibasuta manu
aneka bāra yujheṣṭhi jāta hoileṇi madhya bhmabanuṁ | 233
yujheṣṭhi debaṁka caraṇe kalāka dibya pūjā | 234 |
ye bidhi bidhāna muṇohi karanti rājāmāne | 236 |
se ananta rahilā sabhāẏe ṣoḷa dibasa pariyante
sabhāra samāpate dile pūrṇṇa ye āhuti
paṇḍura brahmahatya doṣa galā boile sabongmuni | 240 |
mahāmantra bākyeṇa dile pūrṇṇa ye āhuti

lg.note: –aneka kautuka kale deba ye anante |–jha, ṭa, ḍha

lg.l: bāuna bhaṇḍāra tucchā hoilā dina prati | 242 |
puṇa puṇa abikṣaṇe dāna bidhi dhārā
bhāreka dāna dile śateka bhāra pūroi
driyodhana boile bhaṇḍāru dhana na sarai | 244 |
bhāreka boile ye pūroi bhāra śate | 245 |
se mahāyagyaṁra phaḷe samasta dhvaṁsa galā | 246 |
mahā puṇyatoẏā sthāna ẏe yehne diśai biṣṇupatha | 247 |
yeuṁṇa nare ẏehā paḍhanti śuṇanti hr̥dagate
pābanti baikuṇṭha se basanti purāṇa saṁgate | 248 |
yeuṁṇa nare śuṇanti mane saṁkalpa ye kari
dhana santana barddhuta huai se pābanti biṣṇu purī | 249 |
hatyā pāteka doṣa yeteka bongśeṇa thāi
hatyā bimocana ye ẏehu rājusi mahāyāga sabhā
ẏe kathā hr̥dagate taḷaẏe karithibā re bābā | 251 |
lg.note:
puṇa puṇa subarṇṇa huai mahādāna
aneka haraṣa mānagobindara mana |–jha, ṭa, ḍha
–mahā biṣṇu toẏāẏeṇa diśanti biṣṇu nātha |–tha, ña

hatyādoṣa pāteka yāhāra yeteka acchi
kuḷara kaḷaṁka sabu chaḍānti śrībatsi |–ja, ḍa, ña, cha, gha, kha
lg.l: dvanda jañjāḷa doṣa sabu dūra karare bābu
rāga moha ahiṁkāra māẏāsninā ẏe sabu | 252 |
bahuta pāpa arjai kuṭumba poṣaṇa arthe
samasta pātaka kṣaẏayāi śrī mahābhāratha śuṇante | 253 | 11748 |
lg.head: {@śīśupāḷa badha o tāhāra pūbongjanna br̥ttānta@}
lg.l: manu pucchā kalāka caitanaku taba ante
aśvinī nāme nakṣatra bhoga se dinara | 2 |
kauḷaba kaṇe aṭe śukḷa name yoga
yeuṁṇa jaḷa paḍile ame kṣe mokṣagati pānti | 4 |
koṭiẏe tīrtha gheni tahiṁ bijaẏe puṣkara | 5 |
srāhāna sāriṇa ye aneka dile dāna
gaṅga gaẏā godābarī sarayu yamuna sarasvatī
phalukī raṇabhadrā kāśī kauśika ābara gomati | 8 |
nānā aḷaṁkāre se subeśa beśa kari
yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara koḷe dropatī debī chanti | 19 |
koṭiẏe tīrtha gheni ye kṣetrādhi puṣkara
tridaśa debatāẏe ye kale sādhu sādhu
yujheṣṭhi debaṁka abiṣeka hastināre bānā biradhū | 23 |
kaneka chatra ye nakuḷa dharichanti āge | 24 |
yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara koḷe dropatī debī chanti | 25 |
āpaṇe jagannātha maṇimā maṇimā boli hāki
kaẏe jaẏe śababa bhāṣanti hastinā kaṭakare | 29 |
hāthīru uturi se candra śāḷā pure bijekari
samasta ruṣi beṛhi ye bandāpanā kari | 32 |
brāhmaṇa jaṇake daśa sahasra māḍha bāāstarī saṁsiddhi | 33 |
āreka beḷe brāhmaṇe pratigraha na karibe boli āne
dvāpara yuge susthe thibenā yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara dāne | 35 |
na karibe kr̥ṣi ye nakaribe bāṇijya
byāse boile tumbhe śuṇa ho dharmarāẏe
śrīkare gheni bābu tora arghya ye goṭiẏe | 38 |
lakṣeka nr̥pati ubhā ye hoichanti chāmure | 40 |
āho acha tumbhe brahmakṣatrī baśya śūdra muḷe aṣṭādaśa bongśī
śrīkare arghya gheni pachāranti deba dharme
guṇabanta paṇḍita tu mbhe sabonggyaṁ śāhāsrika | 43 |
ẏethakaiṁ āgyāṁ mote debāka śuddha citte
yujehṣṭhi debaṁka mukhuṁ ẏesanaka bākya śuṇi
droṇa guruṁku samaste ye sannidhye basāi | 47 |
tretaẏā ẏagare tumbhe dvāpara yuge tumbhe
tumbhara bidyāre se kṣatrī aṭa sina āmbhe | 49 |
lg.note: –subarṇṇara pātre ye lakṣe śāḷianna |–ja
–māṇikyara ghenile se lakṣe dīpamāna |–na, ṭha, kha
–śrīkare sahasra dīpa gheni dharma nāna |–ṭa, jha

–yāga samāpata kāhāku karibā pūjā
sabhā samete arghya neba keuṁṇa rājā |–jha, ṭa, ḍha
lg.l: dhanu śahasra bidyāre tumbhe saburi aṭa guru
yujheṣṭhi yāha boile tu kāhā bichāru | 50 |
bipra mūkhuṁ bāhāra hoiba yebeṇa kathā
sabuṁkari āmbhara sanamata se siddha bāratā | 51 |
droṇe boile bābu tumbhe lakṣeka nr̥pati
āho dharma artha kāma mokṣa ẏe chāribargaku
bāsudeba prīti ẏe boli saṁkalpa kāḷaku | 53 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa thāuṁ padārghya acchi ki ānaku | 54 |
ẏesaneka bidhāna ye achai śāhāsa yoge
muhiṁ ẏehā pucchi achaini byāsaṁkara āge | 55 |
droṇe boile tumbhe śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhi
catr̥barga purūṣa tu jagata jana cintā
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa śata sahasra daṇḍa parimāṇi | 60 |
lg.note: –gurumukhuṁ bāhāra hoiba yebaṇu kathā |–(jah, ṭa, ḍha
–bāsudeba prīti bola sakaḷa bākyaku |–(cca, pa, ka)
–muṁ ẏehā śuṇi achai byāsaṁkara āge |–(pa, ka)
lg.l: śuṇa ho caitana amr̥ta rasa kathā
subāsita kusume ye dvādaśa barṇṇe gabhā
śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁka hr̥de ābharaṇa kale yujehṣṭhi deba rañji | 65 |
śagkha catra gadā ye sāraṅga caturbhmaje
āhe pāṇḍabaṁka carita dekha ẏesaneka bidhāne | 69 |
āmbhe rāja kumāramāne ke ṭipāṭe abhiṣekī
bongśe bongśe dharaṇa āmbhe aṭu ẏe pr̥thīki | 70 |
āmbhanta baraṇa kari na dilā pādāarghye
bhua maṇḍale dhāraṇa āmbhe aṭuṁ madhyasvarge | 71 |
nanda gauḍa pua kahnā gauḍa aṭai

lg.note: aneka beśana śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁku kale deba dharme |–(jha, ṭa, ḍha)
lg.l: kehi kicchi na boila hoila tumbhe tunī
debaindra prāẏeka basilā gauḍa abhiṣekī bidhāna gheni | 73 |
kr̥ṣṇa pādāaghya ghenilā yogāilā ki tumbhara manaku | 74 |
saṁsāre śubhai śiśupāḷara jaganmātha sohodra bhrātha
tohor abacanaku chaḷa na karai jagannātha | 75 |
śiśupāla boilā mote paribu ṭiki rakhi | 76 |
piṭhi rakṣā yebe kari pāriba kurubīra
trailoka laṁghiba ke tote āmbhara sāha thile | 78 |
tohora bacanaku yebe kopa karai hari
samaste hoi andhe māribā tāṁku beṛhi | 79 |
yāa yā śiśupāḷa tu kahāku bhaẏekaru | 80 |
samodra laṁghile ye kete mātra pr̥thī
mānagobinda boilā tu kicchihiṁ na bhāḷa
piṭhirakṣā karibi muṁ tu yāa yā śiśupāḷa | 83 |
lg.note: –trailoke tote ke jiṇima āmbhemāne thile |–[jha, ṭa, ḍha, kha, na, ṭha, cha]
lg.l: śālu boilā bhāi tote se laṁghile
chapanakoti ydaba nāśibi satya satya moyora | 85 |
manare kāhāku se tuhi bhaẏe pāu | 86 |
śakuni boilā tu śuṇa ho śiśupāḷa
bhracchanā kari tu hariṁki bege chāḷa | 87 |
bhīma nakuḷa chāmure achanti chāmara ubhāri | 89 |
lakṣe rājā mānyakale tu pāilu aiśuryya | 94 |

lg.note: - kāhiṁki bhaẏe tu ho katu mahīpāḷa |–(ka, ja, ḍa, ca)
lg.l: ẏe tini bhmabana madhye tu aṭu maharathā
ẏeḍeka baḍā yaśa rājā nāśakalu anamite
kebaṇa rājāra se ho aṭai ātmajā | 98 |
ke bolai se ādyahuṁ upujilā basudebara ghare
ke bolai gopaku paḷāilā kaṁsa ḍare | 99 |
nanda gauḍa pitā mātā yaśobantī gauḍuṇī
dvāre dvāre dahi bikanti pratakṣe ẏehā jāṇi | 100 |
ẏeḍe pāmara janaku pādāarghya dilu ho kemante | 101 |
puṇihiṁ boilā tumbhe goḷakuṇḍā jāra jātaka
ẏekā mātā tumbhara re aṭai tini pitā
ẏekā bhārijāku tumbhe re hoila pañchu brathā | 103 |
abaraṇi lokaku re barila tumbhe āṇi
paṇḍita loke se ye bhmalanti na jāṇi | 105 |
