lg.note: - ke bolai gopare pālaṭa kale kaṁsa rājāra ḍare |(jha, ṭa, ḍha)
- sehi yādabe aṭanti jāra jātake jāta |(ka)

– sehi yādaba śrīkr̥ṣṇa aṭai pātākā
tumbhara bandhupaṇaku yogāi se ẏekā |–(kha, ṭha; na)
lg.l: ẏehu abā, ho hari baraṇa kalāka tote
tu re gauḍa pādāarghya ghenilu kemante | 106 |
bhmabibāhāna rājā ye pūbonge stirīhatyā kalā
prohiṇī badhakalu tu stirīhatyā baḍa doṣī
yugateṇa puṇyasthāne na dei tote basi | 109 |
locana tarāṭi se diai ghora ḍāke
yujheṣṭhi deba boile kopa saṁhara re bābu
rāgī hoile dharma āmbhara nāśayibaṭi sabu | 112 |
boile bolu śiśupāḷa nakara tahiṁki kopa
daiba phaḷai sinā tahiṁra doṣa anarūpa | 113 |
dharmaku jhiṁghāsa kale na sahanti digapāḷa
āmbhara kopa karibāra na yogāi bābu ẏetebeḷe | 114 |
mohora śapataṭi tote śānta hua bhīma
dharma barddhuta hou saṁharaṇa kara tama | 115 |
svāmīṁkara bacane ye bhīmasena parama śānti
aneka bāge bhīmasenaku yujheṣṭha karānti nibartti | 116 |
lg.note: - locanuṁ aśr̥jaḷa bhai mahārāge |–(kha, ṭha, na, ḍa, gha, ca, tha, pha, ka, ja, pa)
- na puṇa bhmagnakaru ẏeḍe utakarma |–(tha, ḍa, ja, ña)
lg.l: āho bhīmasena najāṇu tu ẏethira carita
bābu satyabrata bolikari brahmābongśe ẏeka rājā
debakī daibakī boli tāhāṁkara duja tanujā | 118 |
ẏekā sahodra aṭanti se beni bhaẏeṇīra suta
āre āre gauḍa tu aṭu baḍa manda bhaṇḍa
se gohatyā doṣa bimocana na galā ẏetekāḷe | 125 |
yeuṁṇa debatāṁku dhyāẏe karanti sapata brahmāṇḍa
ẏebeheṁ khapare tāra lāgiacchi gomātāra muṇḍa | 126 |
gohatyā pātaka ye na yāi kahaṇa
samasta pātaka kalu luchāilu mocheheṁ bolāu badajaṇa | 127 |
lg.note: - ramilu mānitī stirī nāśakalu ṣaṇa(?) |–(kha)

lg.l: agyāna pāṇḍabe ẏe sabhāre tote thāpi | 129 |
pratigraha kari loḍu ẏe sabhāreṇa thāi | 130 |
āho yeuṁṇa prāṇīẏe bratanti hatyā ye bibāde
saṁsāre gati nuhanti amokṣa huanti hāde | 132 |
hata mūrkha pāṇḍabe tote re barichanti āṇi | 134 |
maribā jīiṁbā tu dui na bichāri
jagabandana nāthaṁku tu āu nakara kaṭāḷa | 136 |
romakūpe yāhār basai koti koṭi brahmāṇḍa | 137 |
prāṇe nāśa na karanti bāndheba nimante | 138 |
lg.note: - ẏebeheṁ karataḷe tāra lāgiacchi goru muṇḍa |–(ka, gha, ña)
lg.l: yisa agyāne abā manda boilu re bābu
droṇaṁkara mukhuṁ ye ẏesaneka bākya śuṇi
adhara pr̥ṣṭa kri śiśupāḷa uṭhilā śira jhaṇi | 140 |
tu yāhā boilu ho bhāradvādaśaṁkara suta
āmbhe tote kahu sinā ẏethira tadanta | 141 |
tāhākaiṁ badha ẏehu ye kale bāḷakāḷe
pitāra āge dohitāẏe kāndi kahile bikaḷe | 143 |
bho pitā trailokye tu dhāraṇa aṭu mahādeba
tohora parā pitā thāuṁ āmbhe hoilu bidhaba | 144 |
daẏā sāgara tu śaraṇa pañjara bīradhū
tohora duhitā hoi āmbhara jībana asādhu | 145 |
mathurā rājyaku se bāhila gheniṇa sanyabaḷe | 146 |
aneka dhana bhaṇḍāra samasta kalā jūra
bandhu barga chāḍi tahuṁ paḷāilā catradhara | 147 |
dui bhāi lucile yāiṁ kaustubha pabongte
tahiṁ loḍi tadanta na pailu samaste | 148 |
duja dhāḍire yāiṁ loḍile sehi bane
se keẏūrakuṇḍaḷa banasta keḍhiluṁ āmbhe yāiṁ | 152 |
khaṇā khoḷāi ye āmbhe dilu jūi lagāi
aruṇā nāme kuṇḍaḷī nirjhara girire lucile | 154 |
bāratā pāi samaẏeke puṇi āmbhe dhāḍidilu tahiṁki
aneka janajantu badhakari godhana āṇilu na pārile kehi rakhi | 155 |
bandhubarga chāḍiṇa ye rahile rāmakr̥ṣṇa benibhrāthe | 156 |
āho mahā dhārmika rāja se aṭai jārāsandha
paḷāilā lokaṁkara se kuṭumba na karai badha | 157 |
kaṣṭa dekhiṇa se jārāsandha tumbhanta rakṣākalā
tahuṁṇa paḷāiṇa tumbhe gala ye bimukhe
mahā kaicchābanta rājā se aṭai bīra jārā
lakṣepura kari yāiṁ gomata giri beḍhilā | 161 |
lg.note:
- bātuṇā nāme nadītīre nirjhara banaste
tathira bhitare yāiṁ lucile gūpate |–ña, kha

- tahum puṇa paḷāilā kuṭumba sahite
yāiṁṇa lucilā ẏe hemabanta pabongte |–(tha, ña, ja, ca, ḍa
- kaṣṭa dekhiṇa se rājā tumbhanta daẏākalā |(pha, na, ṭha,)
lg.l: aṣṭādaśa beḷa pariyante beḍhilu sambhabongeṇa thāṭha
paḷāi yibāku tumbhe na pāila bāṭa | 162 |
se gomata pabongta uparu paḷāila āmbhara ḍare
bandhu barga gheni rahila yāiṁ madhu banastare | 164 |
puṇa tahiṁki na galu ho āmbhe abaheḷe
kṣīrodra bhitare yāiṁ kala ye basanta | 166 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ kopa diguṇa baṛhilā śiśupāḷa
śuśipāḷara baḍimā dekhiṇa bhīṣme āga sari
āre āre śiśupāḷa tu aṭu baḍa duṣṭa
haiṁki ẏeḍe kaṭāḷa kiṁpāre karu manda pāpiṣṭha | 169 |
āre svarga mañcha pātāḷa rasāntaḷa ẏe sapata brahmāṇḍa
bāluta kheḍa kutūhoḷe hari samasta nāśakale | 171 |
lg.note: - “paḷāi yibāku tumbhe na pāila bāṭa” pare ‘ḍa’ pothira pāṭha–
ẏebe ṭhaṇā kale samudra bhitare
gomata pabongtaru ẏe ailā āmbhari ḍare |
kṣīrodra bhitaraku nuārilā paśi
mucukunda hāthe tāku ẏe mahā bināśi |

lg.l: ẏehi keśaba mr̥tti dekhi se hoilā prāṇe hata | 172 |
āre śiśupāḷa ābara kahilu re aṣṭādaśa beḷa dila dhāḍi
kete kete sainya tumbhara nohile apahāri | 173 |
gomanta yuddhara tu kahilu yete kathā
āmbhe ki na jāṇu tahiṁra sandeśa bāratā | 174 |
aśi kṣauṇī ye tumbhe saini ghenigala
yete kr̥ta kale tahiṁ deba baḷarāma
āre śiśupāḷa kāḷadamana galā ye tumbhari biśuāse
ẏekā beḷake neuṭi nailā ta tumbhari pāśe | 177 |
aneka pratagyāṁ se karuthilā bīra jārā
beḷekahiṁ se sahi nuārilā bhīmasenara bhārā | 178 |
jarā chāra pāmara boli se āpaṇe na māri
āre tumbhara prasade śrikāḷa bāsudeba naśagalā
tume paḷāigala re aneka madhyastha loka malā | 180 |
āre agyāna mūrukha bāi bāḷuta sabhāba
nāśakara debatā āge re kisa kahi gabong | 181 |
śiśupāḷa boilā tu ho najāṇu gāṅgaba
kṣatrī hoi paḷāile kisa tāhāra gabong | 182 |
175|1 teiśi kṣauṇī baḷagheniṇa tumbhe gala |(keteka pothi)

div.note: satara kṣauṇī tumbhe sanya malāila |–kha; pa, na; ṭha
bhīmasena hāthe ye pakāile saāhāri |–ḍha, jha, ṭa, cha
–āre tumbhara sasāde śrīkāḷa bāsudeba nāśagalā |–[jha, ṭa, gha, ja, pha]

lg.l: āhe bhīṣme ẏemanta kathā kahai śuṇa hāde tumbhe
lakṣeka rājā bari se saẏambara kaẏe | 185 |
pañcha dibasa uttāreṇa rāma kr̥ṣṇa miḷileka āsi | 186 |
nanda gauḍa pitā ẏehāra aṭai bidyamāne | 187 |
āmbhe rāja kumāramāne samaste achuṁ basi
ẏe rāja sabhāre gauḍa basibe kehne āsi | 188 |
tini pābacchara taḷe ubhāhoi aḍhāi prahare ẏe leuṭile jhāti | 189 |
tahiṁra carita re jāṇu āmbhe sabong | 190 |
samasta rājāẏe ye tiraṇa prāẏe uḍi
sahasra yojane hāthī ghoḍā yāiṁ paḍi | 193 |

div.note: –nr̥pati sambhare chanti basi |–jha; ṭa, ḍha
–yojanaka antare samaste yāiṁ paḍi |–jha, ṭa, ḍha

lg.l: āre śiśupāḷa se saẏambara kāḷe āmbhe yaithilu
tu ye bolāu thilu damaghoṣara dulaṇā
cakṣu thāuṁ thāuṁ rājapthe houchu re baṇā | 195 |
bibhā hoi basilu ye chāmuḍiā taḷa | 196 |
ahigyaṁ sthānaru kanyā galā tāhā nele nārāẏaṇa | 197 |
aneka saini male sabhiẏeṁ hoile ye bhaṇḍa | 198 |
kutūhoḷe na māriṇa tāku kale parapañcha
nillaja jībana gheni tumbhe re batiacha | 200 |
bhīṣmaṁkara mukhuṁ ẏehenneka jhiṁghāsa bāṇī śuṇi
rāgeṇa śiśupāḷa ye uṭhilā śira jhuṇi | 201 |
garjiṇa uṭhilā se adhara danta chāpi
boilā aneka dharma arjilu ho yujheṣṭhi
dharmakaiṁ kaṣaṇa ho pāpakaiṁ jāṇa bheṭi | 204 |

div.note: –cakṣu thāuṁ thāuṁ kimpā hoichu re baṇā |–na, ṭha, ka

aneka nr̥pati sabonge hoithile rūṇḍa
tu puṇi seṭhāre ye hoithilu laṇḍabhaṇḍa |–ka, pa

lg.l: aneka dāna sehu ghenilā dhana lobhe
ẏemante caturtha baẏasa helāṇi se bhrama
chādilā sabu karma nāśilā sabu dharma | 208 |
mantra na paḍhante se hoilā bhikṣābasī
aneka dukha pāilā se daipāẏana brāhmaṇa
se deśa chāḍiṇa galā anya deśe
rudrākṣamāḷa kamaṇḍaḷa kaṣā kaupīna tapodhana beśe | 211 |
putra putrī gheniṇa tāra caraṇe sebilā sādhaba | 215 |

div.note: –jhamakāi asipatra se hoiṇa mahākopī |–ja, tha, ñja, ḍa, ta
–dharmeṇa kaṣaṇa ho pāpeṇa ye kaṣṭi |– ḍa, ca, ja

–bacadāẏaka bolikari ye ẏekai bāhmaṇa
ati dukhe sehu dvija bañchuthilā dina |–kha, na, ṭha
– mantra uccāri āśiṣa karai karapatra |–jha, ṭa, ḍha

lg.l: maunabrate basithāi se na diai sambhāṣi | 216 |
basai dr̥ḍha āsane phuṭai lokita karme
baḍa dhārmika dekhi āsi bhagati honti nagrajane | 217 |
micheheṁ bolai mora anna bhojana nāhiṁ
śūnya pabana bhedī muṁ nirañjana dāhi | 218 |
niṣṭhāpara dekhi jane bahuta kale māni
baḍāi dhārmika mādhu pāpaku baḍa bhaẏe
yetebeḷe nidrā yānti se gr̥habāsī loke
udara pūrile se bāhāra hoi āsi
mahā niṣṭhā para pātiṇa maune thāi basi | 222 |
ẏehimti hoi se dinā pāñchasāta galā
boilā anna meñjanamāna ta nāhiṁ ẏethe | 225 |

div.note: –śūnya pabana bhakṣai muṁ (?)rañjana dhyāẏī |–ja, pa

-baḍadhārmika dekhi ẏe pāpaku nirbhaẏe
ghara ākaṭa nāhiṁ pura nirmaḷamaẏe |–ka
–ẏemanta prakāre se dina kete galā |–ḍa, ja, tha, ca
–ẏehimati hoi se māse kete galā |–ṭha, na, kha

lg.l: paraśante lokaṁku bhāta tiuṇa na aṇṭilā | 228 |
se sūpakāraku beṛhi dianti ye gāḷi
ẏeka dne dvijabara rāndhaṇā ghare ṭāki
se chadrama brāhmaṇaku bhitare paśibāra dekhi | 230 |
hāṇḍire khāānte se muṇḍare piṭilā bāḍi
phāṭilā śira tāra paḍilā muhaṁ māḍi | 231 |
nagra lokanta ḍakadilā hoile sabonge meḷi | 232 |
chāṇḍāḷa hāthe kāṛhi pakāi dileka jaḷeṇa | 233 |
śiśupāḷa kahilā, bhīṣme kahilā yebaṇa kathā
ẏe pāmara pāṇḍabe ye na jāṇanti ẏe khaṇḍi
ẏehimate kahnā gauḍā ye khāuacchi bhāṇḍi | 236 |
śiśupāḷara aneka jhiṁghāsa bacana hāde guṇi
mr̥tuku āśrekari tu hariṁki karuchu kaṭāḷa | 238 |
śrījagannāthaṁka śrīcaraṇe damaghoṣa śate sahasra daṇḍa pariṇāmi
bole śiśupāḷara doṣa upikṣā karibā debasvāmī | 239 |
svāmī ṭeḷāi māile ki ṭaḷai mandara
dhūḷi pakāile poti huai ki sāhera | 240 |
duṣṭaṁkara dosa svāmī tuhi se uddharantā
mūrkhaṁkara doṣa svāmī tuhi se sahantā | 241 |
svāmī yamunāra dūḷe kheḷa kheḍibāra beḷe
śiśupāḷa nāma dilu dhariṇa tāku koḷe | 242 |
tu deba śaraṇa pañjara bīradhū mahāprabhma
ariṣṭi doṣa bināśaka karantā deba sabu | 243 |
saẏaḷa uddhāraṇa nātha sakaḷa jana cintā
nabadvīpa sapata sāgara nātha tuhi se uddharantā | 244 |
bhābagrāhī jagannātha tu bhagata ye matsaḷā
samasta kalmaṣa dhaṁsu śarīra tora kaḷā | 245 |
sakaḷa bahmāṇḍa nātha tuhi se dibyacachu
chāra pāmara śiśupāḷakaiṁ tu kopa karuachu | 246 |
svāmi muṇḍe pelile ki basundharī caḷai
kiñchita mātra chāra ẏe śiśupāja aṭai | 247 |
doṣa upekṣā karibā nātha ghenimā daini
śrīkr̥ṣṇa caraṇe śaraṇa granthika sāroḷā dāsa śūdramuni | 248 |
śrījagannātha boile kete daẏinī hou tāta
mote kete bola tohora putrara parākr̥ta | 249 |

div.note: –jaẏatu jagannātha jagata karatā |–jha, ṭa

–svāmī muṇḍe pelāile ki caḷai acaḷa
kiñcha(?)ta chāra pamara aṭai śiśupāḷa |–ka; ja, pa

lg.l: kisa parāpara mote bolure pāmara gauḍā | 251 |
gopāḷa mātraka hoi tohora kisa kaicchā
gopāḷuṇi lochāẏe ghenithibu re ẏe tohora icchā | 252 |
tu kiṁpāiṁ āsure ẏe rājusi sabhāku
kisa samarthya aṭu ture pādārghya ghenimāku | 253 |
brāhmaṇa tule kāhiṁ chāṇḍāḷa lokanta samamari | 254 |
deba pāṣāṇaku kāhiṁ tuṭha pathara hoẏe tula
sebatī puṣye kāhiṁ miśā hoiba arakha phula | 255 |
jāra jātakā pāṇḍabe ye kuḷagotra nāhiṁ
pāṇḍabanta bhaṇḍi khāu tu jagannātha nāma bahi | 257 |
āre āre gauḍa kiṁpāiṁ tu nadeu sambhāṣi
maunabrata hoi kiṁpe sabhāẏeṇa achu basi | 258 |
maraṇe kāraṇa pāibu tora iṣṭa debatā sumara | 259 |
asipatra bulāiṇa urddhva kaiṁ bhmaja toḷi
yahuṁ se keśaba svāmī dekhile aṣṭāṅga
bāte kadaḷī patra prāẏeka kaṁpai tāṁka aṅga | 261 |

div.note: –tu kinā pāmara āsi loḍu rājusi sabhāku |–jha, ṭa; ḍha
–brāhmaṇa sabhāre kāhiṁ caṇḍāḷaku bari |–ka, ja, tha, ña, ca, ḍa

lg.l: śūnyeṇa catraku svāmī āgyāṁ dile ẏekā
bhīṣme droṇe boile ho nakara kicchi goḷa
dharmakaiṁ jhiṁghāsile ho jībana kete kāḷa | 267 |
akāḷa catra tāku ho māḍiṇa paḍilā | 268 |
nirghāta ghāteṇa ho tuṭilā tāra dehī | 269 |
pātaka khaṇḍaṇa nimante dileka pūrṇṇa ye āhuti | 272 |
yujheṣṭhiṁka chaḍa niśvāse lakṣeka kumbha ye ḍhaḷilā
ākāśuṁ bāṇī śubhilā paṇḍu rājā svargakaiṁ galā | 173 |
brahmahatyā pātaka tāra śarīru galā pāra
svargapure basilā se paṇḍu rājā mahābīra | 174 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭaṁku pūjākale yujheṣṭhi kare arghya gheni | 275 |
ratna basra aḷaṁkāra bahuta akṣata kri
caḷanti rājāmāne ye yāhāra nija purī | 278 |
samārji rājānta ye paṭhiāile nija deśe
rājāgaṇe chāhiṁ bhīmasena dileka se āgyāṁ
ye yāhāra deśe thiba na karibā abagyāṁ | 280 |
āmbhara adhīne ho paḍiba yebe kāryya
ẏeka na laṁghibaṭi tume ārekara sīmā
āgyāṁ meṇṭile jāṇithāa muhiṁ se bīra bhīmā | 282 |
samasta rājāẏe bāruṇābante bhīmasena caraṇe pariṇāmi
ẏe toho āgyāṁ āmbhaṁku nirādhāra debasvāmī | 283 |

div.note: –dhr̥tirāṣṭhaṁku pūjākale yujheṣṭhi koṭiẏe ratna gheni | ṭha, ṭa, ḍha
pramantile = paṭhiāile |
tumbha pāde khaṭithibu sadā debasvāmī | kha, ṭha, na, ña, ṭa, jha, tha

lg.l: gaṅgā pāri hoi caḷile samasta rājāmāne
ẏekaātmā hoiṇa caḷile beni ye nr̥pati | 286 |
trigartta boilā svāmī muṁ matsadeśara narupati
mohora tājya baḷeṇa chaḍāi gheniacchi birāṭa nr̥pati | 287 |
aṇḍira naba sahasra bacchā lakṣe māī | 288 |
ẏeteka godhana mora chaḍāi gheni acchi baḷe
āho caitana birāṭaku dr̥śa ta nohanti pañchu bhāi
bhīmasena boilā birāṭa galāni ẏethe nāhiṁ | 290 |
śiśupāḷakaiṁ dahana karibi mote āgyāṁ debā svāmī | 293 |
svāmī ye yāhā arjilā tāhā bhmañjilā yugate
apāra kāḷahuṁ tahā mr̥tu diśuthilā mote | 294 |
ẏemāna āgyāṁ hoilāni āṇa bhaṇḍāra gharu | 295 |

div.note: - driyodhana āśrite yāiṁ śaraṇa sambhāilā |–jha, ṭa, ḍha
- ye yāhā arjilā tāhā pāilā pratakṣe |–ṭa, jha, ḍha

lg.l: dibya palaṁke nei śuāile śiśupāḷa kaḷebara
aneka bhagati hoile se deba dharmarājā | 298 |
abicchanne dāna hoilā bāuna bhaṇḍārara dhana
rājānta dianti tāḍa toḍhara bāhuṭi jagadaḷā
śire simantrinī mukuṭa kuṇḍaḷa mukutā ratnamāḷā | 301 |
śāḍhi prasāda gheni caḷile samasta rājāgaṇamāna | 302 |
samasta rājāẏe ye sādhu sādhu bhāṣi
pāṇḍura āpāda khaṇḍaṇa hou paṇḍu huantu svarga bāsī | 303 |
bho deba yujheṣṭhi āmbhara āṣya gheni brata
śatr̥ māri pañchu kaṭaka madhyeṇa hoa ẏekachatra | 304 |
prāpata hou tote manare yāhā icchi | 305 |
ẏehi dvadeha gheni svarge basa ho yujheṣṭhi | 306 |

div.note: - sapata dvīpe tu hoa ẏekachatrī |–tha, ja; ña, ḍa, ka, ja, gha; pa

lg.l: daita dānaba tote jiṇantā kehi nohu | 307 |
indrapraśasta yamapraśasta hastinā jaintā bāruṇā pañchudeśa
cirāñchana hoiṇa rājya karantu tohora bongśa | 308 |
pañchu rājya jambodvīpa tote hoibāka prāpata | 310 |
debaruṣi brahmaruṣi rājaruṣi śireṇa dile arghya
āmbhara bāñcchāẏe tote prāpata hou svarga | 311 |
aneka śītaḷa drabya dharmarāja āpaṇe dianti dekhi | 312 |
panīra śītaḷa jaḷe ruṣiẏe karanti āṁchobane | 313 |
sāmānya nohai se aṭai baḍa jaṇe
tahiṁra arthe catra pāilā sābadhāne śuṇa | 318 |

div.note: - deba dānaba tote jiṇantā kehi nohu |–jha, ḍha, ṭha, na, kha
- śiśupāḷa mahimāṁ tote kahibā ẏehikṣaṇa |–ṭha, ḍha, pha, na

lg.l: jaẏe bijaẏe tāku na dile bhitaraku paśi | 320 |
ẏeka laẏe kari dhātā tāhāṁku upalekhi
ābara ākāśa pure yāiṁ kisa muṁ karibi
śūnya pabana bhakṣiṇa se kaḷapa yāẏe basi | 325 |

div.note: - padmayoni brahmāgala baikuṇṭha svarge pare ‘ka’re adhika pāṭha |–
tāraṇa nāme baikuṇṭha bijaẏe bahmarāśi
nabayuga pariyante brahmā tapare yāiṁ basi |
aṇākāra biṣṇura se āsana aṭai

lg.l: sahasra yuga tape yāhāku bheṭa nāhiṁ |–
lg.note: - bāhuḍi pitāmaha āsai ākāśa svarga marge |–da, ña, tha
- sarasvatī nadītīre śukḷāmbara bana lāge |–ca, tha, ña
- pabana nirodhiṇa se basilā ujāṇi |–ca, ja, ña

lg.l: ẏehānta hakāriṇa āgyāṁ dileka deba banamāḷī | 329 |
tumbhe ẏebe bege yiba go madhya bhmabanaku
tumbhe chāriheṁ yāiṇa tāhāra tapa bhāñja
kāma kaṣṭhora kari śarīra tāra gañja | 331 |
dekhile dhātāra ye kaṣṭhora tapa mr̥tti | 332 |
kareṇa sapata svarabeṇī ye pinākī adhāṭi
kokiḷa dhuni susvare se gābanti banitā | 334 |
dharma bināśanī se aṭanti dhūrtti chāri | 335 |
bahuta bidhi aḷaṁkāra jhīna ptanī kācheṇī | 336 |
thana jānu yaubana diśai samasta phuṭi | 337 |
lg.note: –tumbhe chariheṁ yāiṇa tāra darpa gañja |–ja, ḍa, ña
–kāma jhagaḍa kari maẏāṇa śare khañja |–ka
nirañjanaṁka āgyāṁẏe se caḷile yubatī |-ca, ña, tha, ja, ḍa
yugate nabayuba ābara prema rasakārī |-cha
–dharma nāśa nimante se āsichanta sundarī |-ca, ja, ña, ḍa
–śarīra diśanti tāṁka svārṇṇa patra jāṇi |–ṭha, na, kha

lg.l: kṣaṇe kṣaṇe abalokana chāhāṁṇī chaṭaḷa māẏā
samāsyā na kari se ṭhāri dile kara gheni | 340 |
dekhiṇa ārata se hoilā ādi brahmabettā
ḍhaḷilā amoha reta brahma hoilā khaḷitā | 343 |
amoha reta ye gaḷita hoilā chāridhāra
āho dukheṇa arjilā durāpada ẏe mohora tapa
tāhā nāśakala lo dekhāi nija rūpa | 346 |
ẏeḍe baḍa tapa ye bhāñjilā kama sukha
yāa chāriheṁ tumbhe lo hoasi amokṣa | 347 |
niṣphaḷa hou tumbhara lo ẏe naba yaubana | 348 |
lg.note:
- kṣaṇe kṣaṇe abalokita tāhāmkara jānu
kamare asāṣṭama ye pitāmahara tanu |-na, kha, ṭha
–se amoha bīryyu hoile chāriputra abatāra |–ka; tha
–niṣphaḷa hou tumbhara lo thana yaubana |–ca, ḍa, ja
lg.l: āho caitana mahābrahma puruṣa śāpya dilā bairāge
putranta koḷe dhātā dhailā ati srāge | 349 |
tohora prasanne nātha saṁsāre hvanti mokṣa
tote bheṭi kiṁpe āmbhe hoilu amokṣa | 351 |
bikaḷa dekhiṇa ye prasanna hoile beda chari
chāriheṁ hua tumbhe lo sapana sundarī | 352 |
sarūpe loḍile tumbhe nohiba manara hiāḷi | 353 |
stirīṁka ramaṇa kāḷe karib puruṣa rūpa beśe
sapana sundarī rūpa lo hou tumbhari gātra | 355 |
nānā abasthā kari bindu ye caḷābanti | 357 |
bābu biṣṇu nātha nāśakalā re tapa ye mohora | 359 |
lg.note:
– haraṣeṇa kumāre se bhāṣanti yahuṁ koḷe
kanyāẏe kāraṇa māgile haraṣara beḷe |–cha, ka, gha
–sarūpa loḍile tumbhe nohib tini oḷi |–ja, ḍa, ca
–sapana sundarī tumbhe hua lo jagta |-ja, ḍa, ña, ca, tha
–nānā abasthā deiṇa bīryya se ḍhāḷanti |–ña, tha; ḍa; ja

lg.l: snaka sananta sanātana ābara kumāra manu | 360 |
tāhākaiṁ āgyāṁ dile tu pātāḷa baikuṇṭhaku yāasi | 361 |
aṇākāra puruṣaṁku tu kari yā daraśana
mañcha jagata pātāḷa gajata sutaḷa taḷātaḷa
ẏe bidhi sapata pātāja ye ẏesnaka bhedi
ẏete baikuṇṭha jiṇi galāka hāde manu
na paḍhi paṇḍita na sādhi yogeśvara
madhyapuruṁ aile muni beḷa deḍha ye prahara | 368 |
lg.note: –satya ācari baikuṇṭha sāmapāḷa baikuṇṭha sthānare ‘ḍa’ pothire alagā pāṭha–
satya ācari baikuṇṭha svāmī pātāḷa baikuṇṭha
nīḷa baikuṇṭha ye līḷa baikuṇṭha |
rasānteka baikuṇṭha manorama baikuṇṭha
sarasija baikuṇṭha ye niścaḷa baikuṇṭhā
sāra baikuṇṭha sumana baikuṇṭha |-
–manu maharuṣi tahuṁ kaleka gamana |-ka; gha; ña; kha; cha; ḍha

lg.l: sāra baikuṇṭhe prabeśa tinilakṣa baraṣa pariyante | 369 |
āho rāẏe se sāra baikuṇṭhe dvārapāḷa jaẏa ye bijaẏe
dui gadā ghenichanti mandara pabongta jāṇi
tambhara catra prāẏe bulānti naẏana beni | 371 |
atigaṇḍa name yoga biṣṭi nāme karaṇa
ẏesaneka yoge manu prabeśa bakuṇṭha dvāreṇa | 373 |
jaẏe bijaẏe duibhāi tāhānta dekhi hasi | 374 |
cauṣaṭhi yojana uccharga siṁhadvāra keḷiẏā beni
jaẏe bijaẏe hasile kare karatāḷa gheni | 375 |
batiśa batiśa yojana se duhiṁkari kara
kīṭa prāẏe tāhāṁku diśai meru ye mandara | 376 |
beda ādhyāna śabade kampilā pātāḷa jagata
sāra baikuṇṭha ṭhāru kampilā pātāḷa bhmabana pariyanta | 378 |
manu boile bābhiẏe āśiṣa āmbhara gheni

lg.note: –iśāṇa dvāre dvārapāḷa jaẏe ye bijaẏe | ka; cha; gha; pha, ḍha
–cauṣaṭhi yojana siṁhadvāra ye koḷadvāra beni |–“ketka pothi”
trijībī hoithāa ẏehi ye bhmabana |–tha, ḍa, ja; ña; ca
lg.l: kuśahātha hoiṇa muni bāñccha(?)ta taṇḍuḷa yāci
āṣya ārogya hou boli kalyāṇa muni bāñccha(?) | 380 |
ajapā mantre sādhi se agyāna bāḷakhilyā
puṇa puṇa beda ādhyāna padmayonira baḷā | 381 |
jaẏe bijaẏe boile tohora kisa āṣya
tuhi se mānaba re āmbhanta kr̥ āśiṣya | 383 |
upahāsa kariṇa se aneka jhiṁghāsa boli
paḷā yā bolikari se pakāi dile peli | 384 |
jaẏa bjaẏaṁkara kara pabana lāgiṇa tanu
gaḍheṇa bhitaraku se paśite kalā mati | 387 |
jaẏe bijaẏe boile tu aṭu re nillaja
chāpoḍe māri tora muṇḍa cchiḍaibu āja | 390 |
ẏemante se mahātamā sahasre baraṣa rahilā

div.note: ajapā mantrabettā se agyāna bāḷakhilā |–pha, cha, ka

- rākṣasa tumbhe hoa jaẏe ye bijaẏe
mrttya pure tumbhe kara nānā apacaẏe |–na, ṭha, kha

lg.l: yahuṁṇa tāhānta paśite na dile dvārapāḷe
āre biṣṇuṁkara dvārapāḷa hoi tumbhe mahata hoiba
nirddaẏa chāṇḍāḷa tumbhe re aṭa mandajāti
yāare rākṣasa janma tumbhe hoa jaẏe ye bijaẏe | 395 |
tapabaḷa bhāñjiṇa re nāśakala mora dharma
asura kuḷe tumbhe huasi re janama | 396 |
manura śāpye ye tāku lāgilā mahābhaẏe
pabitra bāḷakhiḷā se āmbhe kuśaketura tanu
muhiṁ se sānaśiśu nāma mohora manu | 398 |
sāra baikuṇṭha aili aṇākāra puruṣakaiṁ dekhi | 399 |
tumbhe dui pāmara re kala mandabuddha
tapodhana gyānījanaṁku tumbhe dvāra kiṁpe nirodhi | 400 |
jaẏe bijaẏe boile ho pāilu sandeha
śāpakaiṁ kāraṇa ye mukati ẏebe kaha | 401 |

div.note: –ẏeṭharu tumbhe duheṁ re caḷiya jhaṭati |–kha; ṭha
- jaẏe bijaẏe boile ho na pailu sandeha | gha, pha, ña
- śāpaku anugraha mukati ẏebe kaha |-cha, gha, ḍha, pha, ḍa, ca

lg.l: manu boile ẏebe cihnika ṭiki re mūrkha
asura kuḷe tumbhe janme janme abatari
aneka kāḷe āsi baikuṇṭha pure basiba | 405 |
yadyapi nāraẏaṇa tule tumbhe hoiba bairi
bāhuḍiṇa āsi tumbhe ẏehi baikuṇṭhe basa | 407 |
āho caitana se manu ruṣiṁkara śāpe
asura yonire upujile se gatajanmara mahāpāpe | 408 |
pr̥thī uddhāraṇe barehā rūpe tāku māile śrībatsa | 409 |
narasiṁha rūpe nārāẏaṇa tāhāra bidārile bapu | 410 |

div.note: pr̥thī chaḷe tāku māile śrībatsi | ḍa, cha

lg.l: tetaẏā yugare ẏe harile debī sītā
śrīrāma nārāje ẏe hoile na śaṁgatā | 414 |
dvāpara yuge se rukmiṇīṁki kale icchā
sahithile deba na kale baḍa kaicchā | 415 |
kehuṇasi janme ẏe catra na pāile
śāluhiṁ ẏehi nikaṭe badha ye hoiba | 423 |
śuṇa ho manurāẏe ādi sarjanara kathā
yahuṁ se chedile hari śiśupāḷara mathā | 424 |
piṇḍaru ātmā bāhāra hoi rahilā śūnya madhya | 425 |
hākai mātaḷī śuṇa tu putra batse | 426 |
āsa āsa bimāne basa deba tuhi
āmbhe dvāra na chāḍilu manuruṣira śāpye
dāḍheṇa bidāraṇa ho kalu janma ādi | 433 |
satyayuga uttāreṇa deba tretaẏā yuga bhogī
rāma abatāre jāta hoilu parama yogī | 435 |
sītā haraṇe āmbhe deba hoiluṁ tohora bibādī

div.note: –jaẏatu jaẏatu gobinda ye kr̥ṣṇa abatāra |–kha, ṭha, na

harilu medinī hoilu deba dānī
danteṇa bidāra nātha kalma āmbhe beni |–ca
–hiraṇyataśipu rupe svargakai icchi |–ṭha, na
–lakṣmī abatāre sītaẏā haraṇe mr̥tayogī |-ka, kha, na, cha, ḍha

lg.l: laṁke nāśakalu deba kodaṇḍa dhari kare | 437 |
dantabatra nāśilu rukmiṇī bibhā hoibāra beḷa | 438 |
svamī yāmaḷā arjuna ye bhāñjilu bāḷakāḷe
pādeṇa śakaṭā bhāñjilu deba kheḍhara kuḍhūhoḷe | 440 |
dustaru tāri nātha ẏebe karilu mote pāri | 441 |
kāḷe kāḷe duṣṭaṁku tu karu ye saṁhāra
tu deba ananta koṭi brahmāṇḍa ṭhākura | 442 |
jaḷacara paṁkacara harilu deba sabuṁkari darpa | 443 |
tuhi bidāraṇa nātha kalu rakṣa bhaẏe
māḷi sumāḷī ye tu māilu pratakṣa | 444 |
heti praheti puṇa hoile deba dhaṁsī
bhañjana abhañjana deba ẏe dui kauṇopa
bilaṁka deśare deba harilu tāhāṁkara darpa | 446 |
kumbha nikumbha deba ẏe dui daitya māri
apāra janma helu tohora se bairi | 447 |

div.note: –r̥kmiṇīṁki icchilu deba prāpata hoibāra kāḷa |–gha, ñja, tha
–laṁke nāśakalu deba dūsaha samara |–tha, ña
–bajra kapaca ẏe dui daityaṁkara nāma |–ṭha, na

lg.l: bajrāṅga kāḷānaḷa ẏe dui daitya nāma
kehuṇasi kāḷe deba na māilu catraghāte | 450 |
sādhu sādhu mahimāṁ tora deba kahnā abatāra
dustaruṁ tāra ṇa nātha tuhi se karu pāra | 451 |
bhāriyā haraṇu āna deba acchi ki kaṭāḷa
mukatakaiṁ kāraṇa nātha kala ho śrībacchi
aneka tusti kariṇa se paṇḍita mahāgyāne
bijaẏe kalā yāi se puṣyaka bimāne | 454 |
aneka pāṭa chatra yogāile biṣṇu gaṇe
mr̥kati arthe bhābanā se sāroḷā dāsa kabi | 456 | | 12204 |

div.note: –kehuṇasi kāḷe deba māilu catraghāte |–ṭha, na
–tāhā upekṣā nātha kalu sabongkāḷa |–pha. gha, na, ṭha, kha
–baikuṇṭha dvāre yāi bijaẏe tatakṣaṇa |-ca, ja; ḍha, ñja, ḍa; tha

div.head:
{@duryodhanara apamāna, ananta śire pr̥thibī sthāpana,
sandhyābāḷīra bibāha o siṁha śr̥gāḷa kathā@}

lg.l: śuṇa baibasuta manu kahile agasti mahāruṣi
puṇa baikuṇṭha dvāre yāiṁ āborile beni
basile jaẏe bijaẏe yoga bhoga gheni | 2 |
ẏekamane śuṇa tumbhe kumbha ruṣiṁkara santati | 3 |
lakṣe rājā yete se sabhāre baraṇa
kehi na dekhile ki tāhāra maraṇa | 5 |
kahanti mahātamā se ghaṭa ruṣiṁkara batsa

div.note: –basile jaẏe bijaẏe yugabhoga gheni |–ka -pha

lg.l: kehi rakhi nuārile tāhāra nija gātra | 12 |
dekhuṁ dekhuṁ māẏā ẏetheṁ kaleka nārāẏaṇa | 13 |
ẏe mahāsabhāre kūṭa kaleka ye hari
chapana koṭi yādaba samaste chanti ẏetha
ẏe mahā sabhāẏeṇa ta achanti saṁbhari | 16 |
deśa ujāḍi rājya tu kara bhaganasta | 17 |
pārile abhimāna pheḍa ho śālu bīra
yāa ẏehikṣaṇi ho daṇḍa gheni tora | 18 |
driyodhana boilā na bhāḷa mane bhīti
āmbhe sāhā thile ki achai durugati | 19 |
ẏe yebe kūṭa ẏethi kaleka nārāẏaṇa
ẏeḍe baḍa sāhāpakṣa thāuṁ hoilā akāraṇa
samasta doṣa na pāiba ki bacana | 22 |
dekhuṁ dekhuṁ biśvasa ghātakī ye hoila
rakhi yebe nuārila bola kimpe dila | 23 |
piṭhi rakṣā karibāku yebe nohiba bhājana
kaṭāḷi śakuni kahilā yāiṁ bege rāge
bāhāra śālu rāẏe ye bacana sarāge | 25 |
dvārikāre kathā bābu samasta lāgai tote
āmbhe pacha hoi ye yibuṁṭi dinā kete | 35 |
āmbhe yāuṁ sina boli putranta tiāri | 36 |
āsthāne thāi āgyāṁ dileka dharma ye yujheṣṭhi
bābu āsthānaku uṭhi āsa mohora katiki | 41 |
dvādaśa pabacchare galāni ẏekai ye yuṇa | 42 |
saṣṭika pābaccha boli baḍhāi dilā pāda
āsthāna dekhāi boila basa yā kurupati | 45 |
iṭhi katiki tāra kaneka khambeka diśilā | 46 |
39|2–driyodhanakaiṁ hakāri āṇa mora kati |–ḍa, ṭha, ña, ca
40|2–driyodhanakaiṁ sannidhye āṇilā āgyāṁ niradhāya gheni |–ka, tha, cha
43|2–tinitāḷa agāda jaḷe paḍilā āsi pāda |–ṭa, jha
44|2–begeṇa hātha dhari āṇilā sannidhyāna |–ja, tha, da, ña
kuruḷi bobi pāḍile ye yubā rājāmāna | 48 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile bābu katiki mora āsa
ẏe mohora āstāna ḍāhāṇa pākhare basa | 50 |
puṇihiṁ bāhā dhari oṭāri āṇilā brikodara | 52 |
yujheṣṭhi boile bābu ghena arghya ratnamāna
laiṁ darāṇḍaiṁ rājā kicchi nāhiṁ puṇa | 53 |

div.note:
- khamba bolikari ye āuji basilā nirbhare
uttānaśāẏī hoi paḍilā sātatāḷa gabhīre |–jha; ṭa, ḍha
–kuruḷi bobi dile rājagaṇamāna |–ṭa, jha; ḍha

–“ẏe mohora āstāna ḍāhāṇa pākhare basa” padapare
‘ña’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
āstāna uparaku āsibāra beḷa
bāri ta nuārilā jaḷa ki ẏehu sthaḷa |
hāthare boḷi dhailā pinddhalā basana
jagannāthaṁku āsi ṭhāri hasila bhīmasena |
tahuṁ driyoadhana sabhā uparaku yānte
basa boli boile yujheṣṭhi nr̥panāthe |
māṇikyai pīḍhā boli basuacchi laiṁ
nabakāḷa gabhīre paḍilāka yāiṁ |

lg.l: tani pābaccha taḷe paḍilā muhaṁ māḍi | 54 |
taḷaku muṇḍa ye beni goḍa uparaku
puṇihiṁ uṭhanteṇa paḍilā māḍi tāra buku | 55 |
cakṣu thāu thāu kimpe hoilu tu andha | 57 |
jaḷa samaṣṭika boli ye tuhi nuārilu bāri
hastināku boli rājā galā dukha sahi | 59 |
kuśaśeyyā kari rājā śoilā kapāṭa pāḍi | 61 |
toho prasāde ananta mohora sakaḷa kāryyasiddhi | 63 |
nāgabaḷa gheni tāta pātāḷaku yā yā | 64 |
yujheṣṭhiṁki aneka puruṣārtha kale laṁkāra bibhīṣaṇe | 65 |

div.note: –bāpara prāẏe cakṣu kora abaśya hoila |–ja, pha
–kuśa śeyyā kari rājā śoilā muhaṁ māḍi |–tha, ja, ṛa

lg.l: aneka drabyanta ye apūbong ratna aḷaṁkāra
śrījagannātha boile ho yāa yā bibhīṣeṇa
puṇya thile se dekhuthāi nānā apūbong kathāmāna | 68 |
bibhīṣaṇa boilā gosāiṁ ẏehi dvāpara yuge
kaḷiyuge bho deba dekhibi tote kāhiṁ
kebaṇa bhmabanaku boli muṁ thibaiṁ bāṭa chāhiṁ | 70 |
nīḷa sundara pabongte kalpabaṭa taḷe miḷi
āmbhe tahiṁ bije karibu bauddha rūpa dhari | 72 |
mithuna māsa śukaḷa pakṣa dutīẏāra tithi
se dinare rathayātrā karibu āmbhe kheḍi
arddhaghaḍi pariyante āmbhe se dina hoibuṁ dakṣiṇa mūrati
laṁkā gaḍaku dr̥śya hoibuṁ āmbhe tote | 76 |

div.note: –laṁka stirīmānanta bhaḷi bhaḷi ratna gheni |-ja, ñja, tha
–dekhili muṁ kr̥ṣṇarupa tora anurāge |-cha, na, ṭha, kha

lg.l: yāa yā bibhīṣaṇa boli āgyāṁ dile svāmī
daṇḍa gheni bibhīṣaṇa caḷai heḷuṁ heḷuṁ | 78 |
aneka sambhabonge se thāṭha saini caḷāi
labaṇa para hoi laṁkā gaḍaku yāi | 80 |
āgyāṁ dile jagannāthe pātāḷa svarga yā | 81 |
ananta boilā mohora tahiṁki ye karigalā digabije
dhanuhuḷe pr̥thī dhailā se kāhāra ātmaje | 82 |

div.note:
– kūpāra pāri hoi bibhīṣaṇa laṁka gaḍaku yāi
ānande samaste aneka ye uṣata hoi |-ṭa; ḍha
kūpāra–samudra
–“dhanuhuḷe pr̥thī dhailā se kāhāra ātmaje” pāṭhapare ‘jha, ṭa, ḍha’ re adhikā pāṭha :–
ananta boile mote ye nimantraṇa karigalā
sehi se dhanuhuḷe ye pr̥thīki dhailā |
se tebaṇa jana deba mote kahani bichāri
tahiṁra carita muṁ śuṇai debahari |
brahmā ādikari yadi hoibe īśvare
kāhāri beḷe pr̥thī basāi nohi dhanuhuḷe |
narāẏaṇa ubāca śuṇa he basundhare
pañchaśira bahi bolāi īśvare | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre]

lg.l: tāhara crita ho tu najāṇu ananta basundharī | 83 |

div.note: [pūbong pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara]
rudra prahāre tāhāra cchiḍi pḍilāka śira
dhātāra śira rudra nāśilā nija kara |
tahuṁṇa yebaṇa rodhira paḍilā bhūmira
adabhmate hoi tahuṁ puruṣe utaptti
mote ādhāra bege diaboli boilāka dhāti |
bedapati bile īśvaraku rakṣa trinetra |
tini bhmabane hara nuārile rahi
brahmāra āgyāṁ boli mukha na chāhiṁle kehi |

–“tāhāra carita ho najāṇu ananta basundahrī” -pāṭha pare
“ka” pothire adhika pāṭha :–
brahmā ye bibādī hoile īśvare
adatmate muṇḍeka jāta kaleka bedabare |
īśvara debatā rājge kaleka prahāra
brahmākara muṇḍ kaāṭi pakāile debahara |
dhātāra śira lāgila rudra debatāra bāmakara
tahiṁra rudhira ye paḍilā bhūmira |
adabhmate puruṣa hoilā utapatti
boilā ādhāra mote diasi bedapati |

lg.l: īśvaraṁku boile dhātā ẏe keuṁṇa br̥ttānta | 90 |
muṁ ye pañcha bakatra parama yogī
jaḍita mantre kimpāi gāẏatirī ye lāgi | 91 |
ẏe mohor asadyuṁ jāta bāma ghora īśāna tatapuruṣa
dhātubādya puruṣa muhiṁ bihi ye bidhātā | 95 |
brahmāra śire muṇḍeka hoilā jāta laẏā

div.note: –jana nimante śiba gāẏatrī bhāṣi |–gha–
–barjita mantre paśiba gāẏatrī ye lāgi |–na–

- ẏemohora sadānāma ghoṣai sadāmukha
mohor pañchu badane karai ẏehi bhogya |–gha–

lg.l: se pañchu baktara muṇḍa pakāile moḍi | 99 |
brahmāra śira rudra debatāra kare lāgi | 100 |
na tuṭāi śira se īśvara kara bāsuṁ | 102 |
se śroṇiru puruṣe ye hoilā bāhāra | 103 |
dhātā mukha chāhiṁ sehu māgai ādhāi | 104 |
āre brahma asura tu ẏehākaiṁ bhakṣa | 105 |
aneka samara sehu kalā ruda tule
sahasre baraṣe tāku raṇe na aṇṭile | 107 |

div.note:
- “trāse īśvara tahuṁ paḷābanti bhāji”–sthānare ‘ka’ pothire
alagā o adhika pāṭha – (abaśiṣṭhāṁśa pr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: sūryyaku chāhiṁ boile se rudra debatā
āho dinakara debatā mote kaṭāḷa karucchi brahma ye daitā | 110 |

div.note: (pūbongpr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara)
īśvaṁku goḍāiacchi brahma daita
asura bhaẏe paḷāi acchi tripurānta |
tinisurge deba nu ārile rahi
brahmahatyā kale boli īśvaraṁka mūkha kehi na chāhiṁ |
bimukhe ḍeiṁ paḍile ākāśa sindhujaḷe
trāhi trāhi nārāẏaṇa boli bolanti bikaḷe |
yoga nidrāẏe nārāẏaṇa jaḷaśāhī
sahasreka yojanu bhmaja dileka baḍhāi |
āśāsī īśvaraṁku deba basāile kati
bhaẏe kalā brahmadatya dekhiṇa narāẏaṇa bhīṣmamr̥tti |
bhmajara muṇḍa de de boliṇa māgi
nārāẏaṇa boile brahmahatyā tu kalu parama yogī |
pachāranti nāraẏaṇa śaṇa ho brahmadatya
kisa arthe kaṭāḷa tu karu tripurānta |
kope brahma asura bolai biṣṇuṁku
chāḍa īśvaraṁku muṁ bhakṣibi tumbhaṁu |
brahma asuraku bolanti śrīpati
preta pichāṇa tumbhere rudhire triputi |
āpaṇā dakṣiṇa kare deba catra dhari
tinidhāra kari bāmabhmaja ciri dile daitāri |

lg.l: ādity adebatā boile tu brahmahatyā kalu doṣa
āditya debatāra jhiṁghāsa śiṇiṇa deba kāśī
īśvara boile mote brahma daita karucchi kaṭāḷa | 113 |
iśvaraṁka mukha na chāhīṁ indra ye debatā
nabaśata nīḷa ye ẏekapāde gale jiṇi
jaḷa hāndoḷa baḍa hoilā sindhu manthana parāẏe
se bahma daitamku hoilā tahiṁ āṇṭhu āṇi | 119 |

div.note: –“boile rudra tu kaluta brahmahatyā” pare “ṭha, na” re adhikā pāṭha –
ākhaṇḍaḷa boileka kala brahmahatyā
teśu tumbhaṁku goḍāi acchi brahmabettā |
mohora mantrare tumhbe paśa samudrare
tatakṣaṇe śaṁkara paśile se jaḷare |–ṭha, na

jaḷa hāndoḷa hoilā sindhu madhye
dui jaṇaṁkara tahiṁ paḍibāru sādhye |–gha

lg.l: urddhve ḍāka dianti nārāẏaṇa ho mote rakha | 120 |
tni ahasra yojana yāẏe baḍhilā benibhmaja | 123 |
catrara teja dekhi dūreṇa sehi rahi
svāmī brahmā mote peṣile ādhāra nimante
mohor aādhāra ye khaṇḍilu puruṣaṁka uttama
mohoa śarīra dahane ye tohora kisa dharma | 127 |
catra gheni tāhā nibrati kale ruṣīkeśi | 128 |
de de bolikari se bistāra karai tuṇḍa | 129 |
nabaniśi catra deba dhaile bāma kare | 130 |

div.note: –catra teje tāku nibāraṇa kale śrībatsi |-gha
–de de boli se biśrāma na karai tuṇḍa |-pha

lg.l: se brahmāra muṇḍa ye rudra kare acchi lāgi
biṣṇura rudhira tahiṁ ḍhālile ati begi | 132 |
īśvara debatā śarīru dile ye māẏeṁsa
boile ẏe brahma rākṣasaku pakā māri | 136 |
śasta uparaku dhāiṁlā kopa ye mūrati | 137 |
ākāśe sabonge kampile trāsile deba dharma | 138 |
pātāḷa ādikari kampilā sapata ye dvīpa
candra sūryya trāsile udaẏe jyoti nāhiṁ | 140 |

div.note:
–“bhmajaru tumba paramāṇe bahilā rakata”-pāṭhapare
“ca; cha; ña; ja, ḍa, ḍha; ṭa, jha, tha” pothire alagā o adhika aṭha |:- [abaśiṣṭhāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]
pūbongpr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara :–
dvādaśa baraṣa bahilā rodhira tinidhāra
tathāpi daitara ye na pūrilā odara |
īśvaraṁku de de boli māgai brahma daitā
catra toḷi dekhāile nāgaẏaṇa debatā |
brahmāṁkara kapāḷa biṣṇuṁkara rodhira
īśvaraṁkara bibhūti medi puruṣeka kale abatāra |
mr̥tu añjībanī mantra kahile tāra karṇṇe
bitrami boilā mote sāṁgrāma deẏesi janārddane |
nāṛaẏaṇa boile tora nāma hou praśasta
brahma daitāku māri uakṣākara ẏe japata |
nārāẏaṇaṁkara bacane dhāmai kharakari
śastara tule se praśapta yuddha kara
bahuta yuddhakale se na yāi gaṇitā
pr̥thi sahi nuārila boli bidyādhara puruṣa debatā
śūnya śabada śuṇi nāraẏaṇa bege uṭhi
madhye prabeśa hoiṇa dhaile duhiṁkari bhmajagoṭi |
ẏe yugare yuddha tumbhara ẏetekeheṁ rahu
tretaẏā yugaku boli thokāẏeka rahithāu |

lg.l: tretaẏā yuge tumbhe bāḷī sugrībara jāta | 148 |
tu ho bāsuki pachārilu arjunara mahimāṁ
ye se arjuna se ādi mahātamā | 152 |
brahmāra muṇḍa ye bāsebara teja prakāśa | 153 |

lg.note: –tretaẏā yuge tumbhe ketu mahāketu ākhyāta | gha, pha

lg.l: dhanura huḷe dhariacchi se sapata dvīpā bhmabi | 158 |
sadhu sādhu pārthiba ho jībana tohora dhani
ẏe mahābhārā pr̥thibī tohora gocare deigali debasvāmī | 161 |
jagabadana svāmī hr̥de na dharibu mote bāci | 162 |
ẏebe pr̥thibī chāḍa ho mora śire
kisa dei bhagati pātha muṁ hoibi tohore | 163 |
ye yāhā ṭhābe ho lagāa tora pheru
na puṇa nāgarājā tu sambhāḷi nuāru | 165 |
ẏe mohora sada bahantā pr̥thī chāḍi mote desi | 166 |
āhe ananta nāga tu ye dharithilu pr̥thibī
puṇa na bahilu dinā kete ẏe bhmabi | 167 |
na bahi bahibā ta aṭe durāpada
yisa tisa hoi medinī ṭaḷile paḍiba āpāda | 168 |
lg.note: –“na puṇa nāgarājā tu sambhāḷi nuāru” pāda pare adhikā pāṭha–

āho nāgarājā tu bahiṇa thāu nitye |
ẏe bhārā na bahiṇa thilu dinā kete |
–bahuta ratna gheni se kalā pāda pūjā |–gha, ca, ña, tha, ḍa
lg.l: tote ta sampada ẏe durāpada mahābhārā
sambhāḷa sambhāḷa boḷi boilā bāsabara bāḷa
ananta chāmureṇa ubhā hoicchi bīra phālaguni | 171 |
kisa dei bhagati tote hoibi mahābīrā | 173 |
medinī dhaili sinā āmbhara nija kāryye | 174 |
ananta boilā yebe anugraha acchi mote
se tote nityāprati khaṭiṇa thilā ẏethi | 178 |
bharijā prāẏeka hoiṇa khaṭithilā manara hiāḷi
ye tohora icchā ẏebe bichāri kāryyakara | 180 |
lg.note: –tote asambhaba ẏe durāpada mahābhārā |–jha, ṭa, ḍha, ta; tha
–pātilā ananta pheṇi bahilā mahābhārā |–ṭa, ḍha, ka, pa
lg.l: putranta rāiṇa āgyāṁ dilā ye ananta nāgadebā
pure utsaba karāa sanhyābāḷīki karāibā bibhā | 181 |
śuṇiṇa sānanda ye hoile samasta nāgaloka
boile aneka puṇya āmbhara ye pātāḷa purayāka | 182 |
aneka sānanda se hoile uḍaṅga baḷe
bibhāra sambhabong bidhi se karanti pātāḷe | 183 |
ye bidhi maṅgaḷa karābante jautiṣa purohite

lg.note: –nānā utsabe dhaiṁle hoiṇa ucchuka |–kha, gha
–aneka ratna bhūṣaṇa kale sabonge bāḷī |–ka, gha, pa
lg.l: ghr̥ta pāraṇā kale pratiṣṭhā arthe kari
bandāpanā kari sambhabong nele kumāra kumarī | 193 |
bara kanyā prabaśa hoile anteśvara pure
maṅgaḷa gīta gāi se huḷahuḷi dyanti ye dvāre | 194 |
amr̥ta chaḍa raseṇa bhojana kaleka barakanyā
āṁchobana sāriṇa arjuna gheniṇa nāgeṇī aparṇṇā | 195 |
dvāre maṅgaḷa dhuni bhāṣanti sakaḷa yugatī | 196 |
puruṣa baśa bidyāẏe se mohilā phālaguni | 200 |
prāṇe prāṇe arjunaku nāgeṇi thāi khati

lg.note: –parihāse gīta gābanti beḍhiṇa yubatī |-ta. ja; ña, ḍha; tha

–prahāna karābanti jaratā brahmachārī |–ṭa, ḍha
bara kanyāku se yoge hastagranthi kari |-kha. na, ṭha
–pañchu prāṇa dei arjunaṁku nāgeṇi thāi khaṭi |–tha, ña, ca
lg.l: sandhyābāḷī tejyā karite na baḷai mana
aneka sampadeṇa se ye gale rājāmāne
mahāmāẏā sabhā dilā maẏa nāmeṇa danabe | 207 |
abaḍe citra lekhana śūnya khamba chāḷa
bāraṇa na yāi sehu ābara aṇākāra | 209 |
śatr̥ gaḷa kaṇḍāka aṭai se sabhāra nāma
se sabha tāhāku dr̥śya nohai kadācite | 211 |
mane kintu kari uṭhilā kururāja debe | 212 |
nikaḷaṁka citte se ye na galā sabhāku
aneka jhiṁghāsa pāilā se āstāne uthibāku | 213 |
lg.note: –sanhyābāḷi chāḍi pātha āsika nāhiṁ mana |–jha, ka
–ẏekāmātra briyodhana sabhāre galā apamāne |–ka, kha, cha, na, ṭha
–mahā candra māẏeā se aṭai kuṭila |(keteka pothi)
–bhagati bhābe lokaṁku se biśai sakaḷa |–tha, ña
lg.l: basite najāṇi se pāilā bahuta lajjā
anteśvara pure nr̥pati pāḍi śutilā kuśaśayyā | 214 |
āho bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa aśastamā bhurisabongā sahite
śuṇa deba mahārājā kāhāku ẏeḍe śoka | 217 |
mahābhigyaṁ paṇḍita nātha kāhāku tora cintā | 218 |
driyodhana boilā maita tu mohora suhr̥de
puṇyeṇa prāpata tote pāilaiṁ muhiṁ hāde | 219 |
ankea kaṣaṇa kalu dhana nāśibāra arthe

lg.note: –śuṇa beba mahārājā kāhāku ẏeḍe kopa |–ka, ḍa, cha, ca, gha
–dukhī daridra kehu na thoile mahābhāga |-jha, ḍha
lg.l: kebaṇa upāẏa se kariba na jāṇi
amara bārasvatī jiṇi dekhili ẏehāra purī
debata samāne tahiṁ dekhili nara nārī | 227 |
aneka dhana dhaṁsana kalai muhiṁ rāge
kebaṇa māẏāẏe bhaṇḍāra pūroi sehu bāge | 228 |
deuṁṇa na sarai lakṣa lakṣa dhana
baḷa bīryya thāuṁ āmbhe hata ye hoilu | 230 |
sabhāẏeṇa bhīmā mote yete kr̥tya kalā
jīibāuṁ maraṇa mote śate guṇe bhalā | 231 |
prāge jhāsibi nohile dahana karibi kāẏe | 233 |
ẏehenneka chāra kathāku tu ẏeḍe abhimānī | 234 |
bābu tohora na sahile mohora ẏemanta acchi buddhi

lg.note: –guṇe dile śate guṇe paśai subarṇṇa |–ṭha;na
–śatr̥ra śauryya dekhibi muṁ kemante |–ka. ca
–guṇe dile śateguṇe paśai subarṇṇa | ṭha, na
–śatr̥ra śauryya muñ dekhibi kemante | ka, ta
lg.l: sañchaẏe kari rājā tohora na sahile
pāntabaṁkara sampradhi yāka hari pārai mohora baḷe | 236 |
śakuni mukhara ẏesaneka bacana śuṇiṇa kururāṇa
tuhi se aṭu mantrī mohora prāṇa hita
śakuni boilā ẏebe srāhāna bhojana tu kara

lg.note: –beḷebeḷe mātuḷa ho tohora parasāde | ka, ca
–pāṇḍabanta bhari pāḍibilu kapāṭe | jha, ṭa, ḍha
–“tuhi se aṭu mantrī mohora prāṇa hita” sthānare ‘jha, ṭa, ḍha,’ re bhinma pāṭha–
tohor amantrīpaṇa sujhibi ki ẏetebeḷe
sakaḷa ṭhābaru uturile pāṇḍabe puṇyabaḷe |
ẏe tohora mantrīpaṇa kāraṇa hou mote
keuṁṇa upāẏe naśibe pāṇḍaba pañchu bhrāte |
–upāẏe śatr̥ku karibā apahāra | ca, ka

lg.l: tenu se ẏeḍeka sampada arajile paṇḍunāna | 245 |
rājākaiṁ srāhāna tu karāa bege nei | 246 |
manara bikr̥te anna na rucai kururāje | 248 |
āchobana sāri rājā krapūra tāmboḷa bhmañji
śakunira bolaku se ẏekalaẏe kari bhaji | 249 |
hoibi triputi mora manu bhrānti yāu phiṭi | 251 |
yujheṣṭhiṁkara niẏama muṁ kahai śuṇa hāde | 252 |
āho prītibhāb ye yāhā kahai tāhāṁku
abaśya diai se tāhā kahai tumbhaṁku | 253 |
rājyabhāra sampada gheni bāhāra kari tāku | 254 |
lg.note:
–śrībāsudebe taku karichanti abhinna
teṇu se pāṇḍabe arjile aneka ye puṇya |‘da’
–śakuni hakari rājā basilā biśvāsa stāna | gha, pha, ṭha, na
–yujheṣṭhiṁkara caritra muṁ kahai tote hāde | jha, ṭa, ḍha

–paśā bhiāṇa kari hakāriba tāṁku
mohoa buddhi acchi jiṇimā tāhāṁku | jha, ṭa, ḍha
lg.l: āstāne biji kārai sannidhye tāhānta basā
yujheṣṭhiṁkara sampada āmbhe ho hāribā ẏehimante | 256 |
driyodhana boilā mātuḷa tu asakhya kahilu
ẏeḍebaḍa padārtha tuhi kāhuṁ se pailu | 257 |
ẏe paśāra carita jāṇai mohāra pitāra thibākāḷa | 258 |
paśāku jitā ye mohora pitā gāndhārasena
bichārai kemante paśāre jiṇimi sakaḷa rājāgaṇamāne | 259 |
ẏete boli gali citrotpaḷā utra kura tīthe
mana bacane karttabye se japai ẏekacitte
mahāyoge basilā rājā naba caraṣa pariyante | 262 |

lg.note: –ẏeḍe paramārtha kathā kāhuṁ tu pāilu | gha, tha, pa, ja
–puṣyā nakṣatrare rājā basile yogadhyāna | (keteka pothi)
–mahāyoge basilā rājā kaba sahasra baraṣa pariyante | ba, ta, cha, ja

lg.l: āho gāndhārasena tu kaṣṭhore mote sehi | 264 |
māgasi ho mahārājā ye tohora ādhyāna
ẏe mohora satya satya dr̥bha mo bacana | 265 |
agyāna mūrūkha muhiṁ tote kisa karibaiṁ sebā | 267 |
māgo yahiṁra nimante muṁ tohore bhagati
mohora kheḷante mote nohibe kehi sari
anugraha karibā mote go nirghātaa kumārī | 269 |
gaṅgā boile muṁ debaiṁ tohora bole
samaẏeke bāhuḍāi debuṭi āṇi īśvare loḍā kale | 270 |
dvādaśa baraṣa pariyante sehu se ghenilā

lg.note: –stirīliṅga sebākali dhika mo jībana | jha, ṭa, ṛha
–dhūrjaṭī paśāsāra mote bibāka hoiṇa triputi | ca, ja
–pratagyāṁ kehḍamānanta se samasta jiṇilā | tha, ña
lg.l: paśā na pāi rāge śāpya dileka jāhna
kopeṇa boile ture pathara ghare hua parābhabi | 274 |
jaḷa bhitaraku rājā paśā dilā phiṅgi
gāndhārasena boilā māta mote āgyāṁ debāka haraṣe

lg.note: –“śūnyeṇa kahile ye parama māheśvarī” pāṭha gare ‘kha, ṭha, ba’ re adhika pāṭha:–
śūnare kahile derī parama iśvarī
yeuṁṇa bhmajare paśākaṭhi achu dhari |
tohora mr̥tu kāḷare se kara haḍāgoṭi
tāha nei yeuṁ loka kariba paśākāṭhi |
tohora putre tāhāku ghenithibe pāśa
kheḷante tāhāku heba sabuṭhāre yaśa |
jiṇantā nohibe kehu ẏe marttya bhmabana
yāhā boliṇa ḍākibe paḍiba se dāna |
ẏemante pitā mohora bāhuḍi ailā
niścinte gāndhārasena rajya karuthilā |
pathara ghare yetebeḷe bandī hoile
mote gāndhāra nr̥pati ḍākiṇa boile | (abaśiṣṭāṁṇa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)
lg.l: yeuṁṇa bhmaje paśā pāḍuthilu ye tohora
tohora maraṇa kāḷe ghenima kara pallaba asthigoṭi
tāhā gheniṇa pua tohora kriba paśākāṭhī | 280 |
jiṇantā nohibaṭi tāku kehi pātāḷa pañcha ākāśa | 281 |
bābu ẏe bacana mote kahile gāndhārasena nr̥pati
mr̥tukāḷe karara asthi muṁ ghenili duhinti | 282 |
bābu ḍāhāṇakara paśākāṭhi duigoṭi ho ẏehāṁka | 283 |
bābu ẏe paśā gheniṇa muṁ thoicchi yatnakari
ẏeṇe se pāṇḍabaṁkara sampada pārai muṁ hari | 284 |
aneka praśaṁsā se karai pāñchau pāṇḍabe | 286 |
sādhu āmara bongśa sādhu sādhure kumara
sādhu hoile pāṇḍabe ẏe pañchu rajyara | 287 |
lg.note: pūbongpr̥ṣṭhā pāṭhāntara:–
ẏe mohora bacana tu śuṇare śakuni
paśāra mantra mote kahile pitā puṇi |
ẏe kathā kahile mote gāndhāra nr̥pati
mr̥tu kāḷahuṁ tāhā muṁ rakhicchi sāiti |

–thātraṣaṇa karanteṇa nāṇagalā cachu
tu puṇi tahiṁki mane antakta dharuachu | gha, ḍha, pa
–ẏeṇe se pāṇḍabaṁkara samada hoiba apahāri | pha, gha

lg.l: ye se kointā se paramā sādhabī maheśvarīṭi | 288 |
bongśara aneka puṇya arajile ẏe putraṁka prasāde
tu puṇi tāhāṁku ẏebe pāpa cintuachu | 290 |
mohora cachu kimpāi andha ye nohilā | 291 |
yebaṇa puruṣara śarīre thiba baḷa praṇa
driyodhana boilā tāta buddhiẏe kaha muku
kisa kathā ẏe bābure kahilu tu mote
āra beḷe ẏe kathā na kahibuṭi kadācite | 295 |
lg.note: –“ẏeseneka sukṣaṇe upujāilā gutrapāñchagoṭi”| ḍa, ja, ñja, tha, re adhikā pare pāṭha–
“ẏesaneka śubhakṣaṇe jāta hoilā putra–goṭi
dhanya dhanya rājā tu aṭu dharma yujheṣṭhi |
parama sādhebī se kointā māheśvarī
ẏesaneka putra sehu garbhe acchi dhari |
–“driyodhana boilā tāta buddiẏe kaha muku” pada sthānare tha, ña pothire alagā pāṭha–
driyodhana boilā tāta buddhiẏe kaha mote
pāṇḍabaṁka sampada nāśa hoiba kemante | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]

lg.l: bābu trailokye bidita hoile paṇḍuṁkara poẏe
soḷadina pariyante āsi kalā paẏare pūjā | 298 |
bābu trailokara nātha ye deba catradhārī
abhimāna pāi bābu sabhāru ailu abā bege
bābu ẏekachatrī hoile se ẏe tini jagate
tāhāṁkara sampada tuhi hari loḍu kemanto | 302 |
bābu sujana janamānaṁku ye bipatti cintile
āpaśāku pramāda paḍai niścinta kari bujhile | 303 |
lg.note: pūbongṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara:–
guṇabanta paṇḍita tu mahata pitāmaha
paṇḍabaṁkara sampada degi na rahai deha |
kebaṇa upāẏe kari haribi sampada
kahasi nirādhāra mote bacana sambāda |
ẏesena bacana śuṇi kahilā driyodhana
śuṇi dhr̥tirāṣṭa chuiṁlā beba ye śrabaṇa |
– ẏesana bacana kiṁpe kahilu bābu mote
–yāhāra caraṇa sebā karanti nārāẏaṇa sahite | gha, jha, ṭa, cha, ḍha
–ẏebe hāde kariachu abiśvāsa saṁyoge |–ka

lg.l: bābu parakaiṁ pramāda cintanti yeuṁṇa prāṇī
tu ẏehā bichāra bābu na karu kimpā mane
tu tāhāṁkara tule kehne houchu aprīti | 307 |
bacana meṇṭa ṇa se āgyāṁ kalāka bhraṣṭa | 308 |
driyodhana boilā tāta baḷeṇa kisa kāryya
upāẏe yāhā kari tāhā nuāri parātrame
śrikāḷa boilā muhiṁ thāi ẏethe rakhi

lg.note:
–śrikāla boilā muhiṁ ẏethe acchi nagi
prāhāna karite tumbhe samaste begi |–jha, ṭa, ḍa, pha

lg.l: ẏemante tini maitre gale srāhāna kari
tohora tahuṁ byāghra ye ailā daṇḍe beḷa | 318 |
āge baḷe māṁsa bhakṣi galā mahābaḷa | 319 |
siṁgha boilā ẏe māṁsa hoilā uttiṣṭa
āga byāghra brāsakalā ẏe māṁsa galā naṣṭa | 320 |
uttaiṣṭa bolikari se ye māṁsa galā teji
banaste paśilā se āna māẏeṁsa khoji | 321 |
siṁgha boilā ẏe byāghrara uttiṣṭa hoilā
muhiṁ banapati mote ẏe yogya nohilā | 322 |
siṁgha ta nailā boli byāghra ye pachāri
āho siṁgha boilā ẏehā byāghra śrikāḷa dhaile
ẏe māẏeṁsa āu mote na yogāi bhale | 325 |
upekṣiṇa galā siṁgha hoiṇa baḍa rāga
siṁgha ruṣigalā boli ye trāsakalā byāghra | 326 |

div.note:
–siṁha byāghra ābara neuka tinijībe
srāhāna karite ye gale taḷamarge ||–ka, ḍha, jha, ña, ca, cha, tha
– muhiṁ banapati mote kemante yogāilā |–ḍa, ca, ña, tha

lg.l: siṁghara ḍare ye byāghra galā chāḍi
pratramahiṁ tāta baḍa ye aṭai upāẏe | 330 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa boilā muṁ jāṇai kire bābu
pūbong ye upāẏe tu kalu driyodhana
nāguṇī khāu boli melila tāku jaḷe | 333 |

div.note:
–“ẏekāẏe jambuka sabu mr̥gamaṁsa bhakṣilā” pāṭha pare
jha, ṭa, ḍha re bhinnapāṭha:–
driyodhana boilā bābu ẏesaneka upāẏe
ẏekāhoi māṁẏesa bhakṣilā buddhira upāẏe |
srāhāna kariṇa se samasta paṭhiāi
buddhi upāẏe dekhili kari thokāẏe tahūṁ khāi |
yeuṁṇa upāẏe śakuni buddhibaḷa
upāẏe biṣalaḍu bhīmaku khuāila bālakāḷa |

lg.l: ābara bhīmasena ailā aneka ratna gheni | 336 |
driyodhana boila tāta śuṇa pūbongra carita
bho tāta banastara pati ye aṭai keśarī
baneṇa paśi se aneka jantu nāśakari | 338 |
badanti jībamāne tumbhe śuṇa ho banastapati
rājā hoi svāmī tu karuchu anīti | 339 |
ẏebe thāa svāmī tu āmbhanta bane pratipāḷi
jībake tote āmbhe karithibuṁ dine dine pāḷi | 341 |
ẏehi kaṇaẏa giri śikhare tu bije karithibu
yāhāra pāḷi paḍiba jaṇake tote debu | 342 |
siṁgha boilā mote ye ẏehi se bhalai
niti jībeka dianti yāhāra paḍara paḍai pāḷi
sukheṇa muṇohi karai siṁgha manara hiāḷi | 344 |

div.note: –“sukheṇa muṇohi karai siṁgha manara hiāli”–pāṭha pare ‘ka’ pothire adhika pāṭha–
ẏekadine pāḷi padilā mr̥gapati
sukheṇa bhogya tāhā karai banapati |
āreka dine pāḷi paḍai saẏambara
sukheṇa siṁgha tāku kalāka āhāra | (abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: āho caitana śaśāra bongśa ye samasta galā tuṭi

div.note: pūbongpr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara:–
tr̥tīẏa dina pāli paḍilā hariṇa
sukheṇa bhogya tāku siṁgha kalāka rojana |
caturtha bina pāji paḍilā barehā
ruṣṭe rojana kari siṁgha sustha kalā cāra hiā |
pañchama dina hāṇḍāra paḍilāka pāḷi
bhañjai keśarī ye manara hiāki |
ṣaṣṭhare pāḷi paḍilā banara mahiṁṣi
bhuñjai keśarī tāhā bhadara āuṁsi
sapatame pāki padilā maubāgha
bhakṣilā banapati kariṇa mahāprāga |
aṣṭama bine āsi bhakṣilā {??}ḷehā
tāhā rakṣiṇa triputi kalā tāra kāẏā |
nabama dine pāli paḍilā ghoḍāṅga
bhmañji banapati sustha kalā tāra aṅga |
daśadine pāḷi ye paḍilā koṭārī
bhakṣilā keśarī ye māẏeṁsa sabong tāri |
ẏehimati bhakṣi sustha se bhajilā
kaṇaẏagiri pabongtuṁ kebeheṁ na galā |
ẏejabine pāḷi paḍilā mauśana
hāthī bichārai mora pāñji pocchilā janturāja |
bhaẏa manekari gaja siṁgara pāśe yāi
jhāmpiṇa keśarī ye tāhāku dharai
siṁgha boipa bhakṣibi āja bhadara pūrei
mauḷi bidāriṇa se mukutā phaḷa khāi | (abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: siṁghara tahiṁki tāhāra yāite mana nāhiṁ | 346 |
tāhāra kopakale ke banaste thiba brati | 347 |
ho daiba puruṣe mote hoibā saṁpakṣa
muṁ tohore śaraṇa ho baṁśa mora rakha | 348 |
āre kṣudhāẏeṇa ārata ye mohora manīṣā
tu kiṁpe ẏeḍe uchura kalure br̥ddhaśaśā | 351 |

div.note: pūbongpr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara:–
ẏehimate yahuṁ samaẏeka galā
puṣṭa hoiṇa siṁgha ye banaste rahilā
āho caitana siṁgha bhakṣante samasta samasta bongśa tuṭi |
ẏekāmātra rahaacchi br̥ddha śaśāgoṭi |
“muṁ tohore śaraṇa ho bongśa mora rakha” pāṭhapare ‘ka’ pothire adhika pāṭha:–
manaku ghāntikari śaśā cḷiyāi
kṣadhāre banapati acchi bāṭa chāhiṁ |
antarāḷa hoi śaśā banaste bulai
dekhilā maha araṇye jīrṇṇa kr̥peka achai |
tahūṁṇa śaśā ye bege calīgalā
ẏehi kūpa bhitare siṁghaku māribi boli bichārilā |
uchura hoi yāi miḷilā sanmidhye
dekhiṇa keśarī ye boilā mahātrodhe |

lg.l: tote kahiyibā pāiṁ muhiṁ acchi āsi | 354 |
siṁgha boilā muṁ ẏe bane aṭai ẏekāṅge
ture br̥ddhaśaśā kāhiṁ dekhilu āreka siṁghe | 355 |
ẏehikṣaṇi bikoti ye moḍai tāra śikhā
kebaṇa sthāne acchi re mote bahana kari dekhā | 356 |
kūṭa kapaṭeṇa śaśā nelā siṁghakaiṁ kaḍhāi
mahā gahana bane lāilā tāku nei | 357 |
agāda bāmpī goṭiẏe nei siṁghaku dekhāilā
svāmī tohora bhaẏeṇa siṁgha āsi ẏethi bhitare paśilā | 358 |
kūpaku chāhiṁ siṁgha adhara kalā pr̥ṣṭa | 359 |
tāhāra teja bikāśilā sehi sarūpa mr̥tti
br̥ddha śaśāra bacana muṁ ye karuthili micha

div.note:
–saty kariṇa muhiṁ tāhāku āsiacchi
tohora āgare kahi bāhuḍi yāiacchi (ja, ña, tha, ca, ḍa)
–chāẏā bikāśilā keśarīra mr̥tti |–(jha, ṭa, ḍha)
–saṁcaẏe banapati mora sīmā ghenimāku kalā icchā | ḍa, ca

lg.l: re re kāra kariṇa ye siṁgha hākadilā
śuṇa ho tāta siṁghara apaṇḍita paṇa darpe
re re kāra kari siṁgha ḍeiṁ paḍilā sehi kūpe | 366 |
se kūpara garīra tāta, ẏekabiṁśa tāḷa
ṭhābake buḍilā siṁgha na pāilā thaḷa | 367 |
bho tāta śaśāra bongśa budibā nimante
banajība mātraka hoi kalāka ẏeḍeka kr̥tye | 368 |
upāẏe kari sinā tāta ẏesana kr̥tya kalā | 369 |
upāẏe yāhā kari tāhā prākarme nuāri
pāṇḍabe hoile tāta mote siṁghara saṁjāta
āmbhe se hoilu tāta śaśā buddhimata | 371 |
upāẏe kari yujheṣṭhira ghenimuṁ āmbhe rājya | 372 |
kapaṭa kūṭa kahtā yahuṁ kahile driyodhana śakuni

div.note: –śuṇa ho tāta br̥ddha śaśāra buddhibaḷa nimante |–jha, ṭa, ḍha
–śuṇiṇa dhr̥tirāṣṭa hoilāka tūnī | jha, ḍha, ca

lg.l: śakunira upāẏe na puṇa bongśaku dei śāsti | 374 |
kūṭa kapaṭa mantrī ẏe aṭai baḍa duṣṭa
śakunira bongśa tu nāśakalu pathara ghare bhari
na puṇa tohora bongśa nāśa karai upāẏeṇa kari | 376 |
ẏehāra upāẏe napuṇa hoai tohora upare
driyodhana boilā tāta tumbhe na jāṇa kicchi buddhi
naśanta kāḷaku prāṇīṁkara baḍhai yehne roga
apaṇḍita jane tahiṁki najāṇi karanti śoga | 379 |
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa bhurisabongā ye śakuni
aśastamā kr̥pa āchāryya śalya somadatta gheni | 381 |

div.note: –śatunira upāẏe bongśa ẏebe hoibe binaśyati |–ca, da, ḍha

–“dhr̥tirāṣṭakaiṁ bañchāi caḷanti kaurobe” pare keteka
pothire bhinmapāṭha:–
dhr̥tirāṣṭa bākya na mānilā driyodhana
tahuṁ sabhā mauḷilā gale nija sthāna |
pātra mantrī amānatya gale yejhā pura
bhitara puraku bijekale kurubīra |
niti driyodhana bhābe śakuniku gheni
ẏehne bichāra karante galā māsa tini |

lg.l: ye yāhāra pratagyāṁ se karanti anamite | 382 |
ẏeka ārake ye kahanti darpa kathā
niti prati driyodhana bichārai śakuniki gheni | 384 |
namāmi nārāẏaṇa svāmī lakṣmī debīra pati
māẏā moharu mote pārikara deba śirīpati | 385 |
śrī sāroḷāṁka prasanne badanti sāroḷa bāsa śūdramuni | 386 | |12590 |

div.note: –ye yāhāra yoge rahile sāhāpakṣa gheni |–tha, ja, ña
–ye yāhāra āstāne priẏa bhābe rahile sakaḷa saini |–gha, pha, cha, ḍa, ḍha
–mukunda murāri caraṇe mora baẏinī |-tha, ña

div.head:
{@arjuna br̥kṣara utpatti o indraprasthare
sabyasācīṅkara upasthiti@}

lg.l: āho caitana pucchākalā ye manu puruṣaṁku
arjuna bīra galā ye pātāḷa puraku | 1 |
nāgeṇīra meḷe se ye nicinte rahilā
hastinā sabhāku se ki nimante naila | 2 |
pātāḷa svarge rahilā se tinimāsa pariyante | 4 |
ki abā paḍilā māḍi tāhāra upareṇa pr̥thī | 6 |
kuśaḷe thile ki rahantā mora pātha
kṣaṇake na dekhile se mr̥cchi nuārai ātmanta | 7 |
āho sahadeba arjuna kathā tu kemanta bichāru
kahu kinā mantrībara kimpāiṁ gopya karu | 9 |

div.note: –arjunara kathā hoilā deba keuṁṇa kāraṇa |–tha, ña, ca, ḍa, ja
–tinimāsa helā kāhiṁ rahilā mobhrātha |–kha, na
–kṣaṇeka na dekhile se ye na bratai āmbhanta |–ja, tha

lg.l: dhanuhuḷe pātha medinī dhari hoileka ubhā | 11 |
arjuna svāmīṁki se nāguṇī thilā khaṭi
yāga sāri ananta nāga ẏethuṁ galeka leuṭi | 13 |
sandhyābāḷīki pradāna kalā ye nāga bīrā | 14 |
baḍāi sundara se ananta nāgara dulaṇī
svāmī rahichanti arjuna ṭhākura nāgeṇīra meḷe
yujheṣṭhi ṭhākure boile se rahilā pātāḷa svrge

div.note: –sandhyābāḷīki pradāna hoilā mahābīrā |–jha, ḍha, ṭa
–saṁkalpi arjunaku sumarile taḍati |–ka, ṭha

lg.l: hr̥dagate dhyāẏe kari jāṇilā mote sumaranti bhagabāna | 21 |
uṭhiṇa koḷakalā se ananta nāgarājāra dulāḷī
bho nātha prakr̥ti tora dekhili bibhaḷi | 23 |
kaṣṭhore pachārai se stirī mahā kaicchā
ẏeḍeka pīrati nātha kehne karuchu upekṣā | 24 |
mohora ṭhākura ye aṭanti deba banamājī | 25 |
se mote cintile go hr̥de kariṇa talaẏe
muhiṁ hastināku yibi boli boilā dhanurjaẏe | 26 |

div.note: –“dekhiṇa āśrija nāgarājāra ātmajā” pare ‘kha’ pothire bhinmapātha:–
nāguṇī boilā nātha pachārai tote
binā aparādhe kimpā tejuacha mote |
mukuḷii keśa tāra basra asambhāḷa
niḷendī naẏanu tāra bahe aśr̥jaḷa |
arjunara caraṇa taḷe hoi pariṇāmi
pārthaku binaẏa bhāba karai kāminī |
arjuna boilā tu raha raha sakhi
akāraṇe cintā tu na kara śaśīmukhī |
jhiriṇa śarīra tora nakara birasa
āna nice yibi muhiṁ mora nija deśa |
śrīkr̥ṣṇara bhaginī mohora bhāriḍā
tohora nimante tāhā kali paritejyā |
–mohora bāndhaba ye aṭanti deba banamāḷī |–jha, ṭa, ḍha

lg.l: tu ẏebe sundarī go nicinte thāāsi ẏethe
puṇi samaẏeke āsibi boli bolai bīrapāthe | 27 |
nāgeṇī boilā tu mohora pañchubhuta ātmā
muṁ tohora bhābenī śr̥ṅgāra rase buḍi
tu prāṇabandhu mote kemante yibu chāḍi | 29 |
ẏeḍe baḍa muhāṁsa nātha chāḍibu kemante
mukuhiṁ chāḍi yibāku citta baḷiba kemante | 30 |
puṇi boilā puruṣe se badāi nirddaẏā
bhāba hekhāi bhaṇḍāa samasta tumara ye māẏā | 31 |
sadibhāba acchiṭiki se śuā ḍāḷare basile | 33 |
poḍu podu svāmī ẏe stirījanma goṭi
pareṇa dūṣita ẏe nirlaja jībana heṭi | 34 |
aneka binaẏa bhābe kari abā sebā
nirlaja ātmā kimpe thiba tohora abhābe | 36 |
svāmī pithara mohora aṭai mahānāga ananta

div.note: –guṇabanta puruṣa hoi tumbhe ẏeḍeka nirddaẏā |–jha, ṭa, ḍha
–āpaṇāra pañchu ātmā majjāi yāhaku khaṭi |–tha, ña
–svāmī piara mohora mahādeba aṭai ananta |–tha, ṭa, jha, ka

lg.l: poḍu poḍu nātha ẏe mohora hīnakarma
ki abā tote muhiṁ hoili abhagata
ẏesaneka boli se arjunaku dhailā koḷakari
bho svāmī amr̥ta samāna ye aṭai mukhagoṭi
muhiṁ se agyāne thili ẏebe hoili nabayubā
gyāna karāi kemante chāḍi loḍu abā | 42 |
basra asambhāḷa ye āuḷa tāra keśa
arjunara hr̥de nei lagāilā kuca beni
muṁ pāmarī kemante mr̥cchibi ho kirīṭī | 45 |
dahana hoibi arjuna agni de saṁjāḷi | 47 |
tohora abhābe mohora kisa ye jībati
sañchaẏe arjuna ho ghenilu stirīhatyā doṣagoṭi | 48 |
mukhe mukha lagāi se karai biḷāpa

div.note: –loẏeṇa–sampūrṇṇa luha |

lg.l: arjuna boilā ture raha raha sakhī
akāraṇe biḷāpa re na kara śaśīmukhī | 50 |
jhuri jhuri śarīra tora na kara birasa
muṁ ẏethe rahi nuārai yibai abaśya | 52 |
dekhibaiṁ mohora kuṭumba bandhu jana barga
puṇi samaẏeke āsai sinā patāḷa ye svarga | 54 |
na bhāḷa bhābinī go nuhasi re gañji
āpaṇe yāhā arji karmeṇa tāhā bhmañji | 55 |
aḷapa samaẏa go tu thāasi mana mr̥cchi
sandhyābāḷī boilā muṁ ki tohora bairi
mahata ana hoi nātha ẏemante na kari | 57 |
bho tāta na jāṇi mote kalu he pradāna
ẏeḍe baḍa rājāhoi kalu kr̥tya hīna | 59 |
mote pradāna kalu jāti antara lokaku
kāḷeṇa tejyā kari se yāuacchi muku | 60 |
aneka bāgeṇa tāta tāku kahili binoẏī | 61 |

div.note: –loẏeṇa locana tora bibhalita diśi |–pha, cha, ka
jhuri jhuri śarīra to na kara bināśa |–ka, ḍha, gha, ña, tha

lg.l: ananta boilā māgo tāre karāilu bimukha
putranta hakāri āgyāṁ dilāka pātāḷa nāẏaka | 63 |
ẏebe tumbhe caḷa bābhiẏe arjuna tahiṁki
kimarthe pātha duhitāku mora karāilā dukhī | 64 |
keuṁṇa arthe yāi loḍai se madhya bhmabanaku | 65 |
aneka ratna yogāḍa gheniṇa sabong nāga
binaẏa bhāba hoi ye boilā kuḷika
svāmī pātāḷa bhmabane pāila ki mahādukha | 70 |
ki abā āmbhe tote kari nuārilu sebā
ki abā bhagnī āmbhara tote nohilā bhagata

div.note: –ẏebe yāuacchi hastinā bhmabanaku |–ja, ca, ḍha
–mahā bhagadi se parama baiṣṇabī pr̥thīki dhāraṇā |–tha, ña, jha, ṭa, ḍa

lg.l: āho pr̥thībhārā nāśibā nimante āmbhe bahuta bibādī
teṇu kari śrījagannāthe sumaraṇā kale muku | 76 |
arjuna boilā bābhiẏe ẏebe añchaku yibi muhiṁ | 77 |
bāsudeba sumarante muhiṁ kemante na yibi | 79 |
ki abā daita dānabaṁkara hoilā utakarma
teṇu ghana ghana sumarinti mote puruṣa uttama | 80 |
kaṭāḷa karibāku muṁ tote nohai sāmaratha | 81 |

div.note:
–“arjuna bābhiẏe ẏebe mañchaku yibi muhiṁ” pādānta pare
hjha, ṭa, ta pothire alagā pāṭha–
ananta nāgarāja sannidhye kaha yāiṁ
madhya bhmabanakaiṁ āja niścaẏe yibi muhiṁ
āpaṇe bijaẏe kale sabongsācī
ananta boilā mora dihitāku kimpe lecchi |
śata sahasra daṇḍa hoiṇa pariṇāmi
bolai dhanurjaẏe mote āgyāṁ debā svamī |
mote sumaraṇā kale deba janārddana
ki abā daita dānaba kale utakarma |

lg.l: tuhi se uśvāsa kari bu nā basundharā | 82 |
kr̥ṣṇa arjuna tumbhe ẏeka ātmā beni
nohile ānara baḷe ki dhari hoai medinī | 83 |
arjuna boilā tāta āgyāṁ deba mote
ẏete kahi pātha ye caḷilā bahana
arjuna boilā ture trodha chādasi saṅgāta
haraṣa hoiṇa aghya diasi mora mātha | 88 |
sandhyābāḷī sannidhye ye arjuna prabeodhi kahuacchi
santoṣa citte kaha muṁ sakhī yāuacchi | 89 |
sandhyābāḷī boilā nātha nirāśa na kara muku
tohora tule nemuṁ mote madhya bhmabanaku | 90 |

div.note: –aneka dusaha ye hoilā mahībhārā |–ca, ja, ḍa
–nohile dhanuhuḷe ke dhari pārai medinī |–tha, ña, ca, ḍa, ja

lg.l: tiniheṁ ẏeka ṭhāba hoile abaśya lagāibe kaḷi | 93 |
muhiṁ puṇa samaẏeke āsai kinā tohora puri | 94 |
chāḍasi abhimā{??} go sakhī an karasi śoka
puṇi puṇi samārjanā ye karanti nāgaloka | 95 |
nāgeṇī boilā svāmī mora garbha benimāsa
tohora gale na puṇa mote lāgai upahāsa | 96 |
arjuna boile yebe tohora putra hoiba janma
karapatra yoḍiṇa ye bolai haṁsa gabanī
ẏe mohora nabayubā baẏasa kāhiṁ saṁharibi debasvāmī | 98 |
kāhāra tule svāmī muṁ karibi abhiḷāṣa | 99 |
nāgeṇīra kathā sehi mane mane guṇī | 100 |
bāmakare bābala śara gheni bīra phālaguni
dakṣiṇa bhmaje ghāta kalāka gāra tini | 102 |
tahūṁ utapatti hoilā susañcha komaḷa br̥kṣe | 103 |
ẏe se sundarī re arjuna nāme br̥kṣa | 104 |

div.note: –tuhi ta ḍaṁkuṇī go aṭu baḍai jañjāḷī - ca, ḍa, ja, tha, ña

lg.l: nānā beśa beśana hoi karibu manabāñcchā | 105 |
mote sumariṇa ẏehu br̥kṣaku koḷa kale
ẏe br̥kṣa śarīra go aṭai mohora
tora manorathamora sarūpa ẏe br̥kṣa bāhāra | 107 |
mo tahuṁ śateguṇe ẏe br̥kṣaku thāa sebi
sandhyābāḷī boilā ye ẏe br̥kṣa pramāṇa
tumbhe āḍe hoa br̥kṣaku muṁ kare ātreṣaṇa | 109 |
śuṇiṇa āḍe hoile paṇḍu rājāṁkara sute | 110 |
dibya beśa beśana hoiṇa nāgeṇī sandhyābāḷī
tatakṣaṇe dutīẏa pāpa śarīra se indrara kumara
ẏebe biḍibā nātha āsa boli nāgeṇī boilā | 113 |
puṇi nāguṇī boilā mote kahila sandeśa
ābara kathāẏe svāmī pachārai mana prāsa | 114 |
tumbhe ẏe kṣatriẏa aṭai svabhābe dvandakārī
pāpa paramāda hoile muṁ jāṇimaiṁ kemante
ẏethira sandeśa svāmī kahiṇa thibā mote | 116 |

div.note: –ābara kathāẏe tote kahai biśvasa |–jha, ṭa

lg.l: nāgeṇī bacane ye drahasita bīra pātha
bāḷuta bhāba prāẏe kahilu re saṁghāta | 117 |
āmbhe se pr̥thī madhye aṭu jagujitā
yamara kāḷadaṇḍa āmbhe se bināśa karantā | 118 |
pareṇa pramāda go āmbhe se karu rakṣā
tu āmbhara mr̥ture kāhiṁ karu bāñcchā | 120 |
yāhāku dekhāiṇa svāmī pratagyāṁ hāde kara
sehi kāḷe kāẏā nāśa karai ẏehi pr̥thibīra | 122 |
tinikoṭi bāra pariyante malā sehu debā | 123 |
tohora tahuṁṇa ye ke achai hāde jīiṁ
nāma rūpa hoile saburi prāṇa yāi | 124 |
yebe sundarī re mote paḍiba paramāde

div.note: –se puṇi kāḷe nohai ajrāmara |–jha, ṭa, ḍha
–janama hoile maraṇa se ẏeheneka acchi–ja, tha, ña, ca, ḍa
– ẏe arjuna br̥kṣagoti maribaṭi hāde |–ja, cha, ṭa, ḍa, tha, ña

lg.l: kicchihiṁ tohora manaku bhrānti nakara sakhī
manare cintā tu na kara kicchi bhāḷi | 129 |
na dekhile daṇḍe tote na rahai dehī
tohora binu mohora āna kathā nāhi | 131 |
kṣaṇeheṁ upekṣibāku na baḷai mora mana | 132 |
arjuna boilā saṁghāta na rahai mohora dehī
manara tāpamāna sakhī go chāḍa ẏebe | 134 |
bolai arjuna sukhe thāa re sundarī
nāgeṇī rahilā se santokṣe hemamaẏa pura | 137 |
indra praśaste yāiṁ bijaẏe pāṇḍaba pañchāṇa | 138 |
ẏemanta samaẏe yāiṁṇa praṇapatya hoilā pārthiba | 139 |

div.note: –nāgeṇī chāḍilā se pārthai priẏarāba |–ḍha, cha

lg.l: dhanuhuḷe dhaili deba ẏe mahābhārā medinī | 141 |
aṣṭakuḷā nāga gheni ghaṭilā manara hiāḷī | 142 |
dohitāgoṭi pradāna se mote kala debasvāmī | 143 |
āmbhanta bisari pātha tu rahilu kemanta | 144 |
dekhiṇa yujheṣṭhi deba ye apāra kr̥takr̥tya

div.note:
–“śrībhmaje nārāẏaṇa ye arjunaku kolakari”
pādānta pare ‘kha, na, ṭha’ pothire adhika pāṭha–
kuśaḷa bāratā ye phālaguni bichāri
yujheṣṭhi kr̥ṣṇa caraṇe namasthāra kri |
yujheṣṭhi boile pātha kalu bahu ḍeri
pātha bole muhiṁ dharithili basundharī |
–gobinda padmapāde arjuna pariṇāmi | ḍa, ja, ka, tha, ña
–driyodhana āgyāṁkārī bāruṇābantia rājyare | kha, gha, ṭha, na

lg.l: kūohoḷe beṇṭa binode bije se gahana kānane | 147 |
aneka jība dekhanti mr̥ga saẏambara hariṇa
jība nāśa na karanti śara na peṣanti dharmanāna | 148 |
jagata saṁhāre se tuhi ye uddharantā
jaḷa praḷaẏa kāḷe madhukaiṭabha datya māri
deba pāñchajanya śaṅkha nimante mahājaḷa manthi
biśvanāthe saṁharile tuhi se kalu buddhi | 154 |
paramānanda svāmī tuhi se jagata ādimūḷa
jaga bandana svāmī tu pratakṣe padmanābha | 156 |
digāṅga mekhaḷe ye śarīra yāhāra thiti | 158 |
rājība lobana svāmī mādhuryya yāra buddhi
kalīkāḷa dhvaṁsana nātha bije nīḷasundara pabongte
nīḷa kalpabaṭa taḷa nātha prāpata heba mote | 166 |
taba bhmabana teji nātha āna ṭhāba mote na de | 167 |
tuḷasāra ballabha padmapāda pañchabhute muhiṁ bhābi

div.note: –madhubana maẏāṇa svāmī somasūryya netrā | ja, tha, cha
–saẏaḷa uddhāraṇa nātha ananta pabitrā | ka

–aṣṭottara manthane deba kāḷanaḷa biṣa ye upuji
biśvanāthe saṁharaṇa karāilu tora buddhi | ka

div.head: {@śālu badha@}

lg.l: dharma nandana badana chāhiṁ bolanti debahari
svāmī āgyāṁdile muṁ yibaiṁ dvārābatī purī | 2 |
ẏe mohora sampada sabu tohora sañchita | 5 |
mote ki gocara aṭai ẏehu kathā
mohora boile ki hoi arṇṇa dei
subeḷe pāili muhiṁ tote sinā bheṭa | 8 |
pitāra brahmahatyā doṣa pāpa hoilā kṣaẏe
tohora na sañchile ẏehā kāhāra beḷe hoẏe | 9 |
māru tāru rakhu ẏekā prahu bhābagrāhī | 11 |
muṁ anāsta prāṇī tu anāsta janaṁkara bandhu
yujheṣṭhi boile hari tu parama mahata
mote citte antara na dhara jagannātha | 16 |
biśvāsa na karibaṭi ho kahilu sarūpaṭi | 21 |
bho muni agasti ghaṭa ruṣiṁka nandana
tu ye gyānabanta paṇḍita pūjya yati
dutīẏa brahmā samāne tohora ye buddhi
taba mukhuṁ śuṇile ẏe sakaḷa carita
kebaḷa kathāẏe pucchibi ẏe mohora buddhi
kaha mahāmuni mote sakaḷa śāsra śodhi | 30 |
agasti boile tumbhe śuṇa ho rājana
catra nimante nele dārā cauryya kari | 35 |
se janme catra ye nihilā parāpata | 36 |
śālu badha tote kahikā bistāra tathyakari | 40 |
yebe tu śrotā hoilu ho puṇi
jāhāra kuḷe jāta śālu se guṇi gheni
guṇabanta paṇḍita tu ye aṭu mahāgyānī | 44 |
śrīrāma tule bahuta yuddha kalā iṁkapati | 45 |
śarīra kāṭile tāra khaṇḍa khaṇḍa kari | 48 |

div.note: –kāhāra koḷe śālu janma se puṇa gheni | tha

lg.l: ḍeiṁṇa bānara se aneka kalā badha | 51 |
bābala bāṇe rāma dile ye uḍāi
se brahma kapāḷa paḍilā śākalya dvīpe yāiṁ | 53 |
se cheda kapāḷa rāba karanti niẏata
hā rāma hā rāma boli sumarai hudagata | 54 |
bho rāma muhiṁ tohora nuhaiṁ bairi
tohora bhābinīki se rābaṇa nelā hari | 55 |
tāhāra tule janma mote na kara raghubīra
binā doṣe śāpa mote nohilāka pāra | 56 |
apāda ta rahai na yāi yaśasīmā | 57 |
śālu nāma bahai se asureśvara nātha | 60 |
yetebeḷe se sabhāre śiśupāḷa manda boli
ẏebe dvārikāẏe paśi tu rājyanta ujāḍa | 62 |
baḷa dubongḷaku tote aṭe muhiṁ sāhi
yāa yā śālubīra ratha tohora bāhi | 63 |
ẏe duṣṭa sabhāba chāḍasi mohora bola śuṇi | 65 |
biṣṇura bairitā manu chāḍasi ho mahārāẏe
āho rāmakr̥ṣṇaṁku nāhiṁ nāhiṁ mora bhaẏe
koṭiẏe ratha gheni śālu caḷai antarīkṣe
gandhabong rājā ki se aṭai pratakṣe | 70 |
rātra thāuṁ thāuṁ se beḍhile yāiṁ baḷa

div.note: –sāja sāja samadaṇḍa bahuta nighoḍaẏe–tha
–māẏā sabhāru ye hoilā bāhāra–tha

lg.l: svāmī keuṁṇa rājā ẏethi āsai sanya bāhi
samaste yāna bāhāna caṛhi hoile bāhāra | 77 |
bhmabana beṛhiṇa ye rahicchi śālu bīra
bāhāna caṛhi bāhāra yābabe atīẏa samara | 78 |
re re kāra kari kahanti kīramaṇi
pārārddha mantrī boilā ẏebe padilā paramābe | 81 |
mohora bola tu na kalu biramaṇi
dharma debatya sahiba ki dharmaku laṁghile
mantrīra bola yeuṁṇa rājā na karai
jaḷa taraṅga rājā mantrī bola na kalā
muhiṁ tohora mantrī na kalu mora bola
khaṅga prāẏe bujhi tahiṁ batilā trodhamāna | 89 |
mantrī boilā mote tu nāśa ẏehikṣaṇi | 90 |
ābara ki prāṇa āja pāibu niẏata
bandha bhāñjante yehne na rahai pāṇi
sanya gheni yāānte se ramyeka pabongte
khagabara piṭhire thāiṁ nārāẏaṇa tale kari | 101 |
keuṁṇa rājāra ẏe aṭai sanya ghora | 102 |
bhala kari cihna tu binatā nandana jyeṣṭha | 103 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ sanya aile katiki āgasari
śālu ḍāka diai śuṇa re gauḍa
bhāja sabhāre basilu tu pāmara manda mūḍha | 107 |
agyāna pāmara ture gyāna tora nāhiṁ
kimpāiṁ nāśakalu tu ye mohora bhāi | 108 |
tiraṇa pramāṇe mā ẏeṁsa kāṭibi tohora
ẏebe tohora pāñji re pocchilā nāśakara | 109 |
sammukhe gauḍa re paḍilu āja tuhi
muhiṁ se śāmaḷa pacchī tuhi se kīṭa jantu
āja re gopāḷa jāṇimā kehne tuhi bratu | 113 |
sammukhe nāśilu mora bhāiku kari kopa | 115 |
tote kimpā upekṣā hoiba mora dehī | 116 |
tāhā dekhi bainetra pakṣa dilā biñchi | 120 |
dūreṇa paḍile se kariṇa ghora raḍi | 121 |
atīẏa ghañchāḷa yahūṁ kaleka se baḷa
kopeṇa hari sumarile catra ye bābala | 124 |
sudriśena catra nārāẏaṇī catra baiṣṇabā catra
tāhā dekhi śālu bīra manare bichāri | 126 |
dekhā kehne na deure pāmara durānta | 132 |
māẏā bāsudebara se achai keśa dhari | 133 |
ẏe tota pitā basudeba aṭai ki sata | 135 |
baḷe balārāma boli nāma tā aṭai | 136 |
hārikā jura kari āṇili ẏehāku dhari | 137 |
bhāira pālaṭe māribi satya ẏe mohora aḍa | 138 |

div.note: aḍa–atramaṇa, abhiyoga, yid dhariba |

lg.l: ẏete boli kaṭāra dhailā dakṣiṇa hātha | 140 |
catra hāthuṁ na yāi cakṣuru bahe nīra | 142 |
yahuṁ se bandī ujāṇi pabana ghare paśi | 144 |
ẏehāra beḷe ki huai pitāku māri
yebaṇa dvārikā mora aṭai ajeẏa gaḍapurī | 146 |
ẏe pāpī chāṇḍāḷa mote lagāilā prāsa
chāmure ratha chāḍi śālu acchi rahi
āre āre agyāna mūḍha pāma chāṇḍāḷa | 150 |
janma janmāntare mote chāḷa re niẏata
ẏehi kṣaṇika thāẏe ye nohai re datya | 151 |
māẏā sītā goṭiẏe sāṁgrāme dilu hāṇi
tāhā dekhi trodha ye hoilu na jāṇi | 153 |
ẏebeheṁ puṇi mote chāḷu re chāṇḍāḷa
toho chāra beḷe kāhiṁ pitāra dharu bāḷā | 154 |
tohora chāra pāmara karu tu upāẏe | 155 |
koṭi koṭi siṁgha baḷa parātrama rāma
tu chāra pāmara ki tāṁku jiṇibuṁ sāṁgrāma | 156 |
bāre bāre mote chāḷa re niẏata
rathare thāiṁ ye śālu tusti kari | 158 |
janma janmāntare hari taba caraṇare āśā
ẏe tohora catrakaiṁ āśā muhiṁ kari | 160 |
pāpādi narka ghore na miśu mora gātra | 161 |
ẏemanta na kale nātha catra muṁ na pāi
moho chāra baḷe ki dvārikā pārai yāi | 162 |
tini janma labhi se pāile mukata
pāpādi pātaka nātha mohora kara dhvaṁsa
mḷekṣa janmaru mote tāribā parama puruṣa | 169 |
svāmī bahuta asakhya kahiṇa na yāi
lakṣe rājāṁkara mukuṭa yujheṣṭhidebaṁka caraṇe loṭai | 182 |
ẏe tohora bhiāṇa sinā sabu catradhara
śuddha subarṇṇa se āṇile ẏete kāhuṁ
pāṇḍabaṁkara dhana drabya deba kiñchita mātara
samodre ṭhāba na dilā dekhilu nā tuhi | 191 |
jagannāthe boile deba tumbhara yebe daẏe
aṣṭa pāṭabongśīre śreṣṭha aṭanti bhīṣmeka nandinī | 196 |
śuṇiṇa śrīhari ye huanti hasa hasa
begeṇa yibu tuhi indra praśasta pura | 202 |
chāribhāi gheni tu āsa ho turite | 203 |
dropatī sahite tumbhe caḷasi pañchu bhrātha | 208 |
āsa go jighnasenī yibā jagannāthe peṣichanti dūta | 210 |
āho caitana dvārikā bhmabane hoile parabeśa
āgyāṁ dile yibu āmbhe mātāẏe chanti ẏekā
pura tucchā hoiacchi kehi nāhiṁ sākhā | 224 |
dropatī saja se karānti begi begi | 225 |
jaṇe jaṇe pād pūjā basra dile āṇi | 226 |
dinā chāri rahi tumbhe yibāṭi turita | 227 |

div.note: –chāri pāṇḍabanta ruhāile dharmasuta–tha

lg.l: pati patnī duheṁ bije kale garuda piṭhira | 228 |
āgo dhabaḷa pura kāhāra nirmaḷa diśai
se pura kāhāra teṇe kisa kāryya
se bhmabanara kathā na kaha mama ṭhāiṁ
āmbhara bacana tumbhe na kariba nāhiṁ | 234 |
apāra dina hoilāni pitāṁku nāhiṁ bheṭa
yibaiṁ hastinā pura na kara saṁkaṭa | 235 |
tumbhe prabeśile tāhāṁka mane na rahiba byathā | 236 |
mohora mane ta na thāi hiṁsākr̥ta | 237 |
mohora śapatha tumbhaṁku na karasi nāhiṁ
tumbhanta garuḍa ye chāḍi āsu yāi | 238 |
dropati boile yebe sodara dekhi sadha
bega hoi āsa bhāimāne nāhāṁnti sannidhya | 240 |
ẏethu anantare kapaṭa paśā carita upalekhi | 242 |
ẏe sabhāpabongre yete kr̥tya sabu kale hr̥ṣīkeśa | 244 |
ẏehā gāi śuṇi śuṇāile semāne hinti haribāsa

div.head: {@paśākhei o sabhāku pāṇḍabakaṁ āgamana@}

lg.l: ẏethu anantare se kapaṭa paśā kheḍa
dvārikāku nārāẏaṇa garuḍa piṭhire kale bije | 5 |
āgyāṁ debā muku muṁ dvārikāku yāuacchi | 6 |

div.note: –“kahibi mahābhāratha tohora parasāde” | pāṭha pare ‘ka’ pothire adhika pāṭha–
kaḷikāḷa dhvasaṁna nātha mote daẏākara
kahibi mahābhāratha kaṇṭhe basa mora |
badaẏanti mana ye caitana pāśa
yāga sāri pāṇḍabe ye manare haraṣa |
śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁka pāde pātha aneka baini

lg.l: tohora prasāde nātha muṁ dhaili medinī |–
jagannāthaṁku pāchoṭi gale chāri ye pāṇḍaba | 8 |
yujheṣṭhi deba kahile ye ditya bāki
yujheṣṭhi debaṁka bijaẏa kāle agrateṇa sthiti | 13 |
bhīma arjuna na jāṇanti ẏehāṁkara yibāra beḷaku | 14 |
śveta hastī goṭiẏe ārohi ye yujheṣṭhi rājana
bijaẏe dharma nandana yāiṁ hastinā bhmabana | 15 |
śrīcaraṇe yāiṁ sebā kale dharmara tanujā | 18 |

lg.note: nakuḷa sahadeba bhīmasena kirīṭī
chāribhāi gale ye śrīkr̥ṣṇakuṁ pāchoṭi |–ka, cha, jha, ṭa, ba

lg.l: bābu somabaṁśara sādhu mohora ye kumara utapatti | 20 |
bābu tohora prāẏeka putra jāta hou
karkaśa madhu piṅgaḷa prakr̥ti tāhāra naṣṭa
se putra thile bābu bongśaku baḍa kaṣṭa | 23 |

div.note: tuhi se dharmaśīḷa doṣa tāṁkara karibu parityagī | 24 |

lg.l: bābu pāpakuhiṁ puṇya sahiba ki sabongkāḷe
pāpaiṁ nāśa yāiṭi puṇya barddhuta beḷe | 25 |
kabāścite bābu kopa na karibu driyodhanaku
yujheṣṭhi debe kahile tāta kahila na bichāri
driyodhanara sahodra paṇaku mote bhīmā nohe sari | 27 |
svāmī yebaṇa bhaṇḍāra mora sambhāḷi mahayoge
dhane kaḷantā nohilā kehu mote driyodhanara anurāge | 28 |
bho tāta lakṣe rājāṁkara yete dekhā daraśani dhana
raṇḍāre pūroi rātra dibase diẏe dāna | 29 |
kemante heṁ sujhi pāri se kāḷara ẏeteguṇi | 30 |
bho tāta rakṣu hīna paṇe duburddhi kathā kahu
driyodhana parāẏeka sahodra mote sabongkāḷe hou | 31 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa boilā bābu nistarili nistarili muhiṁ
tohora tahiṁ mohora putra acchi ẏeḍe yaśa upujāi | 32 |
sabhāra āsthāne yāiṁṇa yujhesthi deba bijaẏe | 33 |
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa śalya śakuni bhurisabongāṁku
sabhāra madhya sthāne deba hoileka ubhā
duja khamba māḍi basi achai śakuni
āpaṇe āpaṇe pādai se paśākāṭhi gheni | 36 |
paśā dekhi yujheṣṭhi basile tāra chāmu
aṇṭiru āpaṇe ye kāḍhile khaḍi goṭi
paśā koṭhi kāṭanti tahiṁ dharma ye yujheṣṭhi | 38 |
lg.note:
–“tohora tahiñ mohora putra acchi yete yaśa upujāi
pare tha, ña re bhinma pāṭha:–
bahuta praśaṁsā kale dharma rāẏe
āja se kautuka upujiba sabhāẏe
madhya khamba mādi basile yujheṣṭhi
śakuni mukha chāhiñ boile dhārttarāṣṭri |
ājara bina māmuṁ bañchibā kesane
paśā āṇa kheḷibā bolai driyodhane |
dakṣiṇa khamba māḍi basicchi śakuni
āpaṇe āpaṇe pācara se paśā kāṭha dui goṭi gheni |
lg.l: dvādaśa koṭhi tini chaka caraṇa śira
madhya pāruṣe basilā śakuni kuṭa byāna | 42 |
mohora parijā hoilā śarīre yete aḷaṁkara acchi | 44 |
śarīru kāḍhi se thoile deba yujheṣṭhira | 46 |
samasta aḷaṁkāra māna thoile bhumi gata
yujheṣṭhi debe boile ẏehi se yugata | 47 |
rājāẏe rājāẏe yugata kheḷe pīḍha kari
yujheṣṭhi debe boile yāhā mohora sanamata | 49 |
sabu dharma mātuḷa achai tora tahiṁ | 50 |
lg.note: –madhya pīḍhake basalā śakuni kūṭa byāna–kha, ka, ḍa, ba,
lg.l: āmbha beni tula karitu pāuthibu paśā
ye se madhyapātra pratakṣe aṭai se dharma
tohora pāḍile hārajiṇa yehneka āmbhara karma | 52 |
pāḍa ho śakuni tu gorekha sumari
benikuḷa jiṇu āmbhe yemante na hāri | 53 |
beni lakṣa amūlya ratna thilā driyodhanra hr̥de
mama pitāmaha ye pūbongeṇa tote sebi | 57 |
itāku māilā mora driyodhana pathara ghare bhari
tahiṁki kāraṇa karibāku muṁ nohai ta sari | 58 |
tohora agyāṁẏe muṁ pārai abā jiti
baṁśakaiṁ kāraṇa go karāibā āja śānti | 59 |
rājyabhāra siṁhāsana driyodhana kaiṁ diāibi ẏemante | 60 |
tebe sinā nāśa yibe kauroba māna | 62 |
lg.note: –ḍhrakūṭa paśāẏeka patile śakuni mahāmanrī |–ka, ja, kha
–tahiṁki karaṇa tugo karibu māheśvarī–kha, ca,
lg.l: tu deba prama parṇḍata aṭu ho gorekha
kāṭha haste gheni bole mote hoibā sampakṣa | 63 |
pāñcha ye yujheṣṭhi chāri ye dhr̥tirāṣṭri
pāḍante paḍilā ye chāri pīḍha goṭi | 65 |
tiniṁki tula kari sabong ratna ghaṭa | 69 |
tahiṁki kaccha ẏehāra ẏe ratnamāna sakaḷa | 72 |
candra debatā dile kuṇḍaḷe beni mūrtti | 75 |
se kuṇḍaḷa yetebeḷa yāẏe thai karṇṇa
se kuṇḍata karnnethile na pīḍai roga byādhi
tāhā tahiṁ thilā kuṇḍaḷa yuga sāta | 78 |
maruta rājā dile yujheṣṭhiṁku dharma baḷe | 79 |
se kuṇḍaḷa karṇṇe na gacchai mr̥tu
aṣṭa dhātu jharai mauṣadhi parama hetu | 80 |
śrīkare pīḍha kale beni amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷe | 81 |
jita jita boli ye pāḍilā śakuni
pañchuāti paḍilā ye hārile kuṇḍaḷa beni | 82 |
bijaẏā mukuṭa ye aḷakā nātha dilā
bhoḷeṇa dharmanāna ye tāhā pīḍha kalā | 84 |
kāṭhi gheni kare ye boile yujheṣṭhi
āmbhara pañchuāti tohora āna dāna kaccha
tu yebe dāna pālaṭa kalu dharmasute
paḍila caubaca se pūbongra yathā bidhi | 97 |

lg.note: –sabu bhaṇḍāra mora hoilā ẏehikṣaṇa–ña, tha, ja

–pāra boli āgyāṁ dile yujheṣṭhi debā
paḍalā beni caukā hārile bhaṇḍāra sabong

lg.l: śīghreṇa boile tu pāḍa pāḍa ho mātuḷa | 100 |
naba khabong gaja ye chāri ahibrata
rāgeṇa pīḍha kale ye deba dharmasuta | 101 |
jita jita boliṇa ye śakuni pāḍilā
hārile gaja baḷa deba paśāra kutūhoḷe
yujheṣṭhi deba boile paiṭāibā āna dāna
tuhi gheni āna dāna muhiṁ ghenai āna | 104 |
śakuni boilā yujheṣṭhi boile hāde yāhā
tumbhe ho kurupati kariba nāhiṁ ki tāhā | 105 |
driyodhana boilā dāna gheni tumbhara ye icchā
yahiṁki yujheṣṭhi ho baḷiba tohora manobāñcchā | 106 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile mohora dāna daśa
dui cauka dāna gheni gāndhārīra śiṣa | 107 |
driyodhana boilā mohora yete ratha yāna
yujheṣṭhi boile mohora ratha baḷa hoilā yugate
paśā kāṭha gheni mantrī mañchāḷai beni bhmaje
jita jita boli se pāḍilā dāneka
abhyāe paḍilā dāna beni ye cauka | 111 |
bhīṣme boile bābu na kheḷaṭi yujheṣṭhi
ājaka bipakṣa tohora karma yoga araṣṭi | 113 |
hāriṇa yujheṣṭhi deba beḷuṁ beḷa gururoṣa | 114 |
driyodhana boilā paśā pāḍa ho śakuni
ẏeghānti pīḍhakali mohora ẏekādaśa kṣauṇī saini | 115 |
paḍilā beni cauka hārile yujheṣṭhi sampradhi | 117 |
ratha gaja aśva hārile sakaḷa pādānti
karatāḷi māriṇa ye gāla tūrī bāi | 119 |
rāndhaṇā miṭhā yebe supaṁku hoi sijhi
kahaṇāra miṭhā yebe śuṇantā loka bujhi | 122 |
bharaha miṭhā yebe kokiḷa prāẏe śubhai bāṇī | 123 |
yantrara miṭhā yebe hasta caḷai bhale
ādhāra miṭhā yebe bhmañja kṣudhā beḷe | 124 |
lg.note: –āja bipāka ye hoiacchi tohora karam goṭi ja, ca, ḍa
lg.l: baṇija miṭhā yebe sulabhe yāẏe bijā
badaẏanti gāṅgabe tu na kheḷare bābu
sakaḷa sampada sarilā āra kisa tu debu | 129 |
ẏebe yāa yāa āna dine kheḍa juta | 132 |
tumbhe ye boluacha yujheṣṭhi kisa hārilā | 133 |
maruta dilā kuṇḍaḷa kubera dilā mukuṭa
jārāsandha māri, āṇilā ratha gaja aśva thāṭha | 135 |
dropada yautuka dilā baḷa sāta kṣauṇī
rājāmāne yāgaku āṇile dhana dekhā daraśani | 136 |
rājya hāra jiṇa yebe hoanta paśāre
tebe se sārthuk kheḍa jānimā saṁsāre | 138 |
driyodhana boilā yāha tumbhe kahila maitra
aḍhāi kaṭai mohora aṭai yathā artha | 139 |
indra praśasta rājya karibā adha adha
tebe se paśā kheḍa hoiba jāṇa sādhya | 141 |
mohora beni arddha rājya pīḍha kali paśā
śuṇiṇa yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara tahiṁki baḷilā manīṣā | 142 |
mohora aḍhāi rājya kali muhiṁ pīḍha
pāḍa pāḍa boli dile śakunira hāthe
śakuni boilā bābu dharma udita hou tote | 145 |
jita jita boli śakuni mantrī paḍi
dekhile yujheṣṭhi deba beni caukā acchi paḍi | 146 |
kisa pīḍha karibi boli bhāḷanti hr̥dagate | 148 |
driyodhana boilā yebe āu kheḍi loḍu
bhāinta pīḍha karu kinā ābara kisa hiṁ bichāru | 149 |
lg.note: –sārthuka kheḍa hoantā bichāre – ja, ṭha, cha

lg.l: kheḍa rasa bhoḷe sanamata kaleka yujheṣṭhi | 152 |
śataśr̥ṅga cūta galā lāgi yāhāra bāma pāda aṁguṣṭhi | 153 |
pāṇḍabāsura māri pāra kalā biṣa laḍu
bīramānaṁkara darpa cūra kalā jhimāṇi kheḷa kheḍu | 154 |
kopeṇa nāśa kalā ye kumbhirī kinnarī | 156 |
baka rākṣasa badhilā ẏe ẏekacatrā nagre
pacchima daga nimantraṇe rājānta kalā sādhi

lg.note: –pāñcha bhāi ghe{??} muṁ hoili pīḍhara–ña, tha, ka
–bāmadeba bibāde ye daḷilā bīra mauki–ba, ṭa
–niāḷa mukaḷa karāilā rājā pāuthilā bhārā | ba

lg.l: lakṣe rājāra mauḍapaṇi pratagyāṁ yāhāra sādhu | 161 |
ākaśe śubhai sādhu yāhāri nāma goṭi | 163 |
catr̥rdiga gājanta jiṇimāku sāmartha mora bhāi
ẏe pīḍe parijā muṁ kalai tāhākaiṁ | 164 |
pāḍu acchi dr̥ḍha brata hoilāki duhiṁkari | 165 |
yujheṣṭhideba boile hoilā mora satya satya
ohokuḷa sanamata karāi pāḍai śakuni mahāmantrī
sākṣīkarāi bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa ye tininti | 168 |
mohora doṣa nāhiṁṭi ẏehāṁkari yehne manīṣā
jita jita boliṇa ye paḍilā mahānantrī

div.note: –ākāśe bikhyāta hoai yāhāra nāma goṭi ja, tha

lg.l: mohora śate bhrātha tāhaku kaccha kaḷi blanti kururājā | 174 |
kheḍa kaiṁ citta deba baḍhānti puṇa puṇa | 175 |
svarga mañcha pātāḷa yāhāra sārthuka bajimā | 176 |
indra bibādeṇa khāṇḍaba bana se dhaṁsi
mauṣohi dei ye baśyānara mana toṣi | 177 |
śare sāgara bānddhalā jāṇa se ta | 178 |
lakṣeka nr̥pti meḷe jiṇilā sabong yodhī | 80 |
chāḷiśi sahasra rājā ye jiṇilā uttara diga bije
yamāgoṣṭha rājakaiṁ bandhana kalā pitāmaha kāryye | 81 |
sabong jiṇi se sabongsācī nāma bahi | 183 |

div.note: –aṅgārapannaṅgakara ye jiṇilā saṁkoḍe | ka, ca, ḍa, tha, cha
–subarṇṇakaṭa pabongta bānddhalāka śare | tha, ña, gha,

lg.l: dhanu huḷe basāilā ye sapata brahmāṇḍa
kiñchite bahilā se medinī naba khaṇḍa | 184 |
bhārathe bhāroi malla śaraṇa pañjara yāhāra bīradhu
kirāta rūpeṇa ye bane jiṇilā paśupati
kahante na sarai pratagyāṁ yāhāra gāḍha
tāhāra puṇye kari abā jiṇi pārai ẏehu pīḍha | 187 |
śakuni sānanda ye driyodhana toṣa citta
paśā pāti śakuni ye bolai jita jita | 188 |
beni caukā dāna paḍilā dekhile daṇḍadhārī | 189 |
matta rase gīta gāi dyanti huḷahuli | 190 |
beni sohodre ye paśāre hārile dharmasuta
bhīma arajuna ta paśāre hāra galā | 192 |
tu kisa karibu yujheṣṭhi bāḷuta puanta gheni | 193 |
mohora leuṭa pīḍha kali bhīmaarjuna duhiṁnti | 194 |

div.note: –yāhāra śahasraku īśvara nasahai–jha, ba, ṭa
–mattāḷa nāṭa kheḷe pāḍanti huḷahuli–ka, ṅa, ḍa

lg.l: āhuri pīḍha kali dhuśāsana durjaẏa sahite | 195 |
kunta mune pr̥thī dhari pārai chatrigaṇe
kumāra paṇe pāṭa achai yāhāku paẏāṇe | 198 |
se mādrira nandane pīḍha muṁ kalai nakuḷe | 199 |
ẏe dāna chāḍiṇa muṁ ghenimi ānadāna
sāta dāna mohora bli boile dharmanāna | 200 |
driyodhana boilā ho kalu āna dāna sañchā
pāḍilā śukuni paśā jita jita boli
astu atu hou muṁ yāhā bāñcchili | 202 |

div.note:
* kumāra abastha re yātāḷaku yāi kunta mūnare pr̥thī dhāraṇakari
nakuḷa pāṭa śāḍhī pāithile

–dui pañcha, dāpañcha bāpañcha the nasal of ñcha ‘bā’ pare
āsibāru bāpañcha bāmapañcha, bāmañcha kimbā bāpañcha bā bāmañchā

lg.l: ẏekā tāhāku gheni kisa karibu yujheṣṭhi
bhīma arjuna nakuḷaku hārilu ābara rājya bhraṣṭi | 205 |
yujheṣṭhi boile mohora bhāi guṇe gunabantā
kara palaba chāhāṁnte jāṇaiṁ bhuta bhabiṣya barata | 206 |
yugānteka jāṇantā ye mohora bhāi sahadeba
go lakṣaṇa bidyā pāilā toṣiṇa bāsudeba | 208 |
gokuḷe hārilā se aṣṭauttara śate byādhi | 209 |
anindita karma se aṭai mora bhāi
abhaẏe bhmabana madhye ye se aṭai guṇagrādī | 210 |
hr̥de bichārile jāṇaiṁ bhuta bhabiṣya bārata | 211 |
dibyacakṣu bhāiki mohora adr̥śya hoẏe dr̥śya | 212 |
pūbong diga bije tini sahasra rājā jiṇi sādhilā | 213 |
tāra guṇa kahibāku beḷa ne aṇṭai muku

div.note: bhīma arjuna nakuḷaku hārilu muṁ ābari rājyabhraṣṭi | pādapare ‘gha’ re adhika pāṭha
nakuḷa kumāraku hārila nijagati
sahadebaku pīḍha karakinā ẏeghānti
–dibya takṣu bhāiki mohora bhuta bhatiṣya barttamāna samasta huai dr̥śya | cha

lg.l: pāḍa māmuṁ boli śakuniki kare nele dei | 215 |
sumaranti bho daiba mote laku ati kaṣṭi | 217 |
ẏekāki chāḍi āsicha ta yujheṣṭhi debaṅka | 220 |
garuḍa piṭhiru ohlāi chāri ye pāṇḍaba
dekhiṇa bisarile sahadeba nakuḷa bhīmasena kirīṭī | 225 |

div.note: –na dekhi bikaḷa hele bhīmanakuḷa sahadeba kirīṭī ḍa, tha, gha

lg.l: bābu kapaṭa hoilā boli arjuna bichārai | 227 |
chāla ho bahana gibā śighra gate
na puṇa yujheṣṭhiṁki dekhi manuāri yugate | 228 |
dhāmanti pāṇḍabe ye pabanuṁ bega gati
jhāḷeṇa tripaṇḍa ye sabuṁ kari kāẏe
śrameṇa diśanti se kāḷa dūta praẏe | 230 |
āstāna taḷe ye prabeśa bīre dhāti
āre sabhāku na uṭha boli boilā kurupati | 232 |
āre raha raha pāṇḍabā boli peliṇa pakāi | 236 |

div.note: –na puṇa yujheṣṭhiṁki dekhi manuāri {??}bante | cha, na, gha, ḍha, ba
–hastinā āstāna sannidhye yāiṁ ghoṭi ka, pha, tha, ña, ṭha
–uṭhanteṇa peli pakāilā bhīmasena | ḍa, ḍha, ṭha, ba, ka, ca, gha, pha

lg.l: rāgeṇa māruti ye adhara kalā pr̥ṣṭa
bāāna bāāna bhāra beni gabā kare gheni
goḷa dekhi yujheṣṭhi deba chāhiṁle leuṭi
bābu raha raha bhīmasena na diantu kinā uṭhi | 239 |
bābu paśā kutūhoḷe muhiṁ paśiliṭi hāde
thāa kinā bābu sabhātaḷe daṇḍe raha
