apāra pātaka re achai tora aṅge
tohora mukha chāhiṁ na yogāi saṅge | 181 |
guṇa na bichāri anamite hou dvandī
rābaṇaku māili se aṭe brahma rākṣasa
tahiṁki anamitte dilu mote brahmahatyā doṣa | 185 |
āho, brahmā satyayuge tora kalā keuṁ doṣa
tu se brahmahatyā kalure parama yogī
se brahmā kapāḷa tora kare acchi lāgi | 187 |
tu se rābaṇaku bara dilu paśupati
se rābaṇa aṭe mora dārāra bairi
se debarusi kaṇṭaka tāhākaiṁ muhiṁ māri | 190 |
kisa doṣa kale tora prajāpati dakṣa
tāhāra muṇḍa goṭiki ho moḍilu pratakṣa | 191 |
tu ye brahmahatyā doṣa kalu re kapāḷī
ānaku bāchu tu lajjā ki na uguḷi | 192 |
tuhi ye boilu muṁ stirīhatyā kali
muhiṁ nāśakali tahiṁ mohora kisa doṣa hoilā | 196 |
tu ye siddha satyayuge pābongtīṁki bhaṇḍilu
deba baraṣe rahilu naba sahasra baraṣa
tuhi se stirīhatyā kalu ye yugate
akāraṇe duburddhi ta kahu āna kete | 201 |
tu ye boilu muṁ gohatyā doṣa kali
se kapaṭe mote māriba boli ailā kharakari | 203 |
muhiṁ tāhāku sāṁgrāme kalaiṁ hābe badha
tu ye tapakalu pātāḷa gaṅgā tīre
kuśa lociẏek luchāi dilu nadīra kuḷe | 205 |
lg.note: –pābongtī chāhiṁ chāhiṁ hele prāṇe nāśa | (ba)

lg.l: na jāṇi go mātā se khāilā kuśa biḍi | 206 |
rāga saṁhiri nuāri tu dhāiṁlu kopānaḷe
gāīra śarīre śūḷa tohora ye paḍi
ānakaiṁ kathā tu ye na jāṇi kahu dhurjjaṭī
bhairoba rūpare khapare tohora gomātā muṇḍagoṭi | 209 |
tu se goruhatyā doṣa kalusi kapāḷī
mukuhiṁ jhiṁghāsu anamite ye tohora bhaḷi | 210 |
anyara tirī se mohora kisa mānita | 211 |
tā tahuṁ hoilu āmbhe tiniputra utapatti | 212 |
se tini santati ye bahmā biṣṇu maheśvara
se śakati gheni tuhi ẏebe karuachu ghara | 213 |
tambāra catra prāẏeka bulāi cachu jyoti | 215 |
adhara pr̥ṣṭa kari adhare danta chāpi
tīkṣa paraśu ẏeka gheniṇa māile deba khepi | 216 |
bhājiṇa paraśu ye hoilā śate cūra | 217 |
kadaḷī patra prāẏeka kampai hara aṅga
garuḍa pakṣare bāji śasra cūra galā
triśuḷa śakati nei deba bege piṭi | 223 |
tāḷadhvaja ratha ye bhāñji hoigalā cūnā
baḷarāmaṁka hāthaku uchuḍi ghenile haḷa śakati | 226 |
sehi haḷa gheni deba piṭile leuṭāi
ghe ājana kārttikeśvara saṅge indra bebatāra yuddha
aneka sāṁgrāma se hoilā raṇa madhya | 228 |
caṇḍa senāpati tule citrasena yuddha kari
tarjanti garjanti se dhāmanti ati bege
kareṇa gadābara ye gheniṇa bīra brikodara
bāuna bāuna bhāra gadā bhīma gheniṇa benihāthe
re re kāra kariṇa pāṇḍaba bīra uṭhi
mahā praḷaẏa kāḷe yenhe garjanti meghamāḷa
kāḷacatra prāẏeka naẏana tāra bulāi antarāḷa | 241 |
sohaḍa sundara ye nirdaẏā bīra bhīmā
śatr̥ śaraṇa na rakhai dusaha gārimā | 242 |
lg.note: –garjane bikāṇu acchi brahmāṇḍara svāmī |–[kha, na]

lg.l: mahāghora mr̥tti se hr̥de nara muṇḍamāḷa | 244 |
mahākāḷa ha tharu uchuḍai tāhā gheni | 246 |
se kaṭārī gheni mahākāle neuṭāi nei piṭi
dutī pināka samāne karaṇa dhari dhanu
bhīmasenakaiṁ lalkṣe nārāja binddhalā nageṇīra tanu | 250 |
lg.note:
–“uḍināde kampile ākāśe digayāḷa” pare ‘kha, na’
pothire pāṭha:–
mahākāla biartha ye dekhi nāga arajuna
re re kāra kariṇa se dhāmaiṁ bahana |
kopabhare bindhaṇa śahasra tīkṣamunā
jhalakilā bāṇateja agnira jyocchanā |
dehi brikodara bāma aṅgaku pātirā
paḍiṇa śahasra aṅge upuḍi paḍilā |
dekhikari praśaṁsai na guṇīra baḷā
dhanya kṣetrībara tuhi aṭa anargaḷā |
kopabhare bikāśilā brikodara mr̥tti
dekhi kumara dhailā śūḷa ye śakati |

lg.l: samasta śahasra tahiṁ paḍiṇa hoilā bhaṅga | 251 |
puṇa koṭiẏe nārāja kumāra ye yoci
ākāśa andhakāra hoilā se na diśai kicchi | 252 |
nārāja dekhi bāmaaṅga pātai puṇa puṇi
samasta nārāja aṅge paḍi curagalā bhīmasenatā na jāṇi | 254 |
kare dhailā kumara śūḷa ye śakati | 256 |
koṭiẏe sūryyara kiraṇa yebaṇa śuḷa śakatira teja
yebaṇa śahasra peśile trailoka hoai dahija | 257 |
trāse gopyāna na houchanti pātāḷe uḍante pabongte | 258 |
nāgā arjuna boilā śuṇasi ho bhāi
śūrabara sundara diśuachu makara ketana prāẏe
śakatira teje dahana hoibaṭi tohora kāẏe | 260 |
sambhāḷa sambhāḷa boli bīra śakati dilā peṣi
bhīma śarīre paḍilā śakati bege āsi | 261 |
bhīmasena asāṣṭama dekhi mānage binda rāẏe
aneśvara bhrātha gheni āpaṇe bija ẏa | 264 |
aneka śahasramāna se pūroi bīre kope
śatepura kari na gā arjuanaku beṛhile paritāpe | 265 |
āditya debatā adr̥śya ye hoile gagane | 266 |
nāgā arajuna śarīre paḍi cūra houchanti sabonge | 271 |
ẏekā ghāntike nāgā arajuna kalā śara br̥ṣṭi

lg.note: –sehimati kumara dhaṁsilā rānā driyodhane |–(ca, ja)

–“siṁhanāda kalā ye nāgeṇīra suta” pare anyānya
pothire pāṭhāntara:–
rājāra paḍante ye bhāñjile saini
dhāmaiṁ kumara ye kare śūḷa gheni |
rāhu yehne dhāmai śaśadhara dekhi

div.note: bāsabhagna pakṣī yehne paḷāi ārate
bhājile kaurobe tesanaka mate |
danteṇa tiraṇa dhariṇa ye hoanti nisata
kopeṇa dhāmaiṁ ye sandhyābāḷīra puta |

lg.l: mahāanaḷa teja jāṇi diśai nāgā arajuna
āre āre mānaba re yibu āja kāhiṁ | 287 |
tīkṣamunā nārājeka gheni kumāra karāi śarabr̥ṣṭi
puṇi sāṣṭāma hoi se tejeṇa anargaḷā | 294 |
āho amoha śakati se yahuṁ bhagna hoigalā
goḍāi bindahi kumara aneka śahasra gheni | 298 |
aneka sini ye bindhu chanti śara
tāḍa toḍara jhumpā saraḷa mukuṭa bāhuṭi
rakate marddana hoi bīre paḍile mahīloṭi | 302 |
ẏehāṁkara tule mukuṭabandhā yoddhā pāñchalakṣa hāthī | 304 |

div.note: –“ẏehāṁkara tule mukuṭabandhā yoddhā pāñchalakṣa hāthī” pare ‘ca’ re–adhika pāṭha bā bhinna pāṭha:–
tinirathī ẏeka hoi sāṁgrāme milile
pandara lakṣa hāthī acchi tāhāṁkar atule |
lakṣepura kari tahiṁ beḍhile kumara
śarabr̥ṣṭi karanti ye ghora anddhakāra | [abaśisṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre]

lg.l: nirbhaẏe kumāra se na śaṁkai śahasa paḍu | 306 |
apāra nārāja padi curagale tāhāra aṅge
re re kāra śabada kari se nācai raṇaraṅge | 307 |

div.note: pūbong pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara–
madhyare kumaḷa ye niśaṁke acchi rahi
tārāgaṇa madhye yehne candramā acchi uiṁ |
bahuta śahasra ye māile tinirathī
nāgā arjuna aṅge paḍiṇa curṇṇahonti |
kopeṇa dhailā dhanu nāgeṇīra baḷā
koṭiẏe nārāja binddhalā teja anargaḷā |
rathīṁka uapre ye paḍilā śarabāri
tinilakṣa yoddhā ye aḍile prāśahāri |
bahai rodhira nadī adi parakhara
ratha gja aśva ye paḍile nirantara |
sanya bināśa dekhiṇa karṇṇa mahābīra
kopeṇa dhanu dhari hoilā āgusāra |
pahija kahai tahim nāgeṇīra suta
āja tora prāṇa re hārilā jantunātha |
kopeṇa prajjvalita nāgeṇīra bāḷa
bajrabāṇa śara ye binddhalā abaheḷa |
ratha sahita uḍilā karṇṇa mahābīra
kete dūre paḍilā ke tā kariba gocara |
sahaseka yoddhā ye paḍile tāra saṅge
dekhiṇa aṇastamā ye miḷilā āsi bege | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]

lg.l: ratha gaja aśva ye paḍile bhumi loṭi
dekhile karṇṇa aśastamā kr̥pe nibujāi paḍile thāṭha koṭi | 309 |
puṇi nāgā arajuna karṇṇaku bāibā śahasra māilā
sahasreka yoddhā gheni karṇṇa keṇe uḍigalā | 310 |
sehnā phuṭiṇa nārāja bhedilā tāhāra buku | 311 |

div.note: pūbng pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara–
aśastamāṁku dekhiṇa nāgeṇīra baḷā
paṇupatra nārāja ye roṣeṇa binddhalā |
sehnā phuti nārāja ye hr̥dare phuṭai
paḍilā aśastamā ye uttānaśāhī hoi |
aśastamā hata dekhi paḷāile sanya
goḍai māila bekhi nāā arajuna |
pāṇḍabaṁki sanya baḷa yete tahiṁ thilā
ẏekā nimiṣake se ye nāgā arjuna māilā |
nabakoṭi rathīnaba mebacha ye hāthī
śatebr̥nda aśva naba kṣaraṇī pādānti |
ẏete māri bīra nohilāka śānti
caḷigalā kārttikeśvara acchiyeiṁ kati |
indra tule dusaha ye karuachi raṇa
bahuta gandibong tahiṁ kalā nihata prāṇa |

lg.l: bāṇara teja lāgi samaste prāṇa bisarjile | 313 |
ratha gai saidi ye kehu kari anta
nabakoṭi rathī naba mebaccha ye hāthī
pāñcha yojana pāẏeḍā kari ẏeteka sanya māri
bāhuḍi kārttika saṅgate miḷila guṇanāda kari | 317 |
bahuta gandhabonge paḍile ni karttikeśvara birodhe | 318 |
nāgeṇīra nandana ye bhedilā tāra aṅga | 320 |
dvādaśa muna nārāja nāā arajuna kalā br̥ṣṭi
paḍiṇa nārāja ye dhuḷi hoiṇa sakaḷa | 323 |
anaṅgasena biśvābasu beḍhile gadānta ye gheni | 326 |
dekhiṇa nāgā arajuna kopeṇa śara binddha
ghāẏeṇa ḍhaḷi paḍilā ye airābata hāthī | 329 |
bajra śakati peṣile se kārttika upare | 330 |
anibāraṇa śahasra ye aṭanti se beni
deba śahasra paḍitāḷe uṭhilā bahani jāḷā
īśvara ghenibhe kare śuḷa ye śakati
nārada mahātamā ye lagai dile kaḷi
bege tu prahāu karu kinā śūḷī | 343 |
nārade boile se pitā putre hoile haṇāhaṇi
tohora kapiḷāsa kimpe tāḍi loḍai haḷapāṇi | 344 |
anīti kathāmāna hara tu kemane sahibu
bolanti rudradebatāṁku kemante tu sahibu śirīpati | 346 |
ẏehāra bare barddhuta hoanti niśācara saini

lg.note:
–phabana debatā sahite naārle phandi
śanyapuruṣa māne śānta gānti bandi | cha, pha, gha, na
–sāṁgrāma dekhiṇa ye digapāḷamāne | (ka)

lg.l: na thāu rudradebatā tuhi se thaa ẏekā | 350 |
sāmānya ki tote bolai gauḍa bāuḍa hāuḍa
dhāraṇā puruṣa tu, tote karai chāra | 351 |
ẏete boli mahātamā kutuhoḷe karanti tahiṁ nāṭa
lāgu lāgu kaḷi bahana re dhāaṁ beni thāṭha | 352 |
ẏete boli muni kaḷidhokaḍiru māile dhūḷi muṭhāẏe
puṇi lāgilā goḷa raẏaṇī parabhāta ẏāẏe | 353 |
nāẏarāṇa hāthe yahuṁ sudriśena catra dekhi
rudra debatāṁka chāmure brahmāẏe karanti bāci | 355 |
tu se sakaḷa bhmabana achu pratipāḷi | 356 |
tu se prasanna deba nirākāra abhaẏe
jāta anta puruṣa tu saṁsāra jana karatā
parama māheśvara tu prasanne bara dyantā | 358 |
śaraṇa rakṣaṇa nātha tu nirekha janabandhu
ajapā mantreṇa nātha tohora caraṇataḷe bandu | 359 |
tu deba tripura badha kalu kūṭe
andheka bidārana nātha kalu tu saṁkaṭe | 360 |
lg.note: –paramānanda puruṣa tu katuṇā sadaẏe | ka, ga, ba, ṭa
–jagatajana jībana tora caraṇare bandu | ka, ṭa, ba
–tu deba tripura badha kalu haṭe | cha, ḍa, ṭa

lg.l: beḷe beḷe nātha tuhi se medinī uddhari | 361 |
alaṁghita puruṣa tu kāhiṁki kopa citta | 362 |
tu deba ādi puruṣa tu deba anādi
ẏe bhabajaḷa sāgaru uddhari dhara svāmī | 364 |
sadaẏe bara nātha to caraṇae sebā
śūdramuni sāroḷā bāsaku mukati gati debā | 365 |
īśvara debatāṁku brahmā kale aneka stuti | 366 |
tu bedabara śānti karāa śrīhariṁki yāiṁ | 371 |

lg.note: –yabata candra dibākara brahmā ādikari | (ṭa)
–yābata candra sūryya digapāḷa ādikari | (ka)

lg.l: puṇa binaẏe brahmā kahanti āhe baḷarāma
sadā mahāmatta tu kādambarī rase bhoḷa
kalpa kalpāntare draśana tote na pānti debatāẏe | 377 |
abhaẏe nirākāra tu bhārābhara nibāraṇa nimante
biṣṇura jyeṣṭha hoi tu upujilu mahīgate | 378 |
taba pādapadmuṁutapatti pr̥thī āpa teja bāiba ākāśa | 379 |
koṭi koṭi siṁghara prākarma svāmī baḷebira | 380 |
tu deba ananta koṭi brahmāṇḍa dhāraṇa
aṇākāra puruṣa tu nāma tohora saṁtriṣeṇa | 382 |
kāḷa garaḷa dhvaṁsana nātha mauḷe sapata pheṇi
ananta koṭi prakaẏa antaka jāṇi nuāranti kehi puṇi | 383 |
lg.note: –tāḷabane dhenukā (kadambā) ku kalu tu nidhana | (ka, ṭha)
–ātmāra ṭhākura bhārā nibāraṇa arthe | ba
–ananta koṭi praḷaẏa gale deba nimiṣeka gaṇi | (ka)
–ananta koṭikalpa brahma se tote nuārile jāṇi | ‘cha’

lg.l: karuśikara śāguṁ se tarile pañchu kate | 385 |
ananta darpa dhvaṁsilu deba haṭaḷeśvara bibāde
yoe yogeśvara tu yogī drpa dhvaṁsi | 387 |
sarpaṁkara nāsitāru bahai sapata jaḷ asindhu | 388 |
nīra nīḷa niścaḷa kṣīra śveta lacaṇa ghata mahodadhi
taba hr̥daẏa madhye sapata sindhu jaḷa bhedi | 389 |
taba caraṇe binaẏe nātha śukāmbhara puruṣa
śuddha sphaṭika parāẏe yāhāra śarīra prakāśa | 390 |
dhabaḷa śveta śarata nīḷa lohita {??} piṅgaḷa sapata pheṇi
harihara brahmāẏe talaẏe ananta koṭi maṇi | 391 |
svāmī sāta pabana bahai ẏekā pheṇāra madhye
sāta pheṇāre aṇachāśa pabana bahai sādhye | 392 |
japa mantra tapa laẏe yoga pañchu mudra
akāḷa akāma tu a{??}ẏe abadhā abidyā | 393 |
lg.note: –bhakṣusurā sarpi yeteka bārānidhi | [cha]
–dhabaḷa ṇeta marddana nīḷa lohai
kr̥ṣṇa piṅgaḷa sapata {??} śobhita |–(cha)
–aḷā{??} akāma tu aiẏe abagyāṁ
dibi bhmabana madhye deba tohora pratagyāṁ |–(ka, ṭha)

lg.l: namo namo baḷarāma siddha sādhya haḷī | 395 |
kehi bāri nuārile śūnya tora kāẏe | 396 |
saẏaḷa saṁsāra mauḷi deba jaẏa tu saṁtriṣeṇa | 397 |
śudramuni sāroḷā dāsaku uddhara deba svāmī | 398 | | 14909 |
baḷarāmaṁku aneka tusta kari śānti kale bedabrahmā | 1 |
duṣṭaṁku bara dei samasta karai dhvaṁsa
ẏehāre sr̥ṣṭi nāśayāi ātmara kisa doṣa | 3 |
padma yoni nātha rāmaṁku binaẏe pariṇāmi
rudra debatāṁku tu ye kopa chāḍa debasvāmī | 4 |
paṁkaja śaẏanu ye ailu deba kāryye
bhārābhara uśvāsanimante ye saṁsāre kalu bije | 8 |
brahmā indra candra sūryya ẏe tohora sthāpana
abhaẏe pāda taḷeṇa muṁ śaraṇa paśai | 10 |
brahmāra bacane santoṣa hoile rāma dāmbodara
pādāarghya dei praḷamba karai harihara caraṇara | 15 |
tu deba anādi na basr̥ṣṭi karatā
āge brahmā badana, pache birañchi karatā
bāme guru badana ḍāhāṇe śohai tora dhātā | 18 |
guru babane deba yajubongeda bhāṣi sañchi
athabong beda paḍhanti deba abhaẏe birañchi | 20 |
svāmī tohora nimante mote saṁsāra jane pūjā
kāṣṭha pāṣāṇa mr̥ttikā tohora ātmārūpa dujā | 21 |
tote pūjibāku deba kāhāra mantra acchi
teṇu se apūjā tu bhoga ye na icchi | 22 |
rudra śāpe apujā tote bolanti kahaṇā | 23 |
bihantā puruṣa tu abheda bajrasehnā tora kāẏe
ānara śāpaku nātha kisa tohora bhaẏe | 24 |
ẏe tohora śāpeṇa se saṁsāre abhogī
sabong sādhāraṇa puruṣa tu sabnggyaṁ parama yogī | 25 |
nāgā arjuna śaraghāte arjuna acchi kṣidra dehi | 27 |
harihara sāṁgrāma hoẏe hāde tahīṁra nimante
kiñchita kari chāḍa tu bāsabira prāṇa
bhārābhara uśvāsa kariba ẏe mahābhāratha yuddhe
aneka duṣṭa niśodhana kariba raṇa madhye | 32 |
dvāpara yuge bhāroi malla pāṇḍaba pañchāṇe | 34 |
bahana jībanagoṭi tāhāra chāḍiṇa diasi ho yama

lg.note: –nāgā arjuna śaraghāte arjuna acchi acchedana hoi | (ṭa, ba,)

lg.l: mohora carita dvāde tote ki agocara | 36 |
mātāra śāpe mohora gaḷuta kuṣṭha byādhi
satya tretaẏā dvāpara tiniyuga galani kehi na kahila buddhi | 37 |
īśvare pucchile mātāṁku tu kebaṇa droha kalu
dharmaku pradāna se kalāka daśa ye duhitā
svahā svadhā boli tāra beni ye duhitī
agni debatāṁku pradana kalā dakṣa prajāpati | 42 |
āditya debatāṁku ye saṁgyāṁ pradāna kalā
hemānāme kanyā ye hoila parama yogī
mahā anaḷa puruṣa boli bhājilā mahāmāẏā
chāẏākaiṁ samarpi debī ye hoile gopyāna
meru mekhaḷe luci se hoile ānabarṇṇa | 49 |
ẏemante bahigalā naba sahasra baraṣa pariyante | 50 |
svāmī śrābaṇa māsa kr̥ṣṇapakṣa aṣṭamī śauri bāra
aśvinī nāme nakṣatra aṭai se dinara | 52 |
bāḷaba nāme karaṇa dhr̥ti nāme yoga
sedina chāẏāṁka tule kali muhiṁ kaḷi
bhracchanā kariṇa sehu dile mote gāḷa | 54 |
rāgeṇa chāẏā mote śapadilā hāde aśr̥pāte
yāāre nāśakara tote gaḷuta kuṣṭha hou pādaghāte | 56 |
svāmī mātāṁkara śāpa muṁ muārili meṇṭi
bichāri bisarile ẏeta hoilā baḍa anīti | 58 |
lg.note: –āditya chāẏāku gheni gr̥habāsa kale nabakoṭi baraṣa pariyante | (ṭa, ba, ca, ḍa)
lg.l: bimukhe mātāẏe ye putraṁku karanti aneka kopa
garbhadhārī mātāṁkara putraku na paḍai śāpa | 59 |
ājhuṁ mātāśapa ye putraṁku na phaḷu
sādhu sādhu sādhabī tora mahimāṁ durlabha
cirāñchana kathā rahu mu chāẏāra ballabha | 64 |
kr̥tānteka boilā deba yāhā pucchākala mote
muhiṁ yebe mukati nohibi ẏehi parastabe
ẏe kaṣaṇuṁ mote pāri karibe hāde mahādebe | 66 |
aneka kāḷara ye gaḷuta kuṣṭha byādhi

lg.note: –saṁgyāṁ parityāja kalā chāẏā khaṭiacchi | [ña]
–muhiṁ yebe mr̥kiti hoibi taba parastābe | [ṭha, ṭa, ka]
–śrīkara lagāi pochile yamara caraṇagrate | (ka)
–64 yugara, cauṣaṭhi koti, cabiśa baraṣa, cauda baraṣa, cautriṇa, tiniyuga |

lg.l: śaiḷajāra ballabha nātha saṁsara jana karantā | 69 |
ẏe bhaba sāgaraku tuhi se adauḍi ẏe bandhanā | 70 |
andhaka tripura dhvaṁsana nātha mohora pūrāa manīṣā | 71 |
surasiddha muni yāhāra caraṇa binaẏe sahibhāba | 74 |
se deba caraṇe mo binaẏa garastābe
āhomanurāẏe nikaḷaṁka hoilā yama ye debatā

lg.note: –ẏe bhaba sāgara nātha tohore hoẏe dhvaṁsā–(ka, ṭha)
–praḷaẏa nibāraṇa nātha paramānanda sādhaba |–ṭha, ka, cha

lg.l: uṭhare arjuna boli dhātā śarīre āuṁśi
nija kāẏā gheniṇa se uṭhilā turita | 83 |
paḷāi paśilā yāi hara udyāna bane
bābu pātāḷa svarge tu bibhā hoilu yebaṇa bāḷī
se tote birodha hābe kalāka sabongsācī
tahiṁra pāiṁ kopakale ki deba śirībacchi | 87 |
aneka samadaṇḍa gheni bābu bāhilā kurusāiṁ | 88 |
śate bhrāthanta gheni driyodhana acchi paḍi | 89 |
lg.note: –“ni ja kāẏā gheniṇa se uṭhilā turita” pare ‘ba’ pothire bhinna pāṭha–
yujheṣṭhibeba boile śuṇa phālaguni
dharmara baḷe tu uṭhilu beha gheni |
dharmarājā āge kahai arajuna
sambhabonge samagrabaḷa ki nimante ẏe ṭhābeṇa |
lg.l: harihara bajarāma digapāḷanta dekhiṇa bīra phālaguni
śubha anakūḷe śite dile nei arghya
muhiṁ jībana pāiri deba tohora parasanne
mohora pāiṁ ye ye paḍichanti kurusanye | 93 |
kamaṇḍaḷu pāṇi gheni dhātā siñchile dhatikāra | 94 |
se nabasr̥ṣṭi karatā dhātā chāhiṁle amr̥ta dr̥ṣṭi
dhātā boile pātha ho jībana tohora dhani
arjuna boile deba kalu yebe sadaẏe
svarga prāpata ye hou mohora pitā
astu astu boliṇa se boile bidhātā | 98 |
yama debatāṁku boile ẏehāra samasta dhvaṁsu
yama boilā paṇḍura āu doṣa kāhiṁ
mohora pātaka haraṇa nimante ẏete kr̥tya kali muhim | 100 |
se paṇḍura parasāde harili mora byādhi
se parama mahātamā mote parama mauṣodhi | 101 |
lg.note: –harihara bahmā chāhiṁ le amr̥ta dr̥ṣṭi | ja, tha)

lg.l: nāgā arjunara hātha dhariṇa deba hara | 102 |
ẏe te hora putraku sambhāḷa bīra pātha | 103 |
bābu rudraṁku sebākalu re bongśa mohora sādhu
ẏehi kapiḷāsa svarge tu thāasi re baḷā
īśvara prasāde tohe ra teja anargaḷā | 106 |
āmbhara tahiṁ thile tu he ibu dvandakārī
bābu dvandeṇa paśile ye abaśya prāṇahārī | 107 |
rāma kr̥ṣṇa yujheṣṭhi indra arjuna sahite

lg.note: –īśvara parasāde kalpa āẏiṣa hou gheni mora kaḷā | (ña)
–īśvara prasāde kalpe kalpe anargaḷā | gha, kha, na
–dvārapāḷa kari aneka utsaba karāile tāhāṁku | (ja, ca)

lg.l: svāmī na jāṇi droha kalā tote mohora bāḷuta tanaẏe | 114 |
mohora putra sinā jiṇilā ẏethiki mote kisa lāja | 115 |
ānara hāthe yebe muṁ huanti jhiṁghāsi
airi loka mukhe muṁ pāānti upahāsī | 116 |
tu ẏebe priẏā go yāa pācāḷa svargaku
puṇihiṁ draśana ye pāu sinā mukuṁ | 117 |
lg.note: –arjunaku ghenikari śrirāma murāri | (ka, ja)
–tebe sinā abhimāne huanti sakhī dhvaṁsi – [ka, pa, ja, ḍa, ṭha, na]
–“airi loka mukhe muṁ pāānti upahāsī” pada pare ‘ṇa’ pothire pāṭha–
bāpa puaṁkara yuddha sinā helā |
ẏethiki kiṁpāiṁ lāja me te go hoilā
moṭhāru janma hoi tāra baḍimā jāṇili
anyaṭhāru putra na hāriba mihiṁ prate gali |
aneka śasrabidyā moho prāẏe sehi
mora nāma dharma rakhiba tanaẏi |
tumbhe ẏebe priẏā go yāa pātāḷa bhmabanaku
puṇi daraśana pātha reṭāreṭi sinā muku | [pha]

lg.l: sādhure sādhabī go jībana tohora sācā
trailoke jiṇantā ye aṭai tohora pati
indra gobinda hara brahmā jiṇilā sabunti | 120 |
samasta yugakaiṁ ruhailā ẏehu cirāñchana kathā | 121 |
kr̥ṣṇa arjunaṁku pādapūjā kari debī pātāḷa bhmabanakaiṁ caḷi | 122 |
dhanya dhanya tora mātā arjuna praśaṁse | 123 |
arjuna pāiṁ sañchā kara go bhiāṇa | 128 |
kareṇa arghya gheni aile sabong bāḷī | 129 |
sādhu sādhu jībana tumbhara boliṇa paraśaṁsi
bīrabara pratāpa ke trailoke tote sari | 133 |
tohora putra hoi se ẏeḍeka baḷabantā | 134 |
arjunaku arghya dile sabong muni miḷi
puṇya jāta nimante aneka bedadhuni toḷi | 137 |
dvārakāẏe pātha rahile daśa dibasa pariyante
arjunaku gheni āsanti deba kaṭai indra praśaste | 138 |
kointā dropatī arghya bandābanti arjuna hari pāśa | 139 |
arjunaku gheni driyodhana galā hastinā bhmabana | 140 |
lg.note: –ānande śireṇa arghya bandābanti | [ba]
–dukhī daridre dhana ratna dei śuddhabhāba | (ba)

lg.l: gāndhārī bhānubatī mūḷe sakaḷa kāminī arghya bandābanti arjunara mathe | 141 |
arjuna śire arghya dianti sabonge miḷi
dhr̥tirāṣṭe boile bābu aneka biarthe kaṣṭa āmbhe ye pāiluṁ
ẏe pañchu rājya buḍilā prāẏe maṇithilu | 143 |
ẏebe se dharma udita hoilā bīa pātha
aneka utsaba ye hoilā pañchu kaṭaka rājye
dhana basra annachatra dianti sambhabonge bahuta dvije | 146 |
muṇohi bhojana kari arjuna śrīpati driyodhana
kisa kahibā ullāsa yehne pañcha kaṭaka bhmabana | 147 |
hastināẏe kurubaḷe pāṇḍabe bāruṇā indra praśaste
dekhiṇa sānanda ye hoile debī konte

lg.note: –uddhari dharilu somabongśa pālu puruṣārtha | (ṇa, ṭa)
lg.l: svarga mañcha pātāḷa ẏe tini bhmabana
nāgā arjuna boli ẏe tohora arjunara putra
beḷuṁbeḷa māheśvarī go barddhuta tohora gotra | 166 |
mā go bhīmasenara putra baḷī ye belāḷa
tini bhmabana jiṇimāku se sāmartha mahābīra | 167 |
mā go putraṁkara tahuṁ tora ntiẏe barddhamāna
kehi jiṇantā nāhiṁ tote ẏe tini bhmabana | 169 |
chāra kauroba pāmaraṁku kisa ẏe tohora bhaẏe
nārāẏaṁṇaku dekhi subhadrā praṇapatya hoile āsi
ẏe se pratagyāṁ go aṭai tumbhare
dekhiṇa na rāẏaṇe dhaile bege toḷi
kahuṁ kahuṁ kathā netr̥ bahai aśr̥ jaḷa | 178 |
dropatī boile deba tu se antaryyāmī
tohora na rakhante ke rakhantā debasvāmī | 180 |
ẏebe pañchubhrathā deba hoilā mohora karma | 181 |
ẏeteka abastā deba na galā mohora hr̥ṣīkeśa
āstāna pūrita ye samaste chanti basi
antapuruṁ dhuśāsana keśa dhari mote nelāka ātreṣi | 184 |
tu deba antaryyāmī najāṇu abā kāhā
ẏehāṁkara dekhanti yete śāsti dilā kurunāhā | 185 |
ke sahi pāriba nātha rakata māṁsa deha bahi | 186 |
tebe se jāṇibi mora achanti pañchunāhā | 187 |
ẏe tohora chāmure satya kahucchi dāmbhodara | 188 |
yadyapi śarīre mohora rakhai nija prāṇa
nirañjana thāḷe muṁ pūrāi diai biṣa
dhuśa sane na mārile muṁ maribi abaśya | 190 |
dhuśāsanaku na māile muṁ na bāndhai bāḷa
ahanteṇa gadagade bebīra netr̥ṁ bahai aśr̥jaḷa | 191 |
tohora caraṇa chuiṁ niẏana karucchi jagabhuta | 193 |
śatebhrātha ādikari yebe na mārai jagunāhā | 194 |
ẏetekeheṁ śānti ye nohoi tāhāra kopa
brahmā biṣṇu maheśvara boli kāṭilā tinigāra
yujheṣṭhi deba boile sahaṇa na yāi
trodha śānti nohoi ye dropaba duhitī | 200 |
kūṭa kapaṭa paśā ye kalāka śakuni
ābara beḷe paśa ye kheḷibi tāra saṅge
ẏesaneka hoi abā bratanti yeuṁṇa prāṇī | 203 |
jīiṁbā ṭhābaru ye maribā baḍa bhai
jiṇi yebe pārai ẏe pañchu jagata | 205 |
ẏe mohora satya satya ccāṇithāa bhagabāna | 206 |
tu āgo mahāsvatī na bhāḷa mane kicchi
koṭiẏe arghya nei dila paṇḍu rājāra śira | 214 |
bhr̥tya prāẏa khaṭithāi nāśakara sabhāra madhyeṇa | 215 |
sādhu sādhu paṇḍu rājā jībana tohora | 216 |
svarge pūjā pāilu pada brahmā sama | 217 |
paṇḍumku aneka mate kariṇa rāẏe pūjā
śuṇa ho paṇḍita jane suputraṁkara kathā
āpaṇe tarai, tārai tāra pitr̥ ye debatā | 219 |
pitr̥lokaṁku laṁghi nuārai yama tāhāra baḷe | 220 |
se bhebara padmapāde nitye mo śarana

lg.head: {@pāṇḍabaṅkar dvitīẏa banabāsara kāraṇa@}

lg.l: kaurabe pāṇḍabe ye hoibe ẏeka sañchā | 1 |
rohiṇī nāme nakṣatra ye beḷa tinighaṭi | 4 |
se dina yujheṣṭhi ye hastināku gale
kothi kāṭa boli dile sahadeba hāteh | 10 |

div.note: –pāṇḍabanta abhinna cintai kurupati |–pha, ṭa
–dhr̥tirāṣṭa tahūṁ aneka puruṣārtha paile | (keteka pothi)

lg.l: āpaṇe sahadeba koṭhi kāṭai khaḍi gheni
baijaẏantī māḷā dei kalāka chaka tini | 11 |
ẏe paśā kapaṭa boli kahila sāra piṭhi
badaẏanti dharme, māmuṁ nohai tohora paśā
āna paśā āṇa boli hākante yujheṣṭhi
adabhmate sabhāre paḍila āsi beni paśākāṭhi | 14 |
sahadeba pāḍu ẏehā boli boile kurunātha | 16 |
badaẏanti manu yupuṣa śuṇa ho tadanta
debatāẏe bije karichanti meru ye pabongta | 20 |

div.note:
–sāra piṭhi sthānare sāra pāṭi, śira piṭhi, śira phuti, kirīṭī
bīrahuṭi, śira pāṭhi, kṣīra phuṭi, lihilā karpaṭi prabhr̥ti
pāṭhāntaramāna dekhāyāe |
–baḍāi takita paśā samūrṇṇa daśadāan |–ṭha, ṭa
–dharma sumari sahadeba ghenilā paśākāṭhi |–(ṇa)

lg.l: āstāne guhāri kalā dante tiraṇa gheni | 21 |
kīcakara śate bhāiṁkara bhārā muṁ nuārai sahi | 22 |
bitame chālante se rudhira bahai mora mukhe
rāsāṁgata hoibi muṁ kiṭāḷa baḍa dukhe | 23 |
yujheṣṭhiṁki paśare harāiṇa tumbhe āja āsa
dvādaśa baraṣa pariyante se hoibe banagāmī
baraṣe tera dibasa hoantu gobyāna yujheṣṭhi debasvāmi | 26 |
dropatīra arthe bhīma kīcakajaiṁ kariba nidhana | 27 |
pitāṁka āgyāẏe gale khaḷa ye du{??}
ẏe paśākaiṁ kisa ye karibā paritā | 31 |
driyodhana boila ẏe paśāi kisa aṭai carita
21|2–āsāne guhāri kalā kare kaneka tumbha gheni |–(ka, na)
budeṁ dāne dāne āmbhe ghenibā ye bācchi
yehu hāriba se pañchurājye nohe kicchi | 33 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile dvādaśa baraṣa pariyante
śakuni goilā ābara barase tera dina
ẏe baraṣe teradine yebe heiba jāṇantā
puṇi tera baraṣa se hoibe rājye hatā | 36 |
sahadeba boilā satya yāhā kahile śakuni | 37 |
āmbhara gopyāna nohile kīcaka nohai hata | 38 |
dui mantrī bacane benirāẏe hoile ye tuṣṭi
hoilā ẏehi parijā boile driyodhana yujheṣṭhi | 40 |
ẏe mohora bhāge beni cauka hoilā | 42 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile ye tohora icchā
ẏe mohora dāna hāde hoilā bāmañchā | 43 |
gorekha sumari driyodhana sahadeba kare dilā paśākāṭhi | 44 |
bho daiba puruṣa karma yahiṁṭi karai yāhā yāhā
bhāhārihiṁ beḷe se meṇṭāi nohe tāhā | 46 |
dharma dharma sumari pāḍa ho mantrībara
yāa ho pāṇḍabe tumbhe kṣaṇeheṁ na raha
roṣeṇa bhīmasena niśvāsa gtahḍai ghan ghana | 54 |
lg.note:
daśa briyodhana, caubiṁśa āborile yujheṣṭhi
gorekha sumari driyodhana sahadeba kare dilā paśākāṭhi | (adhibā pothi)
–baḷamana chāḍi nibongi hoiba | [ḍha]
–baha susañchare brabira dibārāti | [ḍha]

lg.l: yujheṣṭhi deba tarāṭi chāhānte tāṁka kopa sambhāḷi | 55 |
chāriheṁ śānti hoile tahiṁ sthirakari dehā | 56 |
śuṇa ho rājana tapasvīna rūpa ye dhaile śarīre
uṭhiṇa caḷile ye bane pañchu bīre | 57 |
bataneka śuṇimā sabhāẏe yeteka acchi basi | 58 |
dvādaśa baraṣa bulibuṁ ye āmbhe bane
svarga lokanta muhiṁ na pāi ādare
ẏeke ẏeke na mārai yebe kuru śatabīre | 61 |
ẏethakaiṁ kehi tumbhe na kahiba bāci | 63 |
dropatīra keśa ātraṣaṇa kalā sabhāra agrate
tebe se keśa bandhāyiba ẏehāra rakate | 64 |
lg.note: –dhuśāsanara benibhuna muṁ upāḍibi niẏate | ja, ḍha, ca
–rodhira prāhāna karai karibi dropatīra mana śānti | ba, ṭa
lg.l: pitā mhora svarge na pāiba sadagati
tahā muṁ na pāibaiṁ yahi na karai ẏehu karme | 66 |
driyodhana jhiṁghāsilā ye dehāi jānu dui toḷi
tahiṁ mo gadā nei piṭibi niroji | 67 |
śatebhrātha he ile mohora ye bhāge
śuṇiṇa sabhajane ye bismaẏe mana citta
ẏehā yoguṁ āmbhe yibā yamapura pratyaccha | 72 |
kuḷa kṣaẏaku kāraṇa kalā āsi bāṭa | 75 |
lg.note: –kururāja saṅge yebe mantrī bhrātha na mārai bikoti | ṭa, ba
–tāhā na pārai muṁ jahili baḷakarme | ṭa, ba{??}
lg.l: karṇṇa śakuni boile rājā bongśa galā hata
āho caḷanti pāṇḍabe ye banabāsa mārge
gr̥habāsa chāḍiṇa se samaste rājadaṇḍe miḷanti āsi
naẏanaru nīra gaḷai pāñchabhāiṁkara mukha dekhi | 81 |
lg.note:
–“banabāsa tāhāṁku se hoila bhalamata”
ẏehā ñja pothire pare adhika pāṭha:–
banabāsa ye tāhāṁkara sarile
ẏebe ye niṣṭhura bhīmasena kahile |
bāruṇā bolikari ẏekai pabongta goṭi
pāpa nāśinī se tuṅgabhadrāẏe yāiṁ bheṭi |
nadī paścima kuḷe as{??}nda nāme yabongta
se giri upare yāiṁ uṭhile bīra pātah |
ẏesaneka samaẏe nārada taponiṣṭhi
se pabngta upare yāiṁ mahātamā bheṭi |
nāradaṁku dekhiṇa praṇamya kalāka phālaguni
āmbhaṁku bihila ye ẏesaneka kaṣṭa puṇi |
arjuna bacana śuṇi bolanti nārade
banabāsa ye tumbhaṁkaiṁ hoilāka hāde |
tera baraṣa ye banare sebiba
tahuṁ āsiṇa ye bāndhabanta nāśiba |
lg.l: āho paṇḍura pitr̥ pitāmahara sinā ẏehi mahī
kesaneke bana dukha sahibe ẏe nr̥pā | 83 |
āho adharma kr̥ta ye kalāka dhr̥tirāṣṭi
yujehṣṭhi debaṁku dekhibu svāmī āmbhara pañchubhmate | 85 |
bane sebā karithibuṁ ye dharma svāmīṁkara pāśa | 86 |
bhīṣmaṁkara thāānte se ẏeḍeka karma kahiṁ
droṇa kr̥pa ṇalya ki sabhāre na thile
kiṁpāiṁ yujehṣṭhiṁki se ẏeḍe kaṣṭa bihiḷe | 88 |
kesaneke hahija na galā tāra deha | 89 |
ẏe ye sukumārī dropada rājara duhitā

lg.note: –kuṭeṇa rājya gheni ẏehāku dukha dei | jha, pha
–yujheṣṭhi pañchu rājye rājāpaṇe śobhita | (ba)
–yujheṣṭhira rāja ye āmbhara niẏaḍa | (ṭa, pha)
–susañcha sukumārī bacanaku amitā | (pha)
lg.l: lakṣe rājā heuṁṇa stirīra na dekhile pāda
se ẏebe bulibe ye banagiri mahdya | 93 |
āho yujheṣthi debaṁkara ye bana gamana śuṇi
nityeheṁ bhmañjanti ye aṭhāśi sahasra dvija
karanti praḷamba ye yujheṣṭhi deba ẏehāṁku dekhi
sukheṇa thibā muni he āja āmuṁku upekṣi | 96 |
tohora bitrake na śehai ẏehu sthāne | 98 |
chāḍiṇa yibākaiṁ āmbhara na baḷai mane | 99 |
sṭacchande bane paśi phaḷamuḷa āhāra ye kari
sabongdāẏe thinuṁ āmbhe tohora mana bari | 100 |
baneṇa gamanti ye paṇḍu rāja putre | 101 |
āmbhanta na nibarttāa tumbhe rājyuṁ yānte

lg.note: –puṇi āsi khaṭibi tumbhamānaṁkara pāde | [ca, ṭha]
lg.l: bhrātha suta badhu bhārijā brāhmaṇa sahite
tohora saṁte bane yibuṁ ho nr̥pamaṇi | 107 |
bana gahane ye yujehṣṭhi pañchu bhāi yāi | 110 |
mukuiṁ bahuta kaṣṭa hoilā baḍa prasa | 114 |
dukhakaiṁ āna mana nohanti pañchu bhāi
keuṁṇa carita ye kalāka mohora suta
bhr̥tya prāẏe seba karithānti pañchu bhātha | 116 |
lg.note: –citteṇa {??}
lg.l: jana mukhe mote kisa bolibe sabongiṁ
svaẏeṁ gañji hoiluni ẏe tohora buddhī | 118 |
yahuṁ se kāṭhi beni kr̥ṣṇa ye śukaḷa
ye se kuru pāṇḍabe aṭanti benibaḷa | 120 |
ẏekaku āreka ye raṇa sāragoṭi māri
bāndha māra śabada ye śubhai bistāra | 122 |
dāna bhāñjiṇa ye bibidha bīra ḍāka dei

lg.note: –“bolai bibura ye śuṇa kurusāiṁ” ehi pada pare pha o ṭa pothire adhika pāṭha |
māḷākāra prāẏe hoilu mahārāja
apakārī hoi nāśilu sabongkāryya |
bhārata kuḷa gauroba sakaḷa saṁpradhi
{??}ẏaṁ bongśa gañji hoileni tora buddhi |
–“pratoṣe pramodita anyoanyi prakāśai”
ehi pada pare, “pha” ṭare adhikā pāṭha–
dhana bitta pāiṁ yesane hilu ānanda
putra badhu nāśane mahākaṣṭa tohroa hoi narendra |
biṣabr̥kṣa lagāi āpaṇe karibu bhoga
sabuṭumba bandhubarga kalu mr̥tuyoga |
puṇi bidura kadvai karapatra yoḍi
odabasra ẏeka pinddha odābasra ẏeka oḍi |

lg.l: suta bāndhaba nāśane sehi mati hoibu narendra | 125 |
biṣa amr̥ta prāẏe bujhi kalu bhoga
sañchuẏe kuṭumba bandhu tu kalu tesaneke mr̥tuyoga | 126 |
bhīmasena gala ye bāhā dui toḷi
dhaumya purohitaṁku se dekhiṇa arghya dilā | 128 |
sahadeba galā ye chatrīṁka mukha chāhiṁ | 129 |
kesaneke durbuddhi paśila tora citta madhya | 130 |
boilā yetedine keśa mukai kalāka pāñchaḷī
dhuśa sana rodhire keśa tā pakhaḷi | 133 |

lg.note:
–“te horeṇa yomabongṇa hoilā lopyāna” pare pha o
ṭa re adhikā pāṭha–
śuṇīṇa birasa ye heilā dhutirāṣṭa
tapa śeṣe heilā ye mohora matibhraṣṭa | [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhare]

lg.l: nicaẏa bipada ye tote se hoila | 137 |
bāhu beni toḷi ye galaka brikodara | 138 |
ẏe benibāhe śatr̥ku se kariba ye badha | 139 |
yujheṣṭhi debe ye gale mukhe basra ghoḍāi kari
nakuḷ aboila ye śatr̥ra pāuṁśa hāde dekhi
tebe se mohora mukhuṁ bhasma ye upekṣi | 142 |
ẏe pura śūnya dekhibuṁ abaśya āmbhe āsi | 143 |
lg.note: pūbong pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara–
bhāḷiṇa boilā ye hoilā kāḷabaśa
ẏesaneka kr̥ta hoiba abaśya |
bhīmasena sabhāẏeṇa yeteka boilā
nicaẏe bipada mote se hoilā |
ubi agni prakhai nicaẏe mora putre
kāḷeṇa se kr̥ta phaḷibanā mote |
kebaṇa abhimāna pāi gale yoge
kahasi bihura ẏe katha mukuiṁ udabege |
–binthari = biñccha{??}–bistāra kari
–arjuna galā ye bāliki bicchari | (ca, ja)
–raṇe asaṁkhya bīa māribi śasra dhari | [pha]
